review: gabisa login terus malah di suruh nggu 30 jam pdhl skrg udh laper banget pgn cb pesen makan di gojek waras
translated_review: Can’t log in, told to wait 30 hours even though I’m very hungry and want to try ordering food on Gojek.

review: mantap supir nya pun rama dan baik mobil nya pun bersih dan wagi wak pokok nnya josss x
translated_review: Great, the drivers are friendly and nice, cars are clean and fragrant. Overall great!

review: udah 3 kali pesan masih aja gc dapet driver udah 2 jam nunggu tiga kali juga batal
translated_review: Already ordered 3 times, still no driver. Waited 2 hours. Cancelled 3 times too.

review: dear developer gojek kalau nulis deskripsi pada update aplikasi yang bener kaga usah lu bolak balik gitu kalimatnya kalau ga bisa nulis sini ya udah ga usah ditulis lol
translated_review: Dear Gojek developers, if you write app update descriptions, please write properly. Don’t keep repeating the same sentences. If you can’t write well, better not write at all, lol.

review: tolong kalau hari libur maps buat drivernya di update soalnya di ui kalau hari libur semua gerbang tutup cuma bisa lewat dekat tugu buku kasian driver nya mutar jauh banget
translated_review: Please update driver maps on holidays. In UI, all gates are closed on holidays, so drivers can only pass near Tugu Buku. Poor drivers have to take long detours.

review: setiap saya pesan setelah driver datang pasti saya tawarkan di luar aplikasi offline dan saya yg cancel kebanyakan driver setuju perusahaan ini sudah terlalu serakah dan tidak ada empatinya dgn mitra
translated_review: Every time I order after driver arrives, I offer offline outside the app and I cancel. Most drivers agree. This company is too greedy and has no empathy for partners.

review: cuaca bagus jam sibuk kagak cari driver udah kaya cari emas lamanya udah kayak hewan hibernasi
translated_review: Good weather, rush hour, can’t find drivers like looking for gold. They seem hibernating.

review: aplikasi sampah wajar aja banyak ditinggalin driver dan pelanggan pindah kesebelah3x download gagal trus ngures kuota doang
translated_review: Trash app, no wonder many drivers and customers leave for other apps. Downloads fail and just waste data.

review: dapat driver engkong2 walaupun gemetar naeknya paling tidak maxim sudah mau memberi pekerjaan tidak memandang usiabuat engkong driversehat terus
translated_review: Got old drivers even though shaky riding, at least Maxim gives jobs regardless of age. For old drivers, stay healthy.

review: buat para customer yg kaya tokai klo bisa jgn maen cancel aja kalo sekira nya dpt nya jauh driver tolong di kabarin jgn seenak nya maen cancel driver udah sampe penjemputan maen cancel ajaklo bisa customer cancel di potong 5000 untuk driver
translated_review: To customers who are like garbage, please don’t just cancel. If the driver is far away, inform them, don’t just cancel freely. If customers cancel, deduct 5,000 for the driver.

review: tolong drivernya cari yang benar baik saya 2 kali dapat driver yang kurang ajar padahal saya udah percaya pake maxim
translated_review: Please select good drivers. I’ve had two rude drivers already, even though I trusted Maxim.

review: kenapa aplikasi saya tidak bisa tampilkan transportasi dan lain lain tdk seperti biasanya padahal sdh sy instal ulang
translated_review: Why can’t my app show transportation and other services like usual? Even after reinstalling.

review: oknum driver nya kurang sopan padahal kan saya baru belom terlalu paham harus nya di kasih edukasi bukan malah di katain kasar
translated_review: The driver is rude even though I’m still new and don’t really understand, they should educate me not call me names

review: sejahterain driver min kasian driver sampe ngalong ujan2n argonya tambahin kasianrata2 driver pada ngeluh klo saya tanya
translated_review: Take care of the drivers please, it’s sad drivers have to wait long in the rain, the fare should increase, pity the drivers usually complain when I ask

review: cukup senang dan cukup baik cm kl pas butuh susah sekali dpt driver itu aja sih lainnya om
translated_review: Pretty happy and good enough, but when I need a driver, it’s very difficult to get one. That’s all, sir.

review: masih belum diperbaiki kinerja driver atau apk nya ya gojek solusinya dong buat driver biar autobid pas lagi ujananeh susah banget dapat driver kalo ujanmanjaaa bgtkesel deh driver pada manja kalo ujan pada gamau narikga butuh rejeki apa ya
translated_review: The driver or app performance still hasn’t improved, Gojek please fix it, make autobid for drivers during rain, it’s so hard to get a driver when it rains, drivers are spoiled, they don’t want to work in rain but need the money

review: aplikasi aneh tiba tiba muncul tagihan ongkos tolparkir dari tahun sebelum2nya padahal selama ini dipake juga aman aja karena memang udah dibayar ga jelas stop pakai gojek dan uninstall adl jawaban terbaik
translated_review: The app is weird suddenly charging toll and parking fees from previous years even though I already paid, very unclear, stop using Gojek and uninstall is the best answer

review: bapaknya ramah baik bgd udh mau bawa kitadari tadi mo klinik bawa yg sakit susah bgd pesen ojol dibatalin trsterima kasih ya pak sudah mau bawa kita disaat kita butuh bgdmaaf cm bs kasih tips sedikitsehat selalu bapak
translated_review: The driver was very polite and kind, he wanted to take us to the clinic but our order was cancelled, thank you sir for trying to help us when we needed it, sorry I can only give a small tip, stay healthy sir

review: makin gajelasbuat dapet promo aja harus langganan gojek plussekarang udh ga ada promo yang kaya dulu lagimakin update makin gajelaspadahal ngasih promo juga profitnya udah banyak banget dari taxaplikasi kikir
translated_review: Getting more confusing, to get promos now you have to subscribe to Gojek Plus, no promos like before, with more updates it’s just getting worse, even though they get a lot of profit from taxes, the app is stingy

review: bingung ya sama gojek pakai gojek harus nya bisa lebih cepat dan gak menunggu lama dn harga ny juga semakin naik klo cuaca hujan harus nya driver selalu ready masa menunggu trus sihh harus bisa jadikan solusi penggunan ojol hadehh
translated_review: Confused about Gojek, using Gojek should be faster and not make us wait, the price is also increasing, during rain drivers should always be ready, why do we have to keep waiting, they should find a solution for ojol users, ugh

review: tolong dipertegas untuk mitra grab carnya saya pesan dari grab car hemat plus sampai xl hampir 2 jam di cancel terus sama driver
translated_review: Please tighten the policy for Grab Car drivers, I ordered Grab Car Hemat Plus to XL, almost 2 hours cancelled repeatedly by drivers

review: sudah di update malah nambah fitur verifikasi selfie yang gajelas udah lama kepala sampe ngangguk2 ga jelas ga bisa bisa tembus pesen drivernya malah kaya orang dongo di tempat umum ngangguk2 verifikasi ribet
translated_review: After update they added a selfie verification feature that’s unclear, after a long time nodding my head, I still can’t get through, ordering a driver feels like dealing with dumb people nodding in public, verification is complicated

review: jelek dari segi pembayaran via debit kredit dan mastercard lainnya ketika mau dipake sukaa aja ada kalimat lagi diperbaiki tidak dapat menggunakan pembayaran via itu
translated_review: Bad experience with payment via debit, credit, and other Mastercards. When I want to pay, there is often a message “under maintenance” and I cannot use those payment methods.

review: kenapa yaaa ko sering dapet nya yg jauh jauh terus jmpt nyatolong dong kasian driver nya jmpt ny jauh
translated_review: Why do I always get drivers that are super far away? Please fix it, I feel bad for the drivers who have to travel so far.

review: trauma bgt tiap naik grab car gaada yg bener tiap jalan supirnya ngeluh mulu macet lah apalah padahal kita sebagai customer gatau apa apa soal gitu memang sudah resiko mohon adain fitur silent buat pengemudi biar ga banyak ngeluh atau ngomong
translated_review: Traumatized every time I take Grab Car, none are good, drivers keep complaining about traffic even though we customers don’t know, it’s a risk, please add a silent mode for drivers so they don’t complain or talk

review: kasih opsi agar ttp bisa di gunakan walau belum update kadang lagi kepepet sinyal lemot jadi kelamaan mau nyari driver
translated_review: Give option to still use app even if not updated, sometimes signal is bad and it takes too long to find a driver

review: pak sopir ramah dan sopan mengerti dengan penumpang ditempat titik jemput daerah pelabuhan terima kasih pak sopir yang baik hati tuhan memberkati
translated_review: Driver was friendly and polite, understood the pickup point at the port area. Thank you kind driver, God bless you.

review: perlu penyesuaian lagi saya sering di kasih driver yang jauh dari titik penjemputan terus jadi sering di cancel tolong tambah fitur memilih driver agar bisa memilih driver terdekat
translated_review: Needs adjustment, I often get drivers who are far from pickup point and orders get cancelled often, please add feature to select drivers nearby

review: gojek ini banyak boong di bilang 1mnt lgi sampai tanya di undur jadi 4 mntt apa begitu cobaa banyak nipu nyagk sesuai y di promosiin tolol emng
translated_review: Gojek lies a lot, says driver arrives in 1 minute but then extended to 4 minutes, try it yourself, lots of scams, false advertising, stupid

review: saya setiap hari menggunakan grab aplikasi sangat bagus nyaman driver nya juga fast respon tapi terkadang kalau sedang hujan aplikasi ini suka loading lama
translated_review: I use Grab everyday, the app is very good, comfortable, drivers respond fast but sometimes when raining the app loads slowly

review: selamat pagi semoga maxim lebih bagus lagi dari sebelumnya khususnya kami dipulau nias sangat terbantu dg adanya maximhanya sajasaya pengen lbh ditambahkan lagi seperti pembayaran jasa secara onlinemaximpay dan aman juga bagi kita tdk terjadi sesuatu hal
translated_review: Good morning, hope Maxim gets better especially for us in Nias island, very helpful, only want added features like online payment Maxim Pay that is safe so nothing bad happens

review: yg bener ajah masa psen gojek selalu jauh titik nya rugi waktu jarak driver juga kasian bensin nyaaaa di le gmana sih gojek sekarang kaga ada akhlak
translated_review: Seriously, ordering Gojek always far pickup point, waste time, distance to driver, pity the gas, what is this Gojek no morals

review: kecewa berat baru aja make gojek seneng awal dpet voucher diskon eh taunya malah tiba ilang vouchernya udh gitu ditolak laporannya goodbye
translated_review: Very disappointed just used Gojek happily got voucher discount then suddenly voucher disappeared, report got rejected, goodbye

review: kurang suka di cara pemilihan peta nya yang tidak bisa di atur dengan akuratmasa harus pasang pin di tempat yang harus ada di maps

review: kecewa berat sih percuma punya fitur ewallet klo smua drivernya di kota makssr gk ada yg make tolong fitur ewalletnya di fungsiin ya kak biar gak kalah saing sm kompetitor sblh
translated_review: Very disappointed, useless to have e-wallet feature if all drivers in Makassar city don’t use it, please activate e-wallet feature so we don’t lose to competitors

review: alhamdulillah selalu memuaskan pake aplikasi gojek menolong banget di saat sy ada di tempat yg asing tapi alhamdulillah bisa sampe ke tempat tujuan dianter abang gojek
translated_review: Alhamdulillah always satisfied with Gojek app, very helpful when I’m in unfamiliar places, can reach destination thanks to abang Gojek

review: kendala tidak menemukan driver tp sistemnya gak ada solusi bertanya ke pusat bantuan juga sama saja tidak bisa dikasih masukan
translated_review: Problem can’t find driver but system has no solution, asking help center same, can’t give feedback

review: jadi takut kalo pake voucher hemat disinikalo pakenanti driver nya judesngasih rating customer nya jelekjadi susah dapet driver ga dikasih tips pasti ngomel
translated_review: Scared to use voucher hemat here because drivers are rude and give bad ratings to customers, hard to get driver, if no tip they complain

review: sekarang malah semakin parah sdh dekat lho tiba2 di cancel sopir gojek kok gitu sekarang kok gak sopan gitu sdh terburu2 e malah di cancel tanpa ada pemberitahuan dlu parah
translated_review: Now it’s worse, near arrival suddenly driver cancels, Gojek driver so rude now, in a hurry then cancels without notice, very bad

review: di jaman yg serba digital ini kehadiran aplikasi gojek sangat membantu sekalisemoga kedepan gojek selalu memperbaiki diri dalam pelayanannyasemakin sukses untuk gojek n semua para drivernya
translated_review: In this digital era, the presence of the Gojek app is very helpful. Hopefully, Gojek keeps improving its services. More success to Gojek and all drivers!

review: beberapa x mengalami dpt driver grabcar yg sangat tidak sopanlebih enak naik gocar atau taxi bluebird
translated_review: Several times got very rude GrabCar drivers, better take Gocar or Bluebird taxi

review: banyak driver nya sekarang pada ngemis tips karena argo yg dia terima gak sesuai ada yg nerima 5000ada yg 6000 tolong kasiani driver andaanda bisa jaya karena driver andahilangkan program anda
translated_review: Many drivers now begging for tips because fare they get doesn’t match, some get 5000 some 6000, please pity your drivers, you can succeed because of your drivers, remove your program

review: tolong benerin apk nya dong sering gangguan muter2 terus abang ojolnya chat jadi ngga bisa dibales kita mau konfirm ke ojolnya jadi susan kasian ojolnya
translated_review: Please fix the app, often glitches, keeps looping, abang ojol’s chat can’t be replied, hard to confirm with ojol, pity ojol

review: driver comfort lagunya sengaa gak mau diambil lucu bgt driver ojol tuh kalo ga mau ambil bilang biar dicancel wahai para driver dongoo biar org ga nunggu

review: saya ingin mendaftar ulang sebagai driver tetapi sudah mengganti motor dan ktp di akun lama sudah terpakai apakah ada cara agar ktp lama saya bisa saya gunakan kembali
translated_review: I want to re-register as a driver but I already changed motor and KTP in old account which is still used, is there a way to use old KTP again?

review: sangat kecewa karena pesan grabcar yang datang malah blue bird malah supirnya blue bird tidak ramah suka ngomel2 tarif murah
translated_review: Very disappointed ordered GrabCar but Bluebird came, Bluebird driver not friendly, likes to grumble, cheap fare

review: good membuat semua orang menjadi dapat sampai ke tempat tujuan nya dengan selamat dan lancar tanpa kendala

review: driver nya lama bangett yg harus nya anter ibu saya cuci darah jam 6 bisa sampe jam 7an

review: mantaf smpe ga ngantuk nemenin ngbrol smngat trus cri cuan y pak supir sehat sll berkah selamat

review: bagus sih murah tapi kadang kasihan sama drivernya biasanya pas promo harga grabcar hemat sama dengan grab yg motor
translated_review: Cheap but sometimes pity the drivers, usually promo for GrabCar cheap same as motor Grab

review: sangat cepat cekatan pelayanan nya bagus terimakasih sudah mencari kan kendaraan dan pengemudi yg baik dan amanah dan ramah terimakasih

review: keseringan driver gada kembalian padahal kami ini customer kalo tidak siap dgn kembalian jgn buka layananpenjualan
translated_review: Too often drivers don’t have change even though we are customers. If you’re not ready with change, don’t open the sales service.

review: gojek lagi ngeruk keuntungan pelanggan bayar 15rb driver terima cuma 5rb astaga gojek pantrs drivermu pada ngeluh semua aplikasi meres tenaga org lama2 habis pelanggan mu gojek
translated_review: Gojek is squeezing customers, pay 15k driver gets only 5k, oh my, your drivers complain, app sucks energy, customers get tired eventually Gojek

review: sopir gocar rada belagudah tau pesan gocar yg xl ke tanya berapa orang dewasa 3 anak kecil 3 aja gak mau bawa sumpahin seret tuh driver rezeki nya
translated_review: Gocar driver a bit rude, know order Gocar XL, asked how many adults 3 kids 3, driver refused, cursed, driver’s luck bad

review: kesalahan driver lama malah customer yg nanggung konsekuensi dibatalin ya karena buruburudriver jauh malah dapet konsekuensi customer bakal dapet yang lebih jauh kalau sering batalin selagi driver belum jalan ngga masalah dong kalau dibatalin malah ngancem customer si grab ini haduh
translated_review: Driver mistake late, customer suffers, order cancelled because driver far, then customer gets further driver, if cancelled before driver moves no problem, if cancelled late threatens customer, Grab is bad

review: mksh bang udah di bantu itu klrga dr jakarta sedangkan saya org biasa ga py mobil tolong pihak grab di bantu bila penumpang masih klrga dan sy pesan grab dr rmh tolong di permudah
translated_review: Thanks bro for help, that family from Jakarta, I am just a normal person without car, please Grab help if passenger still family, I ordered Grab from home please make it easier

review: sampai bikin 2 laporan ga ada yg beres permslhan ga selesai jg parah dah payah cari karyawan yg bs kerja
translated_review: Made 2 reports nothing fixed, problem still not solved, so bad, hard to find staff who can work

review: aplikasi lemot padahal jaringan wifi lancar pas mau dipake jaringan internet gk ada heran lohh buat semuanya jangan pake aplikasi ini mending aplikasi grab aja jgn gojek
translated_review: The app is lagging even though the WiFi connection is good. When I try to use it, the internet connection disappears. Seriously, for everyone, don’t use this app. Better use Grab, not Gojek.

review: beberapa driver nya kurang ajar baru saja kejadian baru nunggu 2 menit sudah ngamuk kayak udah nunggu bertahun
translated_review: Some drivers are rude. Just happened, waited 2 minutes and already angry like waiting for years.

review: saran untuk grab ini backsoundnya mohon dihapus saja karena sangat mengganggu apalagi waktu mengangkat telfon saat dalam perjalan bersama drivernya suara backsoundnya masuk kedalam telfon
translated_review: Suggestion for Grab: please remove background sound, very annoying especially when answering phone calls with driver, background sound goes into phone

review: sangat membantu di saat butuh bepergian terimah kasih maxime semoga tambah sukses terimah kasih pak supir bikenya juga
translated_review: Very helpful when I need to travel. Thank you, Maxim. Hope you get more success. Thanks to the driver too.

review: seneng sih dapat tarif murah tp kasian juga ke abangnya sy klo dapat tarif yg murah pasti inisiatif ngasih tip ke driver nya biar sesuai dengan tarif aplikasi lain nya
translated_review: Happy get cheap fare but pity abang driver, if fare is cheap I always tip to make it fair with other apps

review: parah driver grab cirebon khususnya cideng raya orangnya senga amat ga ada ramah nya koq bisa orang kaya gitu jadi driver
translated_review: Terrible Grab driver in Cirebon especially Cideng Raya, very rude no manners, how can such person be driver

review: terimakasih pak semoga sehat dan di lancarkan rezekinyaa amiinn sangat bagus musik yg bagus pengemudi dengan hati hati pengemudi sopan tiba dengan cepat bersih rapi
translated_review: Thank you sir, hope healthy and prosper, very good music, driver careful, polite, arrives quickly, clean and tidy

review: tolong untuk pihak gojek diperhatikan kmbali driver nya karena saya sering ketemu driver yg gatau gmaps driver yg komplen kalo jalan becek pdhl saya juga gatau kalau jalan tersebut becek atau sedikit banjir selama di jkt drivernya pada bagus setelah di tangerang pada gitu mksh
translated_review: Please pay attention again to Gojek drivers because I often meet drivers who don’t know Gmaps, drivers complain about muddy roads even though I don’t know if the road is muddy or slightly flooded, in Jakarta drivers are good, in Tangerang bad, thanks

review: aplikasi ga jelas dreafer nya pada sengaja di lambatin di apk nya tulisan udah tiba pas di cek dreafer nya masih jauh lebih mending grab atau gojek lebih aman walapun harga sedikit mahal
translated_review: App unclear, drivers intentionally slow app, says arrived but driver still far, better Grab or Gojek more reliable even if a bit more expensive

review: aplikasi nya berat padahal saya buka aplikasi sosmed atau yang lainnya jaringan lancar tapi klo buka gojek lemot kaya gapunya kuota padahal pake wifi
translated_review: App is heavy, I open social media or others network smooth, but if open Gojek slow like no quota even on wifi

review: tolong untuk map diperbaikisering tidak sesuai dan membuat hubungan driver dengan penumpang jadi bermasalahtolong it nya kerja untuk memperbaiki masalah map kalo perlu terjun ke lapangan
translated_review: Please fix the map, often not accurate causing problems between driver and passenger, please IT work to fix map issues, better go to field

review: sengaja bintang 5ni gojek lama lemot amat chat driver ceklis terus tau sampemau tracking map malah lemot ga jalan
translated_review: Deliberately 5 stars for Gojek, slow, laggy, driver chat check marks then tracking map slow no movement

review: driver gocar pada gak doyan duit padahal banyak yg mangkal tapi gak ambil sama sekali jarak deket 40 rebu
translated_review: Gocar drivers don’t like money, many waiting but don’t take orders even for 40k distance

review: drivernya pada ngemis2 minta tambah ongkos 100 ongkos dpt di 25rb di apk cust eh drivernya minta 60rb
translated_review: Drivers begging for extra 100 fee, fare is 25k in app customer but driver asks 60k

review: gojek taik ni drivernya penipu dan makin maki orang tanpa ada sebab yg jelas trus mempermainkan orang trus setela itu dilapor keadminnya tapi malaan saya yg diblok adminnya buat smuanya hati hati mengunakan gojek banyak driver penipu digojek tapi tidak ditindak tegas
translated_review: Gojek sucks, drivers are scammers and more abusive without clear reason, after reporting to admin I got blocked, be careful using Gojek many scam drivers not disciplined

review: aplikasi saya tadi tu udah dapet driver dan kemudian ada driver yang nge cancel jadi nya banyak yang masuk chat sama jadinya saya kena omel sama driver jadi nya banyak yang masuk
translated_review: My app earlier got a driver but then the driver canceled so many drivers started messaging me and i got scolded by a driver because of that many messages came in

review: untuk di bandara ada tambahan biaya admin parkir yg kalau ditotal jadi lebih mahal dari gocar grabcar
translated_review: At the airport there is an extra admin parking fee that makes it more expensive than GoCar or GrabCar.

review: gojek parah dari jam 2 hujan sampe skr jam 6 sore dari miko mall ga ada yg maw ambil malah pada di cancel
translated_review: Gojek is terrible from 2 PM raining until now 6 PM from Miko Mall no one wants to take the order, instead they all cancel.

review: kenapa selalu susah cari pengemudi dan malah dapat pengemudi yg jaraknya jauh nego harga sudah gak bjsa lagi
translated_review: Why is it always hard to find a driver and instead I get a driver far away, negotiating price is no longer possible.

review: kenapa sekarang makin sulit customer wajib vermuk kamera saya rusak gmn cara makai apk nya sangat kecewa
translated_review: Why is it getting harder now, customers must do face verification, my camera is broken, how do I use the app? Very disappointed.

review: gojek mahal skrg gaak asik saya mau pindah ke ojek kompetitor sebelah aja wkwkwkw semakin sering naek goride semakin tidak pernah mendapatkan promo kek dulu payah sekalinya ada promo pake bank wkwkwkw ribet bye gojek aku uninstall yah
translated_review: Gojek is expensive now, not fun, I want to switch to the competitor’s ojek next door lol, the more I ride GoRide the less I get promos like before, pathetic, if there is a promo it’s only with bank and complicated, bye Gojek I’m uninstalling.

review: mau di buka lama banget padahal jaringan bagus pakai wifi yang mahal dan lancar banget tapi pas buka nih aplikasi butut maxim loading muluu sampai setengah jam an lebihh
translated_review: Takes so long to open even though the network is good using expensive and very smooth wifi, but opening this lousy Maxim app keeps loading for half an hour or more.

review: buruk mapsnya gak jalan sekalinya jalan tidak lancar alias stuck stuck jadi tiba tiba sampe aja drivernya jadi kita taunya driver tidak jalan
translated_review: The maps are bad, sometimes don’t work, when they work not smooth or stuck, suddenly the driver arrives but we know the driver didn’t move.

review: utamakan driver langsung jalan jika siap ambil jika tidak abaikan jangan buat pelanggan menunggu terlalu lama di akhir waktu menyebalkan rasanya
translated_review: Prioritize drivers to move immediately if ready to pick up, if not ignore, don’t make customers wait too long at the annoying end time.

review: aplikasi gak jelas susah cari gocar cancel seenaknya padahal sudah nunggu lama tolong pelayanan diperbaiki g ada kompensasi lagi
translated_review: The app is unclear. Hard to find GoCar. They cancel at will even after a long wait. Please improve service. No compensation either.

review: sejauh pemakaian selama ini saya hampir tidak pernah mendapatkan pengalaman buruk kecuali 12 kasus driver beralasan kejauhan dan minta saya cancel mohon pertahankan kepuasan tetap kasih promo bagi konsumen tanpa merugikan mitra
translated_review: So far using it I almost never get bad experience except 12 cases drivers say too far and ask me to cancel, please maintain satisfaction and keep giving promos to customers without harming partners.

review: dahal ya bagus ini apk tpi driver nya banyak yang nolak dengan alasan hujan yakali mesen sepeda dahal mesen pakek mobil huft
translated_review: Actually this app is good but many drivers reject orders because of rain, seriously ordering a bike but they complain, ordering a car still like this, sigh.

review: nyari terapisnya lama bngt gak dpt2 tp emang murah sih minta tolong di map nya ditambahi nama jalan klu mantau driver ato talent sampai mana biar gampang thx
translated_review: Finding a therapist takes too long, can’t get one, but it is cheap, please add street names on the map to monitor driver or talent progress so it’s easier, thanks.

review: kecewa sama driver gocar karna sering cancel pelanggan disabilitas kemarin cancel 5 kali perbaiki layanan dulu
translated_review: Disappointed with GoCar drivers because often cancel, disabled customer cancelled 5 times yesterday, improve your service first.

review: semoga kedepannya talangan g susah dapatnya karna saya jualan pake jasa maxim yg perlu talangan lama banget kalau cari driver yg mau talangan
translated_review: Hopefully in the future it won’t be so hard to find drivers who are willing to front the money, because I use Maxim which needs that, and it takes forever to find one.

review: tarif mahaaal potongan buat driver 30 lebih kasian woi sama drivernya mereka yang kerja si gojek yang nguntungin kayak zaman kolonial aja
translated_review: The fare is very expensive, driver’s cut is 30% or more, pity the drivers, they work, Gojek profits like colonial times.

review: mulai agak kecewa dengan driver gojek di kota semarang beberapa yang cara supiran motoran nya ugalan arogan di ingetin marah dll
translated_review: Starting to be disappointed with Gojek drivers in Semarang city, some drive recklessly and arrogantly, if reminded they get angry.

review: seharusnya di aplikasi di berikan tutorial biar paham cara menggunakannya biar gak salah paham sama driver gopartner
translated_review: The app should provide tutorials so users understand how to use it and don’t misunderstand Gopartner drivers.

review: mau bayar cicilan paylaterpinjam jadi gabisa karena app nya kebanyakan fitur jadi berat dari dulu selalu problematik sistem nya gojek
translated_review: Want to pay PayLater installments but can’t because the app has too many features so it’s heavy, always problematic Gojek system.

review: sekarang tarifnya mahal dulu trip yg biasanya 11rb13rb skrg jadi 20rblama2 ku log out juga nih gojek
translated_review: Now the fares are expensive, trips that used to be 11k-13k are now 20k. Soon I’ll log out of Gojek too.

review: goride nya error pesen sekali yang datang dua pengemudi ini sangat merugikan orang maupun pengemudinya mohon di fix
translated_review: GoRide is error, ordered once but two drivers came, this really harms both passengers and drivers, please fix.

review: drivernya parah penumpang disuruh bayar lebih padahal parkir dan tol sudah kami bayar tetap minta lebih dan alasannya buat biaya layanan niatnya pengen agak murah dari sebelah malah justru lebih mahal dari si biru
translated_review: Drivers are bad, passengers asked to pay extra even though we already paid parking and toll, still asking for more claiming service fees, wanted cheaper than competitor but ended up more expensive than Bluebird.

review: terimakasih atas respon nya dan bantuan nya bintang nya aku kasih 5 sukses terus untuk gojek
translated_review: Thank you for the response and help, I give 5 stars, keep succeeding Gojek.

review: wahai customer yg budiman kalo kasih rate jangan tega kasihan driver kalo di kasih rate jellek langsung anyep ga sehari bermingguminggu kasihan kalo punya keluarga udah susah lu bikin susah lu bayar juga ga mahal pikirin keluargs driver juga jangan tega jadi manusia punya empati
translated_review: Dear kind customers, if giving ratings don’t be cruel, pity drivers, if given bad rating they get upset not just for a day but weeks, pity if you have a family, already hard and you make it harder, you pay not expensive, think about driver’s family too, don’t be cruel, be human and empathetic.

review: map yg di grab car tidak sesuai titik jemputnya serta titik sampainya tolong diperbaiki agar singkron dengan titik jemput n sampainya kasihan drivernya di ajak muter2 sama map grab karena tidak sesuai
translated_review: The map on GrabCar doesn’t match the pickup and drop off points, please fix so it synchronizes with pickup and drop points, pity the drivers being taken in circles by Grab map because it’s not accurate.

review: aplikasi payah kalau pesan gocar drivernya pada gak bergerak dari posisi awal good job maxim dan grab
translated_review: The app is bad, when ordering GoCar drivers don’t move from initial position, good job Maxim and Grab.

review: saya melakukan penarikan udah lebih dari 6 hari dana saya belum masuk setelah di telfn csnya malah disuruh email udah di email tapi ga ada balasan bagaimana pihak gojek tolong di baca yaa kalo masalah kecil aja ga bisa di tanggapin pelanggan bisa beralih
translated_review: I requested a withdrawal more than 6 days ago, the money hasn’t arrived, after calling CS they told me to email, I emailed but no reply, how can Gojek not respond to small problems, customers may switch.

review: tolong sistem jgn seperti penjajah kasian aceng tarif costumer 12500 driver dpt 5000 aplikasi 7500 seperti penjajah ekonomi
translated_review: Please don’t be like colonizers, pity Aceng, customer fare 12,500 driver gets 5,000, app takes 7,500, like economic colonizers.

review: maaf apakah ada yg mengalami kendala yg sama dg saya terkadang saya gak bs klik unt membuka chat dan telp dr gojek tidak berdering apakah krn gangguan sinyal atau bagaimana
translated_review: Sorry, does anyone experience the same problem as me? Sometimes I can’t click to open chat and call from Gojek doesn’t ring, is it signal interference or what?

review: sy pingin naik greb tapi tidak bisa mengisi daftar nya jadi tidak bisa pesengimana caranya
translated_review: I want to ride Grab but can’t register, how to fill the list so I can order?

review: kasihan driver cuma 8800saya beli bakso ongkirnya di apk 15200padahal jaraknya gk sampe 1kmgila nih gojek
translated_review: Pity the driver only gets 8,800, I buy meatball delivery fee on app 15,200 though distance less than 1 km, crazy Gojek.

review: tolong di perbaikin goride hemat nya selalu hilang terusan padahal sebelumnya ada terus pake goride hemat sangat membantu saya karena bukan sekali atau 2 kali saya pakai tapi selalu pulang kerja sangat menghemat ongkos saya jadi tolong perbaiki
translated_review: Please fix GoRide Hemat which keeps disappearing even though before it was always there, GoRide Hemat helps me a lot because not once or twice I use it but always after work it saves my cost, so please fix it.

review: terkadang dpt notifikasi dr gojek dh gajian ngeledek aj kerja jg kagak motr kagak
translated_review: Sometimes get notification from Gojek “already payday” mocking me working not riding motorbike.

review: terima kasih sudah menyediakan aplikasi ojol yang murah dan membantu serta tidak segan memberi voucher kepada pelanggannya semoga sukses selalu
translated_review: Thank you for providing affordable and helpful ojol app and not stingy giving vouchers to customers, wish success always.

review: selebihnya sih udh oke tp sebelnya pas hujan mau pesen makan lagi laper nya susah bgt dpt driver pdhal hujan nya udh reda
translated_review: Otherwise it’s okay but annoying when raining, want to order food but hard to get driver even though rain has stopped.

review: gojek tolong perbaiki lagi waktu login verifikasi wajah selalu gagal pencahayaanlahkurang teranglah nunggu berapa saat intinlah buat login aja ribet cocok bintang 1 dululah
translated_review: Gojek please fix face verification login, always fails, lighting not good, waiting too long, logging in is complicated, deserving 1 star for now.

review: hujan gak bisa dpt driver banyak yang nolak karena tidak ada mantol atau jas hujan sangat minim untuk driver
translated_review: In rain can’t get drivers, many reject because no raincoat or rain jacket, very minimal for drivers.

review: maaf lama dan sistemnya nganter penumpang dulu mahal tapi pelayanan tidak oke mahal ga papa asal cepat sdh lama mahal lagi
translated_review: Sorry slow and system prioritizes passenger delivery, expensive but service not good, expensive is okay if fast but it’s slow and expensive again.

review: driver banyak yg ga jujur 3x pesan harga semua dilebihkan saya bukan masalah nominal nya tpi kejujuran
translated_review: Many drivers are dishonest, 3 times prices were all inflated, it’s not about amount but honesty.

review: gw sangat kecewa dgn banyak nya driver gocar pd sombong di saat hujan deras mereka malah nolak rejeki klw lo gk mw narik matiin aja hp lo byutusan langit
translated_review: I am very disappointed with many GoCar drivers who are arrogant when heavy rain, they reject orders, if you don’t want to work just turn off your phone.

review: amang nya sabar nungguin pelangga beli ayam dulusehat buat pejuang rupiah di seluruh penjuru semoga bahu kalian selalu kuat dlm mencari nafkah yang halal nyetir nya pelan pak sopiranak istri slalu nunggu d rumah
translated_review: The driver patiently waits for customers buying chicken, stay healthy warriors of income everywhere, may your shoulders always be strong seeking halal earnings, drive slowly sir, your wife and children wait at home.

review: saya pesen gojek tapi gak kesini sampe saya ketinggalan kereta karena nungguin gocar nya saya bener bener rugi 1200juta
translated_review: I ordered Gojek but it never came so I missed my train waiting for GoCar, I lost 1.2 million rupiah.

review: sering dikasih gojek yang jauh banget dari tempat penjemputan padahal yang dekat rumah banyak driver gojek
translated_review: Often get Gojek drivers very far from pickup point though many Gojek drivers live nearby.

review: tolong tambahkan fitur blokir driversupaya menghindari driver yg bikin risih costumerjujur ingin sekali maxim menyediakan fitur ini supaya costumer apalagi yg anak sekolahan aman dan tidak mencemaskan orang tua di rumah terimakasih maxim
translated_review: Please add block driver feature to avoid drivers who bother customers, honestly I want Maxim to provide this feature so customers, especially school kids, feel safe and parents are not worried, thank you Maxim.

review: apk nya si bagus bgt tapi kadang sebel aja sama beberapa driver yg lemot bbrpa kali naik maxim bikin telat kerja dan juga untuk alamatnya blm lengkap
translated_review: The app is very good but sometimes annoying with some slow drivers, several times riding Maxim made me late for work and the address is still incomplete.

review: tidak dapat gojek susah area surabaya utara aplikasi sampah nunggu 1jam gak dapat2 limit di blokir aplikasi sampah
translated_review: Can’t get Gojek in North Surabaya area. Garbage app. Wait 1 hour no driver. Limit blocked. Garbage app.

review: kl pesen go car susah ga ada yg mau mau jarak jauh dekat berkali2 dicancel supirnya harga yg tentuin dr aplikasi discpun langsung terpasang otomatis males nunggunya lamaaaaaaaaaa
translated_review: When ordering GoCar it’s hard, no one wants to take orders, far or near repeatedly cancelled by drivers, prices set by app discount automatically applied, tired of waiting so long.

review: terima kasih buat abang maxim nya udh ramah sama penumpang udh mau nunggu juga jarang dapet ojol yg ramah seperti ini pokonya the best
translated_review: Thanks to Maxim drivers who are polite and willing to wait, rarely find friendly ojol like this, the best.

review: demiallah disaat butuh kayak gini bener2 driver nggk gerak sedih bngtt waktu deadline mepet juga sumpahh sakit hati bgttt
translated_review: Damn it, when I need it like this drivers don’t move, very sad, deadline is tight, really hurts.

review: bagus aslinya tapi drivernya sering cancel jadi kasihan yang dapat driver yang jemputnya dari jauh saran aja khusus driver yg cancel padahal dekat dr titik harus dikasih hukuman pengurangan rating sebesar 05 trs kalau rating dibintang 3 diperlama dpt penumpang
translated_review: Good actually but drivers often cancel, pity those who get drivers far away, suggestion for drivers who cancel even if close to pickup point, give punishment like 0.5 rating deduction, if rating below 3 stars longer to get passengers.

review: terimakasih selain gercep juga ramah baru pertama kali make jasa gojek online dan g salah milih maxim jadi aplikasi
translated_review: Thanks, besides fast also polite, first time using online Gojek service and didn’t choose wrong app Maxim is good.

review: sudah 2 kali pesan gocar alamat tujuan dari aplikasi tidak sesuai dengan yang saya pesan setelah saya edit alamat tujuannya ongkosnya naik lebih dari 2 kali lipat
translated_review: Already twice ordered GoCar but destination address from app not matching what I ordered, after editing destination fare increased more than double.

review: ko sy mau daftar dsru masukin lokasi tpi gk muncul muncul yah lokasi ny udah sy ketik tp blm muncul yg di bawahnya kya masih mencari lokasi trs pdhl klo buka yg lain jaringan aman2 aja
translated_review: I want to register but location input doesn’t show, I typed location but it doesn’t appear, still searching location below, though opening others network is fine.

review: gak lgi lagi deh pke grab care kata nya diskon pas datang aplikasinya minta di cansel trus harga nya beda sama di aplikasi
translated_review: Never again using GrabCar, said discount but when arrives app asks to cancel and price different from app.

review: saran buat aplikator gojek wilayah jawa timur sekitarnya harga gojek buat driver tidak manusiawi dan oderan estafet ke driver sangat lama penjemputan mohon di kaju ulang
translated_review: Suggestion for Gojek operators in East Java area, Gojek prices for drivers are inhumane and relay orders take very long pickup time, please reconsider.

review: pesen gocar berapa kali batal batal teruss pada kaga mau cari duit apa gimna sih
translated_review: Ordered GoCar many times cancelled repeatedly, don’t want to earn money or what?

review: aplikasi nya bagus tapi harga nya berubah berubah terus cuma berapa menit aja pas mau pesan harga nya udah naik lagi ga jelas tolong di perbaiki lagi gojek
translated_review: App is good but prices keep changing, only a few minutes then when ordering price goes up again, unclear, please fix Gojek.

review: aplikasi yg menyenangkan dan memudahkan untuk segala kebutuhan saya sangat senang dengan adanya gojek kapan dan di mana pun sangat membantu
translated_review: App is enjoyable and makes everything easier, very happy with Gojek anytime and anywhere very helpful.

review: driver harus di pilih2 yg baik2 akhlaknya barusan dpt ojol sdh marah 2 minta ongkir 2x lipat gilaaaa
translated_review: Drivers should be selective for good morals, just got an angry ojol who asked double delivery fee, crazy.

review: bajing terlalu lama nunggu nya gojek sialan kalau gak bisa ya minimal bisa di batalin tolol lama2 nunggu baru di bilang dk bisa dk ada driver ngapa tidak awal2
translated_review: Waiting too long for Gojek, damn it. If you can’t deliver, at least cancel early. Stupid to wait so long then say no driver.

review: tak edit reviewnya banyak promo grab car yang memang murah bgt tapi pas dipake sama driver tiba2 dibatalkan seenaknya atau dilempar2 tanpa konfirmasi
translated_review: Edit review, many cheap GrabCar promos but when used drivers suddenly cancel or throw orders without confirmation.

review: saya berlangganan maxim sudah ber tahun2 tapi saat ini tidak bisa update karena no hp hangusbagaimana caranya supaya bisa mengginakan jasa ojek maxim mohon infonya terimakasih
translated_review: I’ve been a Maxim subscriber for years but now can’t update because phone number expired, how to still use Maxim ojek service? Please info, thanks.

review: keren sih cuma sayang drivernya kurang banyak disaat yang lain kyak gojk dan grb ga mau nerima ini mau nerima pokoknya recommend lah
translated_review: Pretty cool, but the problem is there aren’t enough drivers. While other apps like Gojek and Grab won’t accept the order, this one does. So I recommend it.

review: tolong yach paylaternya diperbaiki saya sudah bayar itu tagihannya kenapa belum juga muncul notifikasi lunasnya error kok disaat mau limit jatuh tempo klo masih seperti ini aplikasi nya gojek saya tutup selamalamanya terimakasih
translated_review: Please fix PayLater, I already paid but bill still shows, no notification of paid, error when due date comes, if still like this I will uninstall Gojek forever, thanks.

review: terimakasih sudah menjadi bagian perjalanan dan kegiatan sy tingkatkan selalu pelayanan dan kesejahteraan pengemudi tuhan memberkati aamiin
translated_review: Thank you for being part of my journey and activities, improve service and driver welfare, God bless, amen.

review: drivernya tidak profesional karena harga gocar nya 6500 langsung minta dibatalkan dan menjadi alasan karena murah nya gocar jarak penjemputan nya jauh dan langsung minta di batalkan
translated_review: Drivers are unprofessional because GoCar price is 6,500, driver immediately asks to cancel saying pick up location is far, then wants to cancel.

review: gmn caranya login kembali ke akun yg logout hanya menggunakan nomor hp dikarenakan email yang lama sudah tidak aktif
translated_review: How to log in back to logged out account using only phone number because old email no longer active?

review: aplikasi ini sudah lama saya gunakan untuk pergi transportasi di sekitar jakarta harganya sangat ekonomis namun untuk map driver masih perlu ditingkatkan
translated_review: I’ve used this app for a long time to travel around Jakarta, prices very economical but driver maps still need improvement.

review: kalau bisa di kendaraan yg masih layak pake biar cepat ga ada keterlambatan sampai di tujuan juga di respon harus lebih cepat tanggapi trimakasih sukses slalu buat gojek
translated_review: If possible use vehicles still in good condition so no delays arriving at destination, also respond faster, thanks and success always Gojek.

review: bisa bisa nya akun saya di tangguhkan cok gua bukan driver tapi kenapa di tangguhkan akun saya
translated_review: My account was suspended, I am not a driver but why was my account suspended?

review: semenjak banyak pilihan opsi mobil banyak driver yg maen cancel2 aja jadi kalo pilihan go car yg biasa udah lama di cancel pula payah lah
translated_review: Since there are many car options, many drivers just keep canceling, so if you choose the usual Go-Car, it’s often canceled too, which is really frustrating.

review: gojek makin kesini makin kurang nyaman drivernya banyak yang kurang ramah terutama pas pesan gocar setiap pesan gocar xl malah dimarahin drivernya karna ada 6 orang padahal fitur xl untuk 46 orang maaf bgt gojek tolong diperhatikan lagi untuk sikap drivernya
translated_review: Gojek is getting less comfortable lately, many drivers are unfriendly, especially when ordering Go-Car XL; every time I order Go-Car XL, the driver gets angry because there are 6 people, even though the XL feature is for 4-6 people. Sorry, Gojek, please pay more attention to the drivers' attitude.

review: punya driver ajarin banyak map lah apa coba di tunggu 9 mnit jadi 30 mnit malah ambil jalan muter jauh yg beenr kau rekrut driver
translated_review: Some drivers give many instructions about the map, like waiting 9 minutes but it turns into 30 minutes, and then they take a long detour. Seriously, why do you recruit drivers like that?

review: tolong lah di update yg bener cari lokasi aja selalu ke arah sebaliknya cari driver berjam jam sampe di cancel mulu mendadak sama driver nya pelayanan nya buruk sekali aplikasi ini
translated_review: Please update properly — finding the location always leads to the opposite direction, waiting hours for a driver only to get canceled suddenly. The service is really bad in this app.

review: hati dengan oknum driver yg ga bener pengalaman saja tadi pagi saya dipaksa buat dianterin sampai rumah padahal saya hanya pesan sampai terminal saja tapi saya tetep tidak mau karena sudah takut drivernya ga sopan
translated_review: Beware of some dishonest drivers. Just this morning, I was forced to be taken home even though I only ordered a ride to the terminal. I refused because I was afraid the driver was rude.

review: argo tidak sesuai pemesanan awal 13 600 kenapa pas selesai trip malah jadi 20100 ga ngerti permainan dari driver apa emang permainan dari aplikasinya jujur aja dr awal drpda tipu kek gini kesian orangbyg bawa uangnya pas2an
translated_review: The fare meter doesn’t match the initial booking: it was supposed to be 13,600 IDR, but after the trip, it became 20,100 IDR. I don’t understand if this is a driver trick or the app’s trick. Honestly, it feels like cheating from the start. It’s unfortunate for people who bring just enough money.

review: akhir akhir ini harganya gak masuk akal mesen gojek buat ke kampus biasanya harganya normal ini tiba tiba naik sampe 2 kali lipat dibanding sama aplikasi sebelah harga ttp normal
translated_review: Recently, the prices are unreasonable. Ordering Gojek to go to campus used to be normal prices but suddenly doubled compared to other apps, which still have normal prices.

review: masak reviu akun spaylatter sudah lebih 6 bulan gelooo lu gojek mending hapus nih aplikasinggak guna banget
translated_review: Why does the SpayLater account review take over 6 months? It’s crazy, Gojek, better delete this app; it’s useless.

review: terima kasih sama cs dan timnya yang akhirnya saya bisa pindah ke device baru saya tolong pihak gojek harus naikkan gaji mereka karena mereka sudah membantu saya memindahkan akun saya ke device baru
translated_review: Thanks to customer service and the team who helped me move my account to a new device. Please Gojek, raise their salary because they really helped me.

review: alhamdulillah untuk saat ni selalu dapat driver yg baik dan ramah semoga selalu menjaga keselamatan penumpang nya aamiiiin allahumma aamiiiin
translated_review: Alhamdulillah, so far I always get kind and friendly drivers. I hope they always maintain passenger safety. Aamiin.

review: hadeh aplikasi sudah bagus saya pesan perjalanan klatakantanggul sempet di terima sm drivernya lalu 3 mnt setelahnya hilang mungkin di cancel dr drivernya males bgt klo uda begitu pdhl bayar ga gratis nama drivernya muhamad zaini kecewa aja si klo ada fitur cancel gt wkwk
translated_review: The app is good but when I ordered a trip from Klatak to Tanggul, the driver accepted, then after 3 minutes disappeared—maybe canceled. So annoying because I already paid and it’s not free. The driver’s name is Muhamad Zaini. Disappointed if there was a cancel feature. Haha.

review: aku sangat senang memakai gojek respon dan pelayanan customer sangat cepat dan tepat terima kasih gojek indonesia telah hadir untuk kamu
translated_review: I’m very happy using Gojek; the response and customer service are very fast and accurate. Thanks, Gojek Indonesia, for being here for us.

review: kenapa mau puasa malah gojek susah dan mahal banget biasanya 900010000 skrg jadi 40000 dikira semua org banyak duit tu bolak balik aja dah 80000 kau pikir la pake logika
translated_review: Why does it get hard and expensive during fasting month? Usually, the price is 9,000–10,000 IDR, now it’s 40,000. You’d think everyone has lots of money. Back and forth it’s 80,000 IDR. Use some logic, please.

review: yang bener lah bikin repot doangjaringan full terusan bilang jaringan hilang dh gtu lola lagi makin kesini makin gaje aja gojek
translated_review: Seriously, it’s just troublesome. Network full, then it says network lost, then lags again. Gojek is getting worse and worse.

review: drivernya pada kaga jelas dan lelet juga masa gua udah sesusai titik di bilang nggak sesuai padahal udah berdiri di titik gua
translated_review: The drivers are unclear and slow. I was already at the location but told it was wrong, even though I stood exactly at the point.

review: makin kesini makin jelek saya sering tlat gara kata driver grab map gk akurat tlong dprbaiki tau balikin lagi google map biar costumer gk pindah ke apk se belah
translated_review: It’s getting worse. I’m often late because Grab’s map is inaccurate. Please fix it or bring back Google Maps so customers don’t switch to the other app.

review: ini emailku kok udh kedaftar gojekmau buka akun tapi lupa pakai nomer yg manapemulihan akun tetep gbisatrus caranya gmn
translated_review: This is my email; I already registered on Gojek but forgot which number I used. Account recovery still can’t be done. How do I proceed?

review: kapok aku pke grab baru kali ini aku di bikin kapok gak dpt driver haruss cancel gak customer yg hrus nunggu 2jam bhkan bisa lebih bikin kapok tahun tahunan pake aplikasi ini baru kali ini aku di bikin bener2 emosi
translated_review: I’m fed up with Grab. This is the first time I’ve been made frustrated—no drivers available, forced cancellations, and customers have to wait 2 hours or more. After years using the app, this is the first time I’m really angry.

review: titik dalam map harap di update dari segi titik maps indrive masih jauh lebih bagus kasih fiture foto dalam chat untuk memudahkan konsomen dan driver
translated_review: Please update the map points; Indrive’s map points are much better. Please add a photo feature in chat to help customers and drivers.

review: terimakasih untuk yang buat aplikasi maxim yang sangat membantu para orangorang yang sudah cari transportasi tapi tolonglah untuk kedepan aplikasi kalau ada pelanggan mau daftar atau mau pakai jasa maxim tolong di sertakan foto terimakasih
translated_review: Thanks to the Maxim app creators who really help people find transportation. But please, for the future, if customers want to register or use Maxim’s services, include photos. Thanks.

review: sangat membantu ketika kita butuh waktu cepat dan keadaan mendadak dan sangat membantu pendapatan ekonomi sebagai mintra kerja gojek untuk drivernya
translated_review: Very helpful when we need quick service in an emergency and it helps driver partners economically.

review: alhamdulilah selama menggunakan drive dari maxim sy mrasa puas syukran zakalahu namun sayang link blm bs di simpan sperti scara automact
translated_review: Alhamdulillah, I am satisfied using Maxim drivers. Syukran zakalahu. However, unfortunately, the link can’t be saved automatically yet.

review: ok bangeetttmembantutp terkadang ada jg driver yg sdh dipickup tp ngk bertanggung jawabmalah minta dibatalkansangsi tegas seperti itungk niat dan bikin jelek nama driver yg mmng bagus kinerja kerjanyasemngaatt dan sukses sllu gojek
translated_review: Very helpful! Sometimes drivers who’ve been picked up are irresponsible and ask to cancel. There should be strict sanctions to avoid bad intentions and ruining the reputation of drivers who work well. Keep up the spirit and success, Gojek!

review: sangat membantu semoga makin baik lagi untuk gocar tolong dicarikan driver yg dekat kl jauh suka lama nunggu dan kad ang drivernya minta di cancel
translated_review: Very helpful. Hopefully, Gocar will improve. Please find drivers nearby because if it’s far, we wait long, and sometimes drivers ask to cancel.

review: tolong untuk pelanggan yang memakai jasa maxim harap dilakukan verifikasi ktp terlebih dahulu karena sudah banyak penipuan kasihan para para driver maxim
translated_review: Please verify ID cards for customers who use Maxim services because there are many scams. It’s unfortunate for Maxim drivers.

review: driver sekarang banyak yg minta parkir di karenakan yg di dapat cuma 5rb sedangkan pembeli bayar 14rbsangat di sayangkan
translated_review: Many drivers now ask for parking money because they only get 5,000 IDR while customers pay 14,000 IDR. Very disappointing.

review: alhamdulillah selalu membantu saat membutuhkan transportasi kapan saja di perlukan semakin banyak inovasi untuk kenyamanan penumpang nya sangat membantu
translated_review: Alhamdulillah, always helpful when I need transportation anytime. Keep innovating to improve passenger comfort.

review: tolong di cross cek driver atas nama novriza ramadhani argata motorcycle bewarna merah nopol h4533yq rating di apk 42 tolong dia sudah mengancam dan memeras saya saya ada bukti chatnya kejadian 23 februari 2025 sekitar pukul 2200 wib
translated_review: Please cross-check the driver named Novriza Ramadhani Argata, a red motorcycle with license plate H4533YQ, rating 4.2 in the app. He threatened and extorted me. I have chat proof. Incident happened on February 23, 2025, around 22:00 WIB.

review: cari driver skrg susah cocok dikasi bintang segini driver pilih kasih semua mending pindah ke sebelah aja
translated_review: Finding drivers now is hard. Good luck giving these drivers stars. They play favorites. Better to switch to another app.

review: bintang yg berbicara dulu saya pernah tibatiba dapat voucher dari gojek senilai rp 1000000 untuk 10x perjalanan langsung masuk ke akun gojek saya
translated_review: About the stars—once I suddenly got a Gojek voucher worth 1,000,000 IDR for 10 trips, directly credited to my account.

review: aplikasisi hanya untung untuk yg punya aplikasitapi abang ojeknya tsk dpat seberapa makanya saya lebih milih maxm daripada akun gojekcuma mikirin buat yg pnya aplikasi buat apa
translated_review: This app only profits the owners, but the drivers don’t get much. That’s why I prefer Maxim over Gojek because Gojek only thinks about the owners, what for?

review: drivernya ga jelas sudah nunggu lama malah dicancle lebih diperbaiki drivernya kalau tidak mumpuni tolong dipecat saja
translated_review: Driver unclear, waited long then canceled. Please improve or fire drivers who aren’t competent.

review: gojek tolong perbaiki dong saya heran banget saya udah cancel ojek malah dikasih makin jauh lokasinya kan heran orang mau kemana mana gak bisa ngendelin gojek
translated_review: Gojek please fix this. I’m very confused—when I cancel a ride, they assign me a driver far away. It’s frustrating; people want to go somewhere but can’t control the app.

review: ini apk bikin para ojol jd gak bisa makan karena kena suspend 1 minggu pdhl numpang nedung hade
translated_review: This app makes ojol (motorcycle taxi drivers) unable to earn because of a one-week suspension, even though they only asked to rest. So frustrating.

review: tolong driver grab untuk diedukasi terkait tarif krna ngeluh trs n menjebak penumpang mnta tambhan ongkos 20ribu n ketika sudah jalan minta dimatikan aplikasi untuk dibayar tunai atau tf langsung ke driver
translated_review: Please educate Grab drivers about fares because they keep complaining and tricking passengers by asking for extra 20,000 IDR and when on the way, they ask to turn off the app and pay cash or transfer directly.

review: pelayanan aplikasi nya buruk bgt selalu dicariin driver dari titik yg sangat jauh padahal dket titik jemput banyak tolong deh di bnerin lagi kinerjanya jgn ky orang amatiran baru kemarin bikin aplikasi deh
translated_review: The app service is really bad; always assigning drivers from very far points even though there are many nearby. Please fix the performance, don’t act like amateurs who just made an app yesterday.

review: aplikasinya bagus ada promo yang buat jadi lebih murah bagi pengguna baru jadinya gojek lebih nyaman dan seru
translated_review: The app is good; promos make it cheaper for new users, so Gojek is more comfortable and fun.

review: trimakasih terbantu banget dgn driver maxim semoga pelayanan maxim semakin hari semakin baik driver juga ramah dan bersih
translated_review: Thanks a lot to Maxim drivers. Hopefully, Maxim’s service gets better day by day, and drivers stay polite and clean.

review: kasian driver nya pendapatan nya kecil buat 1kali trip nya tapi ongkos dari aplikasi nya mahal ditambah maps nya kadang eror ya yang paling penting ongkos yng keterima driver beda jauh sama ongkos dari apk gojek nya
translated_review: Poor drivers, small income per trip but the app fare is expensive. Also the map sometimes errors. The fare the driver gets is very different from the fare on Gojek’s app.

review: kenapa harus ada verifikasi muka orang tua saya sudah meninggal gimana mau verifikasi muka ya padahal masih ada sisa uang di gojek
translated_review: Why is there a face verification for my deceased parent? How can I verify a face? I still have money left in Gojek.

review: sampai hari ini gojek is the best for mesya sudah pakai gojek sejak tahun 2015 tp sya masih simpan 1 bintang lg karena saya ga dikasih fasilitas pinjam paylater sedangkan yg baru pakai bbrp bulan langsung dikasih kecewa saya kenapa demikian bagaimana penilaiannya
translated_review: Until today, Gojek is the best for me. I have used Gojek since 2015 but still gave 1 star because I’m not given a paylater loan facility, while new users get it after a few months. I’m disappointed. What’s the evaluation based on?

review: buat driver kalo mau narik sediain dulu kembalian jangan nyusahin udah mah gamau nukerin malah diem
translated_review: To drivers: if you want to work, prepare change first. Don’t make it difficult. If you don’t want to exchange money, just stay silent.

review: aplikasi overall bagus selama dari sma kls 2 sampe kuliah smstr 6 pelayanan selalu memuaskan driver sangat terlatih
translated_review: Overall the app is good. From high school grade 2 to university semester 6, the service has always been satisfying, and drivers are well trained.

review: kesel banget kalo nyari driver ngga dapet bisa sampe satu jam lebih ngga dapet padahal posisi di jakarta kota dan bukan jam sibuk kerja
translated_review: So frustrated when looking for a driver but can’t get one for over an hour even in Jakarta city and not during rush hour.

review: kecewa banget sumpah gak mau lagi pakek nih apk nunggu driver nya lama padahal udah pake prioritas masih aja nunggu lama
translated_review: Very disappointed, swear I won’t use this app again. The wait for drivers is long, even with priority, still waiting too long.

review: susah bgt cari driver dibanding grab bnr bnr ga dapet sama sekali kalo grab aku peaen lgsg ada driver yang mau ambil
translated_review: Very hard to find drivers compared to Grab, seriously none available, but on Grab I immediately get a driver.

review: susah cari driver gojek kebanyakan kasih promo murah tapi percuma gada yang maj ambil mending jangan pake gojek pake aja maxim
translated_review: Hard to find Gojek drivers. Many give cheap promos but no one accepts. Better don’t use Gojek, use Maxim instead.

review: driver nya payah payah mahal doanghujan hujan ga ada yang ngambil padahal udah nyalain pencarian cepat mendingan aplikasi kuning udah murah langsung diambil lagi
translated_review: The drivers are bad and expensive. In rain, no one takes orders, even though fast search is on. Better to use the yellow app (Grab), cheap and accepted immediately.

review: maaf saya kasih bintang 3 karena saya jarang dapat diskon promo grabbike dan maps driver kadang error jd driver putar arah agak jauh dari titik tempat tujuan
translated_review: Sorry, I give 3 stars because I rarely get discount promos from GrabBike and sometimes driver maps have errors causing detours.

review: aplikasi ngaco saya ingin cepat berangkat dapat driver jauh jauh terus lokasi nya sudah beberapa kali pesan cancel pesan cancel ngaco
translated_review: The app is messed up. I want to leave quickly but keep getting faraway drivers. I’ve ordered several times, and all got canceled.

review: makin lama makin kurang ajar aja driver sekarang padahal dah dekat dari jarak dicancel mulu padahal lagi darurat dan milih prioritas tolong min hapus tombol cancel untuk driver atau rating jelek driver yang ngecancel
translated_review: Drivers are getting more rude lately, even when close, they keep canceling. I was in an emergency and chose priority. Please remove the cancel button for drivers or give bad ratings to those who cancel.

review: tolong di perbaiki systymnya sangat merugikan mitra driver dengan map yang suka salah dan penghitungan argo sangat murah sekali
translated_review: Please fix the system. It’s very detrimental to driver partners with faulty maps and very low fare calculation.

review: tolong grab klo blm selesai ama satu penumpang jangan nerima penumpang yang lain lama di tungguin soal ny
translated_review: Please, Grab, if you haven’t finished with one passenger, don’t accept another passenger because we have to wait a long time.

review: aku pesen gojek biasa bukan yg hemat tetep aj dpt motornya yg supra jelek padahal bayar nya loh udh mahal hadeh gimn ini
translated_review: I ordered regular Gojek, not economy, but still got a Supra motorcycle which is old even though I paid more. What’s going on?

review: cuaca lagi hujan cari grab malah makin tinggi harganyamana dapetnya lama banget giliran udah dapet drivernyamalah kejauhan bilangnya mapsnya salah parah banget sihmana lagi urgent tolong ya grab perbaiki
translated_review: It’s raining, Grab prices go up, and drivers are hard to get. When I get a driver, they say the map is wrong and far away. It’s really bad, especially when urgent. Please fix Grab.

review: sudah oke cuma sering dapet ojeknya kejauhan 79 menitan kan ngga selalu pergi jauh pergi cm 6 menit dpt ojeknya 68 mnitan nunggu klo urgent jd ngecansel
translated_review: It’s okay but often drivers are too far away—79 minutes sometimes for just a 6-minute ride. If urgent, I cancel.

review: aplikasi bodoh harga emang menentukan kualitas logika nya kalau driver dapat argo rendah yah pasti pelayanan kacau wajar sih mending aplikasi sebelah deh lebih mahal sedikit tapi pelayanan top
translated_review: The app is dumb. Price determines quality. If the driver gets a low fare, service is chaotic. Understandable. Better use another app even if it’s slightly more expensive but with top service.

review: malam paman gojek mau tanya soal akun syaa driver sampai dunia skrng tidak kunjung aktif dri tahun 2014 sampai skrng tdk aktif jga
translated_review: Good evening, uncle Gojek. I want to ask about my account. My driver account has never been active since 2014 until now.

review: aplikasi udah bener sopir grab car nya sering gak bener kebiasaan malak mohon grab memberikan teguran kepada sopir sopir yg seperti itu
translated_review: The app is good but Grab car drivers often misbehave and are extortionists. Please give warnings to drivers like that.

review: sangat tidak worth it masa iya sudah siang driver nya tidak ada kembalian uang dan ada yang tidak menggunakan seragam maxim saya kecewa sudah berkali kali kena di maxim ini
translated_review: Very not worth it. It’s noon but drivers don’t have change and some don’t wear Maxim uniforms. I’m disappointed after many times using Maxim.

review: sedikit kecewa sih pengalaman saya ada grabcar hemat lumayan tuh diskonnya tapi pelayanannya kurang memuaskan tolong dong pelayanannya di tingkatkan lagi pernah di bilang tidak enak sama drivernya di bilang minus lah rugi tapi kenapa di adain grab car hemat grab bike hemat
translated_review: A bit disappointed with my experience. GrabCar economy had decent discounts but poor service. Drivers said rude things and were uncooperative. Why have GrabCar and GrabBike economy if the service is bad?

review: ttp sy ksh tp saran klo hujan jgn susah ya krna hujan grabcar itu sangat di butuhkan
translated_review: I’m still giving a rating, but just a suggestion: during rain, don’t make it difficult. GrabCar is very needed in the rain.

review: saranku ada alasan pengemudi meminta cancel klw ada pecancelan atau fitur blokir driver deh muak 3 hari berturutturut di org yg sama minta cancel terus
translated_review: My suggestion: There should be reasons given when drivers request cancellations. Also, there should be a block feature for drivers because I’m fed up with the same driver canceling for 3 days in a row.

review: pencarian alamat cuman ada peta opsi satelitnya sudah hilang alamat di peta juga ngaco tolong di perbaiki
translated_review: The address search only shows map, the satellite option is gone. The address on the map is messed up. Please fix it.

review: mau ganti email doang berapa kali dicoba ga bisa2 gada solusi dan lain lain gojek kontoll
translated_review: I just want to change my email but no matter how many times I try, it doesn’t work. No solution. Gojek, you're so annoying.

review: pengemudi septian hadi dengan daihatsu sigra warna coklat tua nopol bp1706ci selamat menikmati perjalanan anda rating 495
translated_review: Driver Septian Hadi with dark brown Daihatsu Sigra license plate BP1706CI. Enjoy your trip. Rating 4.95.

review: depan kantor aja pendaftaran driver ditutup ternyata eh ternyata tetep aja masih buka pendaftaran dengan alasan opang grab vip dll kantor jangan hanya mau di perhatikan tapi driver jga sebagai mitra harus di perhatikan udah tarif nya murah suspend pm tanpa pemberitahuan kepada driver
translated_review: Even in front of the office, driver registration is closed but still open for “opang,” “grab vip,” etc. Offices shouldn’t just want attention but also care for drivers as partners. The fare is cheap, drivers get suspended without notification.

review: cepat dan mantap proses nya driver nya juga bersahabat hanya kurang promo nya aja nih dari pihak gojeg nya
translated_review: Fast and smooth process. Drivers are friendly. Just lack promotions from Gojek.

review: pelayanan gocar makin buruk pesen gocar banyak drivernya gak respon kadang malah mnjauh dr lokasi tp gk mau cancel tolong aplikasi gojek aware sm driver2 kyk gini sangat mengecewakan
translated_review: Gocar’s service is getting worse. I order, and many drivers don't respond. Some even drive away but won’t cancel. Gojek, please address these kinds of drivers — it’s very disappointing.

review: sudah bagus tampilan aplikasinya tapi ada baiknya di tingkatkan terutama pemberitahuan rute perjalanan agar mudah dilihat
translated_review: The app appearance is good, but it would be better if the trip route notification is improved to be easy to see.

review: aplikasi yang selalu menindas drivernya ga jelas banget kasian drivernya cs bayar 19rb driver cuman dapet 9rb duh karepmu piye cs di peras kok driver malah tambah sengasara
translated_review: The app always oppresses drivers unfairly. Poor drivers only get 9,000 IDR out of 19,000 IDR paid by customer. How do you expect drivers to survive? Customer service squeezes drivers causing them to suffer more.

review: pesen gojek lama banget gila padahal gojeknya di sekeliling banyak banget tapi ngak ada yang mau ambil aneh
translated_review: Ordering Gojek takes so long. There are many Gojek drivers around but none want to pick up. Weird.

review: gara salah satu driver kalian saya sampe uninstall dan beri bintang 1 buat aplikasi ini bener tersinggung kecewa
translated_review: Because of one of your drivers, I uninstalled and gave 1 star to this app. I was really offended and disappointed.

review: pengemudi khofifatus sholihah dengan motorcycle warna putih nopol s3878or selamat menikmati perjalanan anda rating 400 pengemudi khofifatus sholihah dengan motorcycle warna putih nopol s3878or selamat menikmati perjalanan anda rating 400
translated_review: Driver Khofifatus Sholihah with a white motorcycle license plate S3878OR, enjoy your trip, rating 4.00.

review: kocak apl ngaco milih tempat tujuan aja susah banget harus milih di peta di cari gabisa
translated_review: The app is ridiculous, choosing destination is so hard; must choose on the map but can’t find the location.

review: aplikatornya merugikan konsumen dan driver fokusnya sekarang bukan lagi pelayanan biaya terus dinaikkan tanpa diimbangi peningkatan pelayanan
translated_review: The app harms consumers and drivers. The focus is no longer on service; fees keep increasing without service improvement.

review: dulu sempet hapus gojek sekarang setelah download gojek susah masuk karena harus verifikasi wajah udah nyoba banyak kali tetep gabisa soalnya dulu waktu hapus gojek belum verifikasi wajah minta tolong ya karena saya mau pake gojek secepatnya
translated_review: I once deleted Gojek, but now after reinstalling, I can’t log in because of face verification. I tried many times but failed. Before deleting, there was no face verification. Please help, I want to use Gojek ASAP.

review: dah capek pakai gojek ga komitmen di cancel ga bisa malah nunggu lamaa juga ujungnya selalu susah driverteralhir pakai app gojek
translated_review: I’m tired of using Gojek. No commitment, always canceled, long waiting times, and always hard to find a driver.

review: trauma pake grab masa penumpang gatau jalan dimarah marahin ngejalaninnya ngebut gimana sih kecewa berat padahal udah percaya pake grab tapi malah dibuat kecewa
translated_review: Traumatized using Grab. Passengers don’t know the way and get yelled at. Drivers drive recklessly. Really disappointed, I trusted Grab but ended up disappointed.

review: tolong mapsnyaa dipermudah min kadang aga susah search alamat sedik berat juga kita drag maps dan buka fitur foto di room chat agar memudahkan customer memberikan informasi kepada driver
translated_review: Please simplify the maps feature. Sometimes it’s hard to search addresses, dragging maps is heavy, and please add photo features in chat rooms to make it easier for customers to give information to drivers.

review: aplikasi sialan cari driver susah di cancel terus padahal jemputnya orang sakit parah gak ada fitur ngelaporin driver yg cancel apa
translated_review: Damn app, hard to find a driver, keeps canceling even though the pickup is for someone seriously sick, no feature to report drivers who cancel.

review: dengan adanya aplikasi gojek inii sangaaaat membantuu urusaan sayaa seneng bgt ih kadang promonya suka ga ngotak wkwkwkw
translated_review: With this Gojek app, it really helps my affairs, I’m very happy, sometimes the promos don’t make sense lol.

review: hallo grabb saya pengguna setia grabb kenapa sekarang grabb jadi lelet memakan waktu dan loadingnya bener2 lama itu sangat menjengkelkan dan saya beberapakali pesen grabb car xl tapi mobil yang dateng hanya untuk 3 penumpang bagaimana ini grabb
translated_review: Hello Grab, I am a loyal Grab user, why is Grab slow now, takes a long time and loading is really long, it’s very annoying, and I ordered Grab Car XL several times but the car that came was only for 3 passengers, what’s going on Grab?

review: cari driver susah ngga bisa cepat kaya dulu sistem semakin aneh it terlalu pintar jadi sulit cari driver
translated_review: Hard to find driver, not as fast as before, the system is getting weirder, it’s too smart so it’s hard to find drivers.

review: grab skrg lemot lelet ga cpt respon kaya dulu mau cancel krn salah tujuan jg loading lama banget keburu drivernya datang
translated_review: Grab is slow now, slow response like before, when I want to cancel because of wrong destination, loading takes too long, the driver arrives too fast.

review: untuk driver nya datang lumayan cepat cuman untuk maps yg jalan seperti kampus yang masuk ke gang atau gang g bs di jangkau tolong perbanyak maps nya
translated_review: The driver arrives quite fast but the map shows roads like campus areas that lead to alleys or alleys that can’t be reached, please improve the maps.

review: tolong tertibin driver driver tidak ramah dan mengecewakan biar nyaman untuk pengguna saya kapok pakai gojek lagi makasih
translated_review: Please organize the drivers, they are unfriendly and disappointing, to make users comfortable, I’m done using Gojek, thanks.

review: gojek tolong dong aplikasi diperbaharui kenapa mapnya selalu berubah2 tdk sesuai titik yg di tujuerror mulu
translated_review: Gojek please update the app, why does the map always change and doesn’t match the intended point, keeps erroring.

review: susah skrg gojek ga ada promo psn di grab saja padahal sdh beberapa thn pakai gojek uninstall saja dulu
translated_review: Hard now, Gojek has no promos, order on Grab instead, even though I have used Gojek for years, uninstalling first.

review: saya bayar ongkir mahal tapi ke driver keterimanya kecil kasian buat driver tolong di perbaiki buat ongkir driver biar konsumen masih bertahan bersama grab
translated_review: I pay expensive shipping but drivers get very little, feel sorry for the drivers, please fix the driver shipping fee so customers stay with Grab.

review: argonya murah dan terjangkau drivernya baik2 bgt bersih dan rapih driver maxim bisa tau lokasi saya padahl saya di stasiun banyak orang
translated_review: The fare is cheap and affordable, drivers are very nice, clean and neat, Maxim drivers can find my location even though I’m at a crowded station.

review: banyak diskon dan promo menarik yang cocok di saku pelajarmahasiswa saya sangat terbantu menuju lokasi magang terima kasih gojek
translated_review: Many discounts and interesting promos suitable for students, it really helps me get to my internship location, thank you Gojek.

review: aplikasi mantap krna aplikasi ini transportasi ku jdi lbih mudahtrima ksih saya ucapkan kpd pihak maxim
translated_review: Great app because this app makes my transportation easier, thanks I say to Maxim.

review: saya pesan ojek 1830 tapi kok dapet ojek yg 5km lebih jaraknya waktu tempuh seharusnya cuman 1015 menit jadi 40mnt 1 jam padahal banyak ojek yg jarak dari saya cuman 500 meter telat masuk kelas saya nya gara2 ini
translated_review: I ordered ojek at 18:30 but got an ojek 5 km away, travel time should be only 10-15 minutes but took 40 minutes to 1 hour, many ojeks are only 500 meters away, I was late for class because of this.

review: sangat membantu dan akurat cuman sayangnya suka ada driver yang pilih pilih jarak kalau yang dekat mereka suka minta cancle karena perhitungan ongkos padahal pelanggan juga ngerti dan suka ngasih tambahan ongkos karena merasa terbantu
translated_review: Very helpful and accurate, but unfortunately some drivers are picky about distance, if it’s close they often ask to cancel because of fare calculation, though customers understand and often give extra fare because they feel helped.

review: udah bagus sih cuman masih aja ada lag pas aksesnya lama banget pas nyari tempat di maps nya kayak nggak smoothlancar gitu benering dong min
translated_review: Already good but there’s still lag, takes very long to access, searching for place on the map is not smooth, please fix it admin.

review: teu guna pisan stiap kali psen gojek lama nunggu udah mah harga mahal mending harga mahal cepet dpet yah ini mah harus nunggu lama smpe ksiangan
translated_review: Completely useless, every time I order Gojek it takes long to wait, price is expensive, better expensive but fast, this one must wait a long time until late.

review: saya pesan grab plus beberapa x dapat y taxi bb saya ingin y mobil pribadi bkn taxi bb lama lama pindah pakai gojek yg jelas bkn kaya grab mengecewakan sistem grab
translated_review: I ordered Grab Plus several times but got taxi BB, I want private car not taxi BB, eventually switched to Gojek which is clearer, Grab system is disappointing.

review: aplikasi ini sangat baiktapi yang bikin jelek itu drive yang cara bicaranya tidak sopan dan tidak pantas untuk di dengaringin rasanya berhenti gunakan apalikasi initapi tidak semua driver yang gituini untuk beberapa driver saja
translated_review: This app is great, but what ruins it are the drivers who talk rudely and inappropriately. Makes me want to stop using the app. Not all drivers are like that, though — just a few.

review: pelanggan yang terhormat oleh karna penjemputan goride terutama di jam sibuk blast nya terlalu jauh di mohon para pelanggan bawa motor masing masing dengan harapan pelanggan tidak telat sampai lokasi tujuan
translated_review: Dear customers, due to GoRide pick up especially at rush hour blast is too far, please bring your own motorbike so you won’t be late to destination.

review: gojek ini seperti nya ingin memeras rakyat indonesia banyak pengeluhan para driver semoge pemerintahan secepat nya melakukan pengecekan kepasar aplikasi gojek
translated_review: This Gojek seems to want to squeeze Indonesian people, many complaints from drivers, hope the government quickly checks the Gojek market app.

review: tolong dihimbau utk para pengemudi gocar jgn merokok di dalam mobil karena bau assp rokok msh tertinggal dan itu sangat mengganggu
translated_review: Please advise Gocar drivers not to smoke inside the car because cigarette smell remains and it’s very disturbing.

review: alhamdulillah mo butuh sesuatu tinggal gojekin aja mereka on time dan baik semoga allah ganti lebih perjuangan mereka mencari nafkah
translated_review: Thank God if I need something just Gojek it, they are on time and nice, may God repay their efforts in earning a living.

review: harganya jadi naik 2 lipat ngak seperti biasanya fitur grabbike hemat menghilang secara tiba tiba begitu saja
translated_review: Prices have doubled, not like usual, the Grabbike budget feature disappeared suddenly like that.

review: tolong di perbaiki lagi dengan kondisi yang sekarang banyak driver yang susah makan dan penghasilan turun sampai rela tidur di jalan miris banget denger keluh kesah para driver gojek semoga ada kebijakan dengan kondisi sprti ini tidak manusiawi
translated_review: Please fix again, now many drivers have trouble eating and income drops, even sleep on the street, very sad to hear drivers’ complaints, hope there’s a policy for this inhumane condition.
