review: tolong fitur pencarian drivernya segera diperbaiki setiap kali memesan selalu saja dapat driver yang lokasinya terlampau jauh padahal dilokasi pemesanan banyak sekali driver yang lebih dekat tapi selalu saja malah dapet driver yang kejauhan
translated_review: Please fix the driver search feature immediately, every time I order I always get drivers located too far away, even though there are many closer drivers at the ordering location but I always get the far one.

review: kebiasaan banget ini gojek tiap bru ujan selalu susah cari driver berkali ga dapet mana lamaaaaa bangettt pdhl ujan aja ga besar amat dan ud berenti beginiii bagian dapet driver jauhhh
translated_review: It’s a habit for Gojek that whenever it rains it’s hard to find drivers, many times I got none, takes too long even though rain isn’t heavy and has stopped, then got a far driver.

review: sudah 45 menit saya mesan gocar semuanya tidak bergerak mobilnya saya kehujanan mau bekerja apa memang drivernya begitu tolong di pantau
translated_review: I’ve been ordering Gocar for 45 minutes, none moved, got caught in rain, want to work or drivers really like this, please monitor.

review: 2018 sama sekali gapernah menggunakan gojek 2024 full pengguna gojek tapi kecewa jarang ada promo yg good deal
translated_review: 2018 never used Gojek, 2024 full user, but disappointed, rarely good promo deals.

review: 2 bulan ini berat banget apk nya bkin ngelag hp yg ram 4gb ini apk ojek online apa yutub sih setiap buka kok malah otomatus mutar video ga jelas bikin berat
translated_review: For 2 months the app is very heavy, lagging my 4GB RAM phone, is this an online ojek app or YouTube? Every time opened it automatically plays unclear video making it heavy.

review: aplikasi scam beli gojek plus biar dapet promo potongan udah diperpanjang malah ga ada promo sama sekali
translated_review: Scam app, buy Gojek Plus to get promo discount, already extended but no promo at all.

review: kenapa driver tuh sekarang emosian terus minta tip juga padahal tanpa minta bakal gue kasih tapi kalo minta kek ga iklas aja saya mana tau bayarnya murah goceng doang ngomel nya ke costumer hadehhh mls pake gojek
translated_review: Why are drivers so emotional now and ask for tips, even though I would give without asking, but if they ask it feels not sincere, how do I know the pay is cheap, just five thousand, complaining to customer, ugh lazy to use Gojek.

review: hp saya menggunakan pembaca layar entah kenapa sampai sekarang belum akses untuk mengangkat menerima telepon dari driver gojek hari ini saya menyesal telah mengecewakan 2 driver motor gojek karena persoalan tersebut
translated_review: My phone uses screen reader but until now can’t access to answer calls from Gojek drivers, today I regret disappointing 2 Gojek drivers because of this.

review: ni aplikasi tololl banget dahhh mau cancel di persulit ga jelas bet nungguin sampe hampir 3 jam ga ada driver ga jelas banget cok
translated_review: This app is stupid, cancelling is complicated, unclear, waited almost 3 hours no driver, very unclear damn.

review: tolong dong untuk penyedia aplikasi dibenahi maps yg di aplikasi nya biar user dan driver tidak kebingungan masa maps nya diputerin puterin pdahal bisa pakai jalan yang umum dilewati orangorang
translated_review: Please fix the maps on the app so users and drivers won’t be confused, why spin the maps around when it could use roads commonly passed by people.

review: suami saya pakai gojek alamat tujuan masih jauh alasan gojeknya gak pernah nganter ke stasiun leles malah di turunin di pasar leles yang jaraknya masih jauh ke stasiun masa driver gak bisa baca maps masih tanya2 ke penumpang
translated_review: My husband uses Gojek but destination is still far, Gojek never delivers to Leles station, instead drops at Leles market which is far from station, how can drivers not read maps still ask passengers.

review: banyak penyusup hati hati banyak juga yang nipu saya udah 2 kali soal e tetep grabgojek pemenangya ada harga ada kualitas pelayanan juga
translated_review: Beware of infiltrators, many scams too, I’ve been scammed twice, still GrabGojek wins, you get what you pay for, quality service too.

review: drivernya bad attitude minta harga lebih dr aplikasinya dengan alasan sudah tidak ada promo padahal di aplikasi tercantum harga yang berbeda dengan yang di minta driver
translated_review: Drivers have bad attitudes, ask for more money than the app price because there’s no promo, but the app shows a different price than what the driver asks.

review: aplikasi anjink paylater gua diblokir emang bbbbiiiii padahal sudah gua lunasi gua berdoa semoga bangkrut lo gojek antek antek
translated_review: This damn paylater app got blocked, damn, even though I have paid it off, I pray Gojek goes bankrupt, bastards.

review: gojek bulan februari ini mhal bgt bgt bgt pdhl jrak dekat baget go ride maupun gocar mhal g sesuai jarak ada voucheer jg buat krtu bsi g ada bca
translated_review: This February Gojek is very expensive, even short distance, Go Ride or Gocar expensive, no voucher for BSI card or BCA.

review: driver sangat ramah dan sangat sopan tapi di profil perempuan tapi actualnya laki tapi yg penting jujur dan target tepat sasaran
translated_review: Drivers very friendly and polite but profile says female but actually male, but important honest and target accurate.

review: sejauh ini masih aman driver juga pada santai ui aplikasi ramah bagi pengguna baru pokoknya best deh cuma minta dikembangkan terus saja sesuai kebutuhan konsumen
translated_review: So far still safe, drivers relaxed, UI friendly for new users, basically the best, just needs constant development according to consumer needs.

review: sangat membantu perjalanan kamipengemudi ramah tau jalan jadi customer merasa nyamanterima kasih hati2 dalam berkendara ya kak semangat
translated_review: Very helpful for my trips, drivers are friendly, know the roads, customers feel comfortable, thanks, drive carefully, keep spirit up.

review: sengaja ngasih bintang lima biar d bacaaplikasi pembohongpromo nya dapat kompensasi 10000 bila driver terlambat jemputini udh tiga hari kompensasinya ga masuk2padahal telatnya aj sampe jam
translated_review: Intentionally giving five stars to get read, the app is a liar, promos say get 10,000 compensation if driver is late picking up, it’s been three days no compensation though the delay was hours.

review: makin kesini grab makin gjls mesen grab segitu banyak nya grab gaada yg ngambil lebih baik ojek pangkalan meskipun mahal satset
translated_review: Grab is getting worse, ordered Grab so many times no one picks up, better use local ojek even if expensive, fast.

review: saya kecewa tolong kasih sanksi bagi driver yg di hubungi susah menjauhi lokasi saat sudah dekat menghidupkan notif padahal ga mau ambil penumpang dengan alasan makan
translated_review: I’m disappointed, please sanction drivers who are hard to reach and avoid locations even when close, turning off notifications and refusing passengers because eating.

review: sebenarnya grab sangat membantucuma setiap mo bayar pke duit lbih selalu bilng ga ada kmbalianaph itu udh trik nya padahal klu driver nya siap kmbalian brapa punaku selalu lebihintpi harus konsisten juga jgn mau lbihan selalu bilng ga ada kmbalian
translated_review: Actually Grab helps a lot but every time paying with cash driver says no change, that’s their trick, if driver has change I always pay more but must be consistent, don’t say no change every time.

review: 16 februari 2025 parah apk eror gw ga bisa pake di stasiun cikoya mau keluar stasiun ga bisa parah gojek
translated_review: February 16, 2025 app error, can’t use at Cikoya station, can’t get out of station, bad Gojek.

review: kalo lagi hujan harganya gak ngotak masak jarak 3km dikasih harga gocar 46000 kalo niat mau peras jgn lewat aplikasi
translated_review: When it rains the price is unreasonable, 3 km given 46,000 for Gocar, if you want to squeeze money don’t use the app.

review: bgus ramah trnyta gk semua driver tidak bersih dn rapihh wlaupun rta2 gk mngenk atribut lengkp
translated_review: Good and friendly, turns out not all drivers are clean and neat, though average doesn’t wear full attributes.

review: alhamdulilah bpk tukang gojek sangat sopan kenyamanan keselamatan juga di jaga dengan baik terima kasih bpk gojek
translated_review: Thank God, Gojek drivers are very polite, safety and comfort are well maintained, thanks Gojek drivers.

review: ada voucher banyak 50 buat menghemat jd belilah gojek plus biar ongkirnya kepotong eh udh digojek plus tbtb vouchernya ilang pdhl masih ada 9 dan masa berlaku masi byk ampas deh emng kalo pake gojek mnding grab
translated_review: There were many vouchers to save, so buy Gojek Plus to get discount, but suddenly vouchers disappear though 9 left with valid period, nonsense, if using Gojek better Grab.

review: kepada grab kenapa kok mapnya beda sama yg di google mao pesen titiknya bingung karna beda sama yg di google map takut nanti drivernya bingung coba di perbaiki mapnya
translated_review: Dear Grab, why is your map different from Google Maps? Ordering points confuse because it’s different from Google Maps, worried drivers get confused, please fix the map.

review: aman nyaman dan ramah di kantong khususnya kalangan pelajar apalagi kalau drivernya ramah dan wangi itu lebih baik sukses selalu jasa maxim luar biasa
translated_review: Safe, comfortable, and friendly for students. Especially when drivers are friendly and smell nice, even better. Success always to Maxim, amazing service.

review: tolong dong driver maxim buat jaga kebersihan helm pernah dapat driver yang helm penumpang nya bau bikin ga nyaman
translated_review: Please, Maxim drivers keep helmet cleanliness, I got a driver whose passenger helmet smelled bad, uncomfortable.

review: membantu perjalanan dan banyak promo nya semoga semakin banyak terus promonya tapi tetap tidak merugikan driver
translated_review: Helps travel and many promos, hope promos keep increasing but don’t harm drivers.

review: tambahkan akun kerabat seperti orang tua ke anak atau kakak adik jadi kita bisa atur perjalanan pembayaran dan mengawasi semua aktifitas pergojekan
translated_review: Add family accounts like parents, siblings, so we can manage trips, payments, and monitor all ride activities.

review: aplikasi sangat membantu tapi tolonglah itnya perbaiki jarak jemput jangan terlalu jauh kasian pelanggan nunggu lama dan kasian driver juga boros bbm tadak sesuai pendapatan dan sering kena cancel ayu donk diperbaiki jangan cuma mikirin untung doank maksimalkan semuanya agar saling menguntungkan terimakasih
translated_review: App is very helpful but please fix the IT, pickup distance not too far, pity customers wait too long and drivers waste fuel, income doesn’t match, often canceled, please fix, don’t just think about profit, maximize everything for mutual benefit, thanks.

review: semenjak d update sekarang nggak pernah dpt voucher walaupun penguna baru sangat tidak nyaman pakai gojek
translated_review: Since update, never get vouchers even for new users, very uncomfortable using Gojek.

review: rata2 driver tidak ramah selalu menggunakan kata2 gk sopan terhadap costumer emosi habis saya tolong di optimalkan lagi pelayanan nya ganti driver nya driver mana coba kasar ke costumer nya tolong bgt biasakan sopan sama costumer inget itu
translated_review: Most drivers are not friendly, always rude words to customers, emotional, please optimize service, change drivers, who is rude to customers, please get them to be polite, remember that.

review: kepada pengelola aplikasi gojek tolong tekankan kepada mitranya terutama driver gocar utk lebih proaktif dalam membantu penumpang yg mempunyai disabilitas geraksakitlansia saat naikturun dari unit
translated_review: To Gojek management, please emphasize to partners, especially Gocar drivers, to be more proactive helping passengers with disabilities, elderly, when getting on and off vehicles.

review: kecewa sama gocar yg di belitung susah banget cari drivernya pada nggak mau ambil yg promo
translated_review: Disappointed with Gocar in Belitung, very hard to find drivers, many refuse promo rides.

review: susah cari driver kalau jam ramai padahal driver numpuk ini gegara ceo nya ga becus jalanin company
translated_review: Hard to find drivers during rush hour though many drivers, this is because CEO is not running the company well.

review: pusat bantuan gk berguna lama sekali responnya padahal kesalahan dari aplikasi bukan dari driver ataupun penumpang tapi penanganan lama dari tanggal 9 sampai sekarang blm dapat penanganan
translated_review: Help center is useless, very slow response, error from the app, not drivers or passengers, from 9th until now no solution.

review: di tempat saya banyak driver rangkap gojekdan kebetulan selalu dapat driver yg utama gojeksombongturun matikan motor aja ga mau
translated_review: In my area, there are many overlapping Gojek drivers. I always get the main driver who is arrogant, even turns off the motor and refuses to continue.

review: penjemputan lambat pengemudi banyak yang tidak berattittude aplikasi banyak bug gps ga akurat dan mahal pula tolong di pikirin banyak orang yang bergantung sama gojek
translated_review: Slow pickup, many drivers have bad attitude, app has many bugs, GPS inaccurate, and expensive, please consider many people depend on Gojek.

review: susah buat ketemu driver sering salah alamat kalo di tempat baru lebih bagus kalo ada fitur kameranya dev
translated_review: Hard to meet driver, often wrong address in new places, better if there’s a camera feature dev.

review: alhamdulillah nyampai dengan selamat dan lancarabang grabnya baikramah banget terimakasih buat abang grab semoga banyak pelangganya dan lancar rezekinya aamiin
translated_review: Thank God arrived safely and smoothly, Grab driver is kind and friendly, thanks Grab driver, hope many customers and smooth fortune, amen.

review: memuaskan l driver tahu jalan driver ramah perjalanan aman nyaman pokok nya top markotop pertahankan bintang nya
translated_review: Satisfied, driver knows the way, friendly, safe trip, top notch, keep the stars.

review: makasi ya gojek sering dapet diskon kalo pesen makan sangat membantu kalo pas lagi laper dan males beli makan
translated_review: Thanks Gojek often get discounts when ordering food, very helpful when hungry and lazy to buy food.

review: buruk saya tidak bisa menemukan rumah saya sudah saya cari cari tetap tidak ada tolong perbaiki mapnya
translated_review: Bad, I can’t find my house, I searched but still not found, please fix the map.

review: ini ada apa ya sama grab susah bener cari cs live soal mau aktifin grab pay later dari kemarin eror mulu
translated_review: What’s going on with Grab, hard to find live customer service to activate Grab Pay Later, error all the time.

review: setelah 3 x baru berhasil mendapatkan mobilyg 2 minta dibatalkanmohon untuk driver yg sering membatalkan diberi peringatan atau denda
translated_review: After 3 tries finally got a car, 2 requested cancellation, please warn or fine drivers who often cancel.

review: tolong donk buat gojek diperjelas jalur nya apakah lewat tol atau tidak kasih kita sebagai customer pilihan mau lewat jalur tol atau non tol biar ga buang2 waktu cari driver yg mau ngambil sesuai jalur dari gojek
translated_review: Please clarify routes, toll or not, give customers choice to take toll or non-toll routes so no wasted time finding drivers who want to take route accordingly from Gojek.

review: gakkkk rekomendasi gak gercep supirnya titik lokasi dimana jemput nya dimana pokoknya ga gercep lah supirnya padahal lagi buru buru
translated_review: Not recommended, drivers slow, pickup location unclear, generally not fast drivers even when in a hurry.

review: bisa gk kalau kita cancel kasih alasan drivernya gk jalan jangan harganya jadi naikwong drivernya yg gk mau jalan di chat jg gk dibales knp jdi di kita harganya naik jauh
translated_review: Can we cancel with the reason that the driver does not want to go, but the price still goes up? The driver doesn't want to move and doesn't reply to messages, why do we end up paying much higher prices?

review: tolong goceng di hapus saja dan penyamaran no2 hp tiadakan saja trus penjemputan usahakan yang dekat2 saja tolong sejahterakan semua driver2nya
translated_review: Please remove the five-thousand fee and eliminate the disguise of phone numbers. Also, try to keep pickups close by. Please take care of all the drivers.

review: tgl 31 januari 2025 sy pesan maxim buat anak sy tp di turunin di jalan padahal sudah sy bayar sesuai aplikasi malah sy tambahin tp driver nya kurang ajar mana pake nomer beda sy sdh komplain ke cs tp tidak di tanggapiparah ini maxim
translated_review: On January 31, 2025, I ordered Maxim for my child but was dropped off on the street even though I paid as per the app, I even added money but the driver was rude and used a different number. I complained to CS but got no response. This Maxim is terrible.

review: respon cepat dan pengemudi santun terima kasih maxim memang termurah dan mantap lah untuk teman perjalanan
translated_review: Fast response and polite drivers, thank you Maxim, indeed the cheapest and great for traveling friends.

review: saya sangat berterimakasih kepada pengemudi drivernya karena sangat ramahbaiksopan dan berhatihati dalam mengemudi kendaraan mobil
translated_review: I am very grateful to the driver because he was very friendly, polite, and careful when driving the car.

review: selektif lagi dalam bermitra banyak sekali driver yang minta dibayar lebih kejadian pesen car dapat harga 14k dimintain 50k duluan boroboro tuh driver gerak gamau jalan dia malah nyuruh customer batalin mohon sekali mental opang kayak gitu ditindak karena udah banyak yg ngeluhin hal ini
translated_review: Be more selective in partnering, many drivers ask for extra payment. I once ordered a car for 14k but was asked to pay 50k upfront. The driver refused to move and told the customer to cancel. Please punish drivers with this attitude because many have complained.

review: apalah para driver jutek banget judes sama cs parahnya lagi sampe ada yg maksa minta tips yg tadinya niat mau ngasih tips tapi dengan sikap drivernya begitu jadi males tolong dong drivernya di tegur terutama di wilayah cirebon
translated_review: Why are the drivers so rude and harsh to CS? Worse, some even force tips. I originally intended to tip but after the driver's attitude, I didn't want to. Please warn the drivers, especially in the Cirebon area.

review: udah mahal nyari driver lama banyak tambahan biaya ga bisa di pakai kalo lg urgent setiap hari begitu
translated_review: The price is already high, finding drivers takes long, with many extra charges. Can't use it when urgent every day like this.

review: lelet bangetmalas pake grab padahal dulu pake aplikasi ini terus sekarang maaf saya beralih ke gojekkkkk
translated_review: Very slow, don't want to use Grab anymore. I used this app before but now I'm switching to Gojek.

review: kacau sekarang grab mentang2 sudah banyak pemakai jd jelek pelayanan nya disaat dibutuhkan cepat cari driver ehh dikasihnya selalu yang jauh terus pdhl daerah saya ada grab yg ngetem
translated_review: Grab is chaotic now, just because there are many users, the service is bad. When needed quickly, find a driver, but they always send drivers far away even though in my area there's a Grab waiting.

review: di banned entah salah apajd mall fungsigbs dipake naik ojek dllbaiknya di uninstall aja kaliapk yg 100 curigaan
translated_review: Got banned, don't know what the fault is. Malls don't work for motorcycle taxis etc. Better uninstall it if it costs 100 (currency), suspicious.

review: jika ga bisa jd driver ga usah masa driver minta cancel kita juga yg menanggung kenaikan tarif padahal gw pengguna aplikasi grab
translated_review: If you can't be a driver, don't be one. Drivers ask for cancel and we bear the fare increase even though I am a Grab app user.

review: kepada yth maxim mohon mohon banget ongkosnya di naikkan lg kl cuaca sedang hujan apalagi kl sedang hujan deras kasihan banget sm driver nya
translated_review: Dear Maxim, please please increase the fare again when it's raining, especially when it rains heavily. Please have mercy on the drivers.

review: tolong banget kalo pas ujan drivernya mau pick saya selalu gabisa pakai gocar kalau wkt hujan karena gada yg mau ambil
translated_review: Please, when it's raining and the driver wants to pick up, I always can’t use Gocar because no one wants to take orders in the rain.

review: ga perlu adain grabcar grabike kalau ujungnya supir ngeluh ke customer bukan soal apa nya jadi seolah kaya dipaksa untuk melibihi byr krna ga enak
translated_review: No need to create Grabcar or Grabike if the drivers complain to customers and act like they are forced to pay extra because they feel uncomfortable.

review: kurang suka dengan grab karna ada satu driver yang sya ga kenal tiba nuduh sya dengan nama opik sedangkan sya ga tau opik siapa mana ada kata begonya pas sya mau bls chatnya ternyata di akhiri
translated_review: I don’t like Grab because one driver I don’t know suddenly accused me of being named Opik, but I don’t know who Opik is, and even used the word stupid. When I wanted to reply, the chat was ended.

review: gojek selalu siap jika d butuhkan kemana dan di mana murah dan disconlagi yok up load sekarang juga
translated_review: Gojek is always ready when needed anywhere, cheap with discounts again. Let’s upload now too.

review: mengapa aplikasi gojek meminta utk mengakses kontak di hp utk menyadap hp kita atau gmn ya kayaknya sy mending uninstall deh
translated_review: Why does the Gojek app ask to access contacts on the phone to spy on us or something? I think I better uninstall.

review: cara daftarnya susah dulu cuma masukan no tepon sama akun facbook sekarang tambah ribet saya penupang
translated_review: The registration is hard. Before, just enter phone number and Facebook account, now it’s more complicated. I am a passenger.

review: jujur gua cape banget daerah gua susah banget driver yg deket malah jauh banget dapetnya benerin lagi dong tad gua juga di marahmarah sama driver yg mau jemput katanya customer bala padahal gua ga ada ngapangapain benerenin lagi peraturannya cs dan driver perhatiin juga
translated_review: Honestly, I am very tired. In my area, it's hard to find nearby drivers; I always get distant ones. Fix this. I also got scolded by a driver who wanted to pick me up, saying the customer was crazy even though I didn’t do anything. Fix the rules. CS and drivers please pay attention too.

review: adanya gojek sangat membantu kami dalam bepergiandengan menggunakan aplikasi gojek sangat memudahkan kami dalam melakukan pemesanansehingga memperlancar dan mempersingkat waktu tunggu kami
translated_review: Gojek is really helpful for our travels. The app makes ordering easy, which makes the whole process faster and more efficient.

review: driver nya sangat baik hati dan disiplin dan juga sangat berwibawa dan patuhi aturan per grabpan
translated_review: The driver is very kind, disciplined, dignified, and obeys Grab regulations.

review: tarif lbh murah di banding yg laindriver ramahsampai tepat waktupemilihan rute tepatsmoga tarifnya tetap murah yaa
translated_review: The fare is cheaper compared to others, the driver is friendly and on time, chooses the right route. Hopefully, the fare stays cheap.

review: susah buat nyari alamat pas nya ga kaya gojek ga ribet ini mah ribet banget buat nyari pas titik nya jdi males make nya
translated_review: Hard to find the address because it’s not like Gojek, which is simple. This is complicated and makes me reluctant to use it.

review: aplikasi diupdate malah makin jelk dam kadang saya suka dapat driver yang jauh yang membuat saya lama menunggu
translated_review: App updated but worse. Sometimes I get distant drivers so I wait longer.

review: agak kurang enak suka lama banget dapet draivernya bisa sampe 20 menit nunggu cari draivernya dulu mah cepet 1 menit 2 menit langsung dapet
translated_review: It's a bit unpleasant, it takes very long to get a driver, sometimes up to 20 minutes. Before, it was fast, 1 or 2 minutes and you got one.

review: tolong lah kasih tau sama drivernya untuk selallu bawa uang kembalian jangan beralasan tidak ada kembalian terus
translated_review: Please tell the drivers to always bring change money. Don’t keep saying no change available.

review: alhamdulillah berkat ada nya grab ini sepupuh saya langganan saya engrab nya selalu pelayanan ramah baik terus updatkan cara pengguna aplikasi ini supaya mudah di meggunakan mudah di mengerti terima kasih
translated_review: Thank God for Grab, my cousin is a regular customer, and Grab's service is always friendly and good. Please keep updating the app to make it easier to use and understand. Thank you.

review: keren sih ini dg adanya program grab hemat bisa dapat driver fg motor yg terbaru dan besar mantap deh grab
translated_review: This program Grab Hemat is cool, you can get a driver with the latest and big motorbike, great Grab!

review: mohon perbaiki min layanan nya saudara pilih grab car plus blue bird mulu orang mau mobil biasa kerja sama boleh tapi sesuai jenis pilihan layanan customer yg inginkan
translated_review: Please improve the service, I always choose Grabcar plus Blue Bird. People want normal cars working together but according to the customer’s chosen service type.

review: hai saya pengguna grab car baru tau setelah berbincang dengan driver kalau tarif yg saya bayarkan ternyata potongan nya besar dan yg driver terima kecil sekali miris sekali do begitu saya tau cari win win nya biar aplikasi dan mitra nya tetap berjalan
translated_review: Hi, I am a new Grabcar user, just found out from the driver that the fare I paid has a big cut and the driver gets very little. It’s sad. I hope there’s a win-win solution so both the app and partners can keep running.

review: sempurna buat pak sopir nyamau nganterin sampe depan rumah walaupun di pelosok desaberkah selalu pak sopir semoga di lancarkan terus usaha dan rejekinya
translated_review: Perfect for drivers who want to deliver up to the front door even in remote villages. Blessings always for the driver, may your business and fortune always flow.

review: gojek kenapa deh naikin harga ga kira2 yg biasanya jaraknya deket cuma 15rebuan jadi 4050rb ini mah org bakalan males kali naik gojek ga bakalan mau make lagi bye gojek
translated_review: Why does Gojek increase the price so arbitrarily? Usually, short trips cost about 15k but now 40-50k. People will be reluctant to use Gojek again. Bye Gojek.

review: kecewa dengan opsi 3 ongkir hemat sudah saya lakukan 3 kali gak dapat driver padahal deket sumpah hari sangat sangat kecewa dapet driver jauh banget nunggu 30 menit telat ke kerjaan
translated_review: Disappointed with the 3 cheap delivery options; I tried 3 times but no driver nearby. I swear this day is very disappointing, getting a driver far away, waiting 30 minutes late for work.

review: semakin hari semakin jenuh sama layanan yang di beri sama pihak gojek kemungkinan bakal uninstall apk nya
translated_review: Day by day, I am more bored with the service from Gojek. I might uninstall the app.

review: trimkasih banyak selama ini bertahun tahun aplikasi grab beserta para bapak drivernya sudah membantu saya sebagai sarana dalam beraktivitas begitu juga untuk makan dan minum sayasukses selalu mmuaahhtks tuhan yesus memberkati kita semuaamen
translated_review: Thanks a lot, for years Grab and its drivers have helped me in daily activities including food and drinks. Success to all, God bless us all, amen.

review: sumpah aplikasinya membantu biginda tapii plis benerin error nya udah 2x tiba tiba kecantol driver lain padahal barusan udah nyampe ke titik tujuan jadi pertama dapet driver dianterinnyampe malah kecantol driver lain mohon agak diperbaiki yaa bikin spot jantung ae aku kasih bintang 4
translated_review: Swear this app helps a lot but please fix the errors. Twice I got switched to another driver even though I was already at the destination. First, I got one driver who took me there, then suddenly it switched to another driver. Please fix this, it makes my heart jump. I give 4 stars.

review: dapet driver susah banget pasti di cancel klo driver gak sesuai sama harga aplikasi mending samain deh argo nya kalo kyk gini saya nunggu lama banget dan di cancel terus
translated_review: Getting a driver is very hard; they cancel if the driver doesn’t agree with the app price. Better align the meter. I wait too long and keep getting canceled.

review: driver sangat ramah pilihan jalur nya bagus semoga selalu sehat dan dilancarluaskan rizki nya yg halal barokah
translated_review: Drivers are very friendly, good route choice, hope they stay healthy and prosperous with halal blessings.

review: berguna banget sih ini aplikasi kalau kita pulang kerja malam kita bisa nih mesan transportasi di sini terimakasih grab
translated_review: This app is very useful when we go home late from work. We can order transportation here. Thank you Grab.

review: apk yg sangat tidak peduli keselamatan banyak driver ga pake seragam dan suka di jalan contoh lawan arus dan trobos perboden
translated_review: The app is very careless about safety; many drivers don’t wear uniforms and often go against traffic or break rules.

review: gak kwatir lgi takut gak bisa pulang di saat gak punya kendaraan pribadi semenjak ada gojek is the best lah pokoknya
translated_review: No longer worried about not having a ride home without a private vehicle since Gojek is the best.

review: mohon penjelasan nya an nusron driver b 1961 rop kenapa tarif nya rp 97500 jadi rp 107000 berangkat sedangkan balik pulang tarifnya sesuai rp 99500 driver z 1517 em an wahyu hidayat ok
translated_review: Please explain, An Nusron driver B 1961 ROP, why the fare is Rp 97,500 going but Rp 107,000 returning, while the return fare is supposed to be Rp 99,500. Driver Z 1517 EM An Wahyu Hidayat, okay.

review: kereeeen deeeh kebersihan keramahan pelayanan krn g ada kembalian driver memberi free luar biasa akhirnya rogoh2 dompet dan tas agar bisa bayar
translated_review: So cool, cleanliness, friendliness, and service because there is no change, the driver gives free service. Finally, I had to dig through my wallet and bag to pay

review: adain fitur chat buat penjemputan yah kasian driver nya harus nelpon klo mau jemput habis pulsa nya ongkos ga seberapa
translated_review: Please add chat features for pickups. Poor drivers have to call, which uses credit. The fare is not that much.

review: grabcar drivernya engga pakai otak jalanin mobilnya minus akhlakminus attitude juga pelayanan jelektidak ramah terhadap penumpang
translated_review: Grabcar drivers don’t use their brains when driving, lack morals, bad attitude, bad service, not friendly to passengers.

review: versi terbaru gojek malah bikin chat dari driver enggak muncul notif di hape pelanggan pas dicek ke menu chat baru ketahuan kalau ada chat
translated_review: The latest Gojek version doesn’t show driver chat notifications on the customer’s phone. You have to check the chat menu to see messages.

review: lama bgt dpt driver mau itu reguler ekonomis tetap sama ini buka cuma sekali tapi sering
translated_review: It takes a very long time to get a driver, whether regular or economy, still the same. This is not the first time but happens often.

review: aplikasi ribetnyari driver dari tadi gk dapetdrivernya pada gk niat kerjabuat ceo gojek tolong evaluasi lagi lah drivernya
translated_review: The app is complicated. I can’t find drivers. Drivers don’t seem motivated to work. To Gojek CEO, please evaluate your drivers again.

review: tolong diperbaiki sistemnya sudah beberapa kali pas pesen goride 1 tapi malah dapet 2 driver kasian driver satunya jadi harus dibatalin
translated_review: Please fix the system, several times when I ordered Goride 1, I got 2 drivers. Poor second driver has to be canceled.

review: sekarang gojek ko kutang memuaskan ya padahal driver banyak tapi susah buat psenkecewatolong tingkatin lagi biar gak berpindah ke apk lain kan kasian drivernya juga nungguin ordran tapi sistemnya ganguan gini
translated_review: Now Gojek is disappointing even though there are many drivers, it’s hard to order. Please improve so customers don’t switch to other apps. It’s sad drivers have to wait but the system is faulty.

review: sistem aplikasinya seperti makin lama makin gak bagus pencarian drivernya kenapa harus yang jauhjauh dan gak efisien
translated_review: The app system seems to get worse over time. Why must the search find drivers far away? It’s inefficient.

review: harusnya ada tindakan dri pihak grab ke lapangan supaya di setiap titik para ojol untuk jemput penumpang tidak ada gesekan sama ojek pangkalan setempat ini yg harus segera di tidaklanjuti supaya penumpang enak dan ojol pun lebih tepat waktu tepat di titik penjemputantitik tujuan penumpang
translated_review: Grab should take action in the field so that at every point ojol drivers pick up passengers without conflict with local pangkalan ojek. This must be addressed quickly for passenger comfort and ojol drivers to be on time and at the correct pickup and drop-off points.

review: adillah dlm memberi sanksi jgn terima laporan fitnah dr cs lgsg akun driver disuspend tanpa pemberitahuan keslahan apa yg di perbuat
translated_review: Be fair in imposing sanctions; don’t suspend driver accounts based on slander reports from CS without notice or explanation.

review: makin kesini makin gak jelas si gojek punya limit paylater gabisa dipake padahal gapunya tagihan paylater yg belum dibayar
translated_review: Gojek lately is unclear, paylater limit cannot be used even though no unpaid paylater bills exist.

review: tolong di perbaiki lagi masalah pejemputan drivernya dapat di jauh2 sedangkan yg saya liat ada yg driver posisinya dekat dengan saya
translated_review: Please fix the pickup issue, drivers are assigned far away even though some are close to me.

review: terimakasih banyak untuk owner maxim dan seluruh teamnya semoga selalu sehatkuatslmtamanlancarbrhsil semakin sukses barokah dunia akhiratnya seluruhnya
translated_review: Thanks a lot to Maxim owners and team, hope you stay healthy, strong, safe, smooth, successful, and blessed in this world and hereafter.

review: matikan fitur one tap suka ke double booking kasian drivernya saya sudah cari tutor matikan fitur tersebut tapi gaada sama sekali tutorial nya
translated_review: Turn off the one-tap feature; it often causes double bookings, pity the drivers. I searched for tutorials to turn it off but found none.

review: pesen gojek motor utk saudara drivernya muter kejauahan ngak tau dicancel driver nya atau gimana trs kita pesen pakai aplikasi ojol lain tiba2 saya dpt notif bahwa dpt driver baru dr gojek padahal yg td udah tercancel kesannya saya pesan lg
translated_review: Ordered Gojek motor for my relative; the driver took a long detour and canceled or something. Then I ordered using another ojol app but suddenly got a notification of a new driver from Gojek even though the previous was canceled. It felt like I ordered again.

review: saya peke grab bike hemat tapi bayarnya 17000drivernya terima 10400 gila grab ga ngotak kasian drivernya saya kira driver nerima 15000
translated_review: I use Grab bike Hemat but pay 17,000 while the driver only gets 10,400. Crazy Grab, no brain, pity the driver, I thought the driver got 15,000.

review: perusahaan penyengsara driver tolonh driver pindah aja semua le tempat lain dan untuk pelanggan harap segera uinstal app ini jangan pakai lagi
translated_review: This company burdens drivers, I advise all drivers to move elsewhere and customers to uninstall and stop using this app.

review: tolong lebih peduli sama drivernya apa lagi kalau drivernya bener punya masalah jangan anggap driver lu robot driver dapat masalah malah lu tambah bikin susah driver lu kocak
translated_review: Please care more about drivers, especially if drivers have problems. Don’t treat them like robots. Drivers with problems only get more difficulties from you. You are ridiculous.

review: pesen ambil yg 1 jam selesai tapi 2 jam baru selesai dapet driver lama bnaget padahal ga lagi hujan atau gmana
translated_review: Ordered to be picked up in 1 hour but finished in 2 hours. It took very long to get a driver even though it wasn’t raining or anything.

review: ketatin lg aturan nya bikin jengkel az gojek nya disini saya bayar massa saya pakai gosop di suruh kensel trus
translated_review: Tighten the rules again, it’s annoying. I paid for Gosop but was told to cancel.

review: tolong dong kl terima calon driver di seleksi dl manusia nya jangan yg bodoh tolol nyolot
translated_review: Please select prospective drivers carefully, no stupid, rude, or insolent people.

review: iklan nya ganggu banget susah di close udah jarang gw pake mahal beda sama gojek dan maxim drivernya kasus mulu kaka gw hampir dilecehin sama driver grab
translated_review: Ads are very annoying and hard to close. I rarely use it now. It’s expensive, different from Gojek and Maxim. My sister was almost harassed by a Grab driver.

review: maaf saya pernah kena damprat driver grab karena saya minta tunggu 5menit bener2 didamprat sampek telpon marah2 karena memang lokasi agak masuk2 dan saya masih komunikasikan sama temen saya yang perlu jemputan
translated_review: Sorry, I was scolded by a Grab driver because I asked to wait 5 minutes. The driver really scolded me and called angrily because the location was a bit hidden and I was still communicating with my friend who needed a pickup.

review: selalu dapat driver yang posisinya jauh padahal didekat rumah banyak driver parah sudah tidak seperti dulu mending pindah ke apk lain aja
translated_review: Always get drivers far away even though there are many nearby drivers. It’s terrible, not like before. Better switch to another app.

review: ada pilihan untuk rubah rute sehingga driver biasanya meminta untuk ubah rute agar harga lebih mahal jika harga tetap meskipun sudah ubah rute driver biasanya kesalmarah tolong untuk dihapus aja pilihan ubah rutenya
translated_review: There is an option to change the route so drivers usually ask to change routes to get a higher price. If the price stays the same, even after changing route, drivers get upset and angry. Please remove the route change option.

review: alhamdulillah selalu dpt driver yg ramah cekatan dan selaau mengendarai kendaraan dg sgt hati2sehat sellau babang ojek gusti mberkahi
translated_review: Thank God always get friendly and quick drivers who drive very carefully. Stay healthy, brother ojeks, God bless.

review: aplikasi yang sangar menolong kegiatan setiap hari tarif awalnya oke tapi sekarang semakin mahal dengan alasan untuk inilah untuk itulah untuk perbaikan untuk pelatihan sejujurnya masih terbaik kedua
translated_review: This app really helps daily activities. The initial fare was okay but now it’s getting more expensive with many excuses like improvements and training. Honestly, still second best.

review: banyak terbantu dalam berbagai kondisi sedikit koreksi terkadang titik tidak sesuai dengan alamat yg ada dan ada driver yg menolak mengambil hanya karena jarak ataupun kemacetan semoga bisa semakin lebih baik demi kenyamanan konsumen trimakasih
translated_review: Helped a lot in various conditions with minor corrections. Sometimes the pin doesn’t match the address, and some drivers refuse to take orders because of distance or traffic. Hope it gets better for customer comfort. Thank you.

review: tolong ya itu maping nya di benerin lagi udah jelas2 saya bener pas titik alamat saya kok driver2 malah ke titik yang lainjadi saya terus yang di marahin sama driver padahal titik rumah saya udah bener
translated_review: Please fix the mapping again. I placed the pin correctly but drivers go to other points and then I get scolded by drivers even though my home point is correct.

review: kendaraan motor banyak yang tidak patuh aturan lalu lintas driver berbeda dengan nama pemilik dan banyak yang tidak ramah
translated_review: Many motorcycle vehicles don’t obey traffic rules, driver names differ from owner names, and many drivers are unfriendly.

review: pelayanan terhadap konsumen jelek driver jarang mau datang dgn berbagai alasan yg tak masuk akal driver yg di pilih terlalu jauh dari titik penjemputan
translated_review: Service to customers is bad. Drivers rarely come with unreasonable excuses. The chosen driver is too far from the pickup point.

review: driver sangat ramah cpt respon dn sangat tenang bawa kendaraan ny makanya saya ksh bintang 5
translated_review: The driver was very friendly, responded quickly, and drove calmly, that's why I gave 5 stars

review: sangat membantu perjalanan saya ya walaupun kadang ada aja driver di luar nurul tapi its okay lah
translated_review: Very helpful for my trip, even though sometimes there are drivers outside of Nurul, but it's okay

review: aneh sama ojol maxim jd double pembayaran tdny pake kasprolalu akhirny berpindah jadi tunai saya cek kaspro saya berkurang
translated_review: Weird with Maxim ojol, there was a double payment, initially using Kaspro then suddenly switched to cash, and I checked that my Kaspro balance decreased

review: grab sekarang mahal sekali lebih murah aplikasi sebelah nyesel udah pernah jadi driver grab kalian itu untung sudah berkali kali lipat apakah harus saya sampaikan ke bapak presiden agar ongkos grab jadi sangat hemat
translated_review: Grab is very expensive now, the other app is cheaper, I regret ever being a Grab driver. You guys have profited many times over, do I have to report to the president so Grab fares become affordable

review: sangat membantucepat penanganannya dan perbaikan saat ada ulasan jelekdraiver ramah dan baik meskipun agak lama mencari driverjarang ada promo untuk goride tapi tetap gojek pilihanku sukses trus untuk gojek
translated_review: Very helpful, fast response and correction when there are bad reviews, the driver is kind and friendly even though it takes time to find one. Rarely any promo for GoRide but still Gojek is my choice, success always for Gojek

review: setiap hujan selalu susah dapat driver gocar selalu di cancel krn gocar memilih pindah aps yg lain
translated_review: Every time it rains, it's always hard to get a Gocar driver. Always gets canceled because Gocar chooses to switch to another app

review: woi gojek emang kalo kita mesen trus gak jadi bayar ya gw mesen gojek karena lama makanya gw cancel eh pas dateng orangnya marah marah minta duit gw kan harusnya cuma 17 ini dua minta uang ganti bensin sampe 50k ah elah
translated_review: Hey Gojek, so if we order and then cancel we still have to pay? I ordered Gojek because it took too long, so I canceled, then when the person came, they got angry and asked for money. I was supposed to pay 17 but they asked for 50k for gas, what the heck

review: terima kasih untuk pelayanan driver grabsemoga kwalitas pelayananya semakin baik dan semakin berkwalitasmampu memberikan kepercayaan dan kenyamanan customerterima kasih
translated_review: Thank you for the Grab driver service, hope the service quality continues to improve and earns trust and comfort from customers, thank you

review: dtng ke sekolah memberi voucher 200rb eh pas dipake ga bisa dan cara pemakaian tidak diberi tau nipu ga si
translated_review: Came to school giving a 200k voucher but when used it didn’t work and no instructions were given, is this a scam?

review: oi minimal klo udh boking gocar atau grab klo di waktu hujan itu cepat dapat lah apalgi di pagi jam 3 lama bgt dapat nya mana dpt nya jauh pda gamau kesel bgt gw
translated_review: Hey, at least when we book Gocar or Grab in the rain, make sure it's fast, especially at 3 am, it’s really hard to get one and they’re all far away. No one wants to take it, I’m so pissed

review: sudah pakai lama gojek ini ga dapat fitur di gojek buat apa saya apk nya klo ga ada kegunaan nya uninstall
translated_review: I’ve used Gojek for a long time but didn’t get features in the app, what’s the point of having it if it’s useless? Uninstalled

review: recommended bintang 5 drivernya oke oke jempol 5 top markotop untuk pihak jasa aplikasi sarannya update fitur terkini supaya tidak ketinggalan dengan aplikasi sebelah good job maxim sukses teruss
translated_review: Highly recommended! 5 stars — the drivers are great! Thumbs up! Just a suggestion for the app: update the features so it stays ahead of competitors. Good job Maxim, keep it up!

review: sumpa ya gojek pas awal banyak bgt diskon nya tapi lama kelamaan gaada diskon lagi eheheheh but issoke makasih ya gojekk
translated_review: Swear Gojek used to have so many discounts but now no more discounts haha but it’s okay, thank you Gojek

review: sengaja saya beri bintang 3 di karenakan saya baru pertama kali mencoba menggunakan kan aplikasi gojek
translated_review: I purposely gave 3 stars because this is my first time trying the Gojek app

review: sangat membantu saya untuk perjalanan di luar kota biaya nya relatif murah dan banyak promo nya terimakasih grab
translated_review: Very helpful for my out-of-town trip, the cost is relatively cheap and there are many promos, thank you Grab

review: selamat petang ijin bertanya saya gatot supriyanto untuk akun gojek saya kok belum aktif juga ya sdh 4 bulanan belum dipanggil2 kenapa ya
translated_review: Good evening, I want to ask, I am Gatot Supriyanto, why is my Gojek account still not active? It's been 4 months and I haven't been called yet

review: aplikasi gajelas akun gua 3 dibekukan semualaporan tetep di non aktifkan mending gojek ama shope udah grab mah yg enak cuma grebe grebe
translated_review: This app is unclear, all 3 of my accounts got frozen. Reports are ignored. Better use Gojek or Shopee. Only "grebe grebe" is good with Grab

review: licik banget notifnya ga bisa matiin notif promo cuma pengin terima notif perjalanan pilihannya cuma nyalain atau matiin semua notif di settingnya 2 bintang lagi untuk setelah ada kategorisasi notif yang jelas
translated_review: So sneaky, can't turn off promo notifications. I just want trip notifications but the only option is to turn all on or off. 2 more stars after clear notification categories are added

review: pungli berkedok aplikasi ya ini ongkos yg diterima driver sangat murah yaitu 5 ribu padahal customet bayar tarif normal 12 ribu jarak dekat untuk ongkosnya
translated_review: Extortion disguised as an app. The fare received by the driver is very low, like 5k, while the customer pays the normal 12k fare for a short distance

review: aplikasi nya bagus sangat membantu untuk perjalanan saran agar ditambahkan opsi untuk tampilan peta jenis satelit terimakasih
translated_review: The app is good, very helpful for trips. Suggest adding an option for satellite map view. Thank you

review: aplikasi anak bangsa kok menyusahkan drivernya bikin sejahtera driver custumer juga senang kasian potongan driver telalu besar semoga pimpinan segera dapat hidayahhh
translated_review: A local app but making life hard for its drivers. Make drivers prosperous and customers happy. Pity the drivers with too big a cut. Hope the leadership receives enlightenment

review: sebenarnya cukup membantutapi banyak di rugikankita sebagai customer kadang mengeluh juga dengan cara kerja aplikasi sudah bayar full tapi pelayanan kualitas kurang baiksaya tnya ke driver katanya dari aplikatornyagmna inipantas cs sama driver slalu marah kaya di adu domba tolong perbaikiqt cs full byar
translated_review: Actually quite helpful, but we suffer losses. As customers, we also complain about how the app works. Already paid full but got poor service. I asked the driver and they said it’s the app provider’s fault. Why is it like this? No wonder CS and drivers are always mad like they’re being pitted against each other. Please fix it. CS is fully paid

review: mntap krn anda anda perjln jd lncar dan tepat wktu trimz buat rekan2 grab ati2 d jln dan jgn lupa jaga kondisi
translated_review: Awesome because of you, the journey is smooth and punctual. Thanks to all Grab partners, stay safe and take care

review: booking kembali cara hapusnya gimana sering kepencet krn memang cepat bgt dapetnya klo ga sadar pesen berulang trus
translated_review: How to delete rebook? I often accidentally tap it because it appears too fast and I end up repeatedly ordering

review: saya selaku driver kecewa kepada sistem gojekberpihak sebelah kepada customersaya lagi ngejar bonus weekendtp penumpang yg cancel tapi performa saya turun pdhl penumpang yg cancelotomatis gagal bonusnya tidak kekejar jadi sia semangat ngejar bonus malah gagall
translated_review: As a driver, I'm disappointed with Gojek’s system. It's biased towards customers. I was chasing weekend bonuses but when a customer canceled, my performance dropped even though it wasn't my fault. Ended up missing the bonus. My spirit was wasted

review: driver nya ga sabaran bawa kendaraan ga peduli ada kubangan air kayanya tetep di terobos aja yang buat pengguna motor kecipratan air kotor jadinya santai pak
translated_review: The driver was impatient, didn't care about water puddles and just drove through, splashing dirty water on motorbike users. Please drive more carefully

review: ga bagus banget tiap mencari driver lama sekali seperti sengaja apa karna biaya nya terlalu murah jadi driver tidak mau mengangkut mohon ditindak lanjut padahal posisi driver pada dekat semua
translated_review: Not good, every time I look for a driver it takes so long, like on purpose. Is it because the fare is too cheap so drivers don’t want to pick up? Please follow up, even though drivers are nearby.

review: driver gojek sekarang pada sombong mentang mentang cuma 10 ribu ga ada yang mau ambil gerak padahal sudah di terima oleh driver
translated_review: Gojek drivers are arrogant now. Just because the fare is 10k, they don’t want to take it, even though it’s already accepted

review: sudah instal dan uninstall yang kesekian x nyapesan maxim car selalu ditolak ma drivernyapadahal di map terlihat banyak driver terdekat harga juga tiba berubah dari tarif awal tolong diperbaiki lg
translated_review: I've installed and uninstalled this many times. Ordering Maxim Car always gets rejected by the drivers, even though the map shows many nearby. The price also changes from the initial rate. Please fix this

review: jangan pada pake gojek lg si gojek ngasih ongkir ke driver cuma 5 rb aplikasi maruk
translated_review: Don't use Gojek anymore. They only give 5k to drivers for delivery. This app is greedy

review: tiap hujan selalu susah untuk dapat driverdan ini bukan perkara sambungan internet tolong dibenahi lagi untuk pihak gojek perkara seperti ini
translated_review: Every time it rains it's hard to get a driver. This is not a network issue. Gojek please fix this

review: pesen dari jam 1900 udah jam 2200 ga dpt dpt driver gabisa dibatalin lagi bikin gabisa tidur klo tidur tkutnya dpt driver benerin lah gajelas
translated_review: Ordered at 7:00 PM, still no driver by 10:00 PM. Can’t cancel either. I can’t sleep because I’m afraid I might suddenly get matched with a driver. Fix this mess

review: karena terkadang saya dapet potongan harga saya kasih bintang 3 karena terkadang sulit mencari driver suka di cancel dari driver nya kaya orang gak niat kerja aja
translated_review: Sometimes I get a discount, so I give 3 stars, but it’s hard to find drivers and they often cancel like they’re not serious about working.

review: serius deh jelek banget sering gak bisa nemuin titik lokasi yg dicari padahal nyoba di app sebelah bisa
translated_review: Seriously, it’s terrible. Often can’t find the right location point, even though other apps can

review: bagus hanya saja kadang dapat driver yang ugalugalanaku sampai jatuh tp gak ada tanggung jawabnyadan dpt juga yg agak kurang baikduduk nya mepet2 saya sampai mau jatuh untung aja jaraknya dekat kepala ku sampai sekarang masih sakitsaya cs dari wilayah sidoarjo
translated_review: It’s good, but sometimes I get reckless drivers. I even fell off but there was no responsibility. Some drivers also sit too close, I almost fell again. Luckily it was a short ride. My head still hurts. I’m a CS from Sidoarjo

review: pengen kasih bintang 1 kalau ada driver yang masih menuju lokasi jemput tapi di aplikasi sudah bersama penumpang ga di briefing dulu gitu para driver nya
translated_review: I want to give 1 star if a driver is still on the way but in the app it says they’re already with the passenger. Don’t they brief the drivers first?

review: layanan go investasi tidak bisa di akses padahal sudah di upgrade grde makin gak jelas gojek nya bukan lagi sebagai problem solver sekarang tapi menjadi problem maker
translated_review: Go investment service can’t be accessed even though upgraded. Gojek is getting worse, not a problem solver anymore but a problem maker.

review: oke pengemudi abed nego banga dengan motorcycle warna merah nopol dn4712er selamat menikmati perjalanan anda rating 490
translated_review: Okay, driver Abed negotiated proudly with a red motorcycle plate DN4712ER. Enjoy your trip. Rating 490

review: drivernya sekarang belagu banget di hubungin suka ga dibales 10 menit kemudian baru dibales udh jalannya lama banget
translated_review: Drivers now are so arrogant, don’t reply when contacted, only reply 10 minutes later, and drive slowly

review: prioritas kan driver bintang 5 donk kayak di aplikasi sebelahlayanan bisa maksimal dan nyaman dijalansaya pengguna gojek lamaterima kasih min
translated_review: Prioritize 5-star drivers like in other apps so the service is optimal and comfortable. I’ve been a longtime Gojek user. Thanks admin

review: apknya astaghfirullah sekali masa mau daftar malah ga dikasih kode terus juga nyoba cara lain malah sulit
translated_review: This app, astaghfirullah, I tried to register but didn’t get the code. Tried other ways, still difficult

review: sya trauma pake gojek sya pesen gojek trs saya cancel krn hbis lomba ternyata blm boleh pulang krn eval langsung sy cancel cepet cepet ternyats ojolnya pas pulang nunggu saya di depan buat ngata ngatain saya
translated_review: I'm traumatized using Gojek. I ordered and then canceled because I couldn’t go home after a competition. The ojol waited in front of my place and insulted me

review: aplikasi termahal dikotaku cikampekkalo mau bersaing dgn aplikasi lain dan gk ditinggal customeradakan layanan hemat lagi dong kayak 2bulan kebelakang sekarang tarifnya 15rb tapi saya tanya driver katanya cuma dapet 8rb
translated_review: Most expensive app in my city, Cikampek. If you want to compete with others and not lose customers, bring back the economical service like 2 months ago. Now the fare is 15k, but the driver only gets 8k

review: bye grab aplikasi paling berat di gunain buat pengguna hp 4gb ram pake sgala video iklan lah sgala macem lah di masukin bukan nya makin ringan malah makin berat aja tu aplikasi gimana ga pada kabur ke gojek shoppe bye bye
translated_review: Bye Grab, the heaviest app for phones with 4GB RAM. Full of ads and videos. Instead of being lighter, it’s heavier. No wonder people switch to Gojek or Shopee. Bye bye

review: sudah dapat driver grabcar yang dekat tiba2 dibatalkan oleh sistem grab kenapa grab tidak rela kalau pelanggan pakai promo tapi dapat driver yang jaraknya dekat
translated_review: Got a nearby GrabCar driver but the system suddenly canceled it. Why doesn’t Grab allow customers to use promo if the driver is close?

review: makin kesini makin jelek driver suka telat yang harus nya dateng jam 605 tp belum jalan anak sekolah dibikin telattt muluu belagu bgt ujan dikit sepi bgt gada yg ambil kalo kaya gitu mah skrg pindah ke grab atau maxxim
translated_review: Getting worse. Drivers are often late. Should arrive at 6:05 but hadn’t even started. Kids late to school again. So arrogant. Even light rain, no one wants to take orders. Switching to Grab or Maxim now

review: kenapa driver sama customer gps nya ga sama kapan sih sinkron nya tuh gps
translated_review: Why are the GPS locations of driver and customer not synced? When will this be fixed?

review: udah lama pake apk ini sering juga beli lewat sini tapi gojek masih pelit banget buat ngasih promovoucher
translated_review: Been using this app a long time and often buy from here, but Gojek is still stingy with promo vouchers

review: bagusssss banyakkk driverrr ramahh yang sayaaa temuii disinii semogaa kedepannyaa selaluu banyak driver yang ramah dan tidak menyalahi peraturan dari maxim karena saya sudah berlangganan menggunakan maxim dari lama
translated_review: Good, lots of friendly drivers I’ve met here. Hope Maxim continues to have kind drivers who don’t break the rules because I’ve been a loyal user

review: saya sangat kecewa terhadap aplikasi gojek karena aplikasi nya seperti mengalami error saya memesan gocar memang sedang macet dan di aplikasi awalnya tertulis nya 3 menit lagi dan tiba tiba berubah menjadi 10 menit dan ternyata ketika saya cek gocar nya sudah sampe di tujuan
translated_review: Very disappointed with the Gojek app. It's like it’s malfunctioning. I ordered Gocar, it said 3 minutes left, then suddenly changed to 10 minutes. When I checked, the car had already arrived at the destination

review: yg dekat banyak knp yg jauh app lama kq kalah sama app yg baru lagi buru malah suruh nggu driver yg jauh lama pula makin sering di gunakan makin gk jelas ni app kebanyakan makan uang driver
translated_review: There are many drivers nearby, why does the app give distant ones? The app is slow. It’s worse than new apps. I’m in a hurry but told to wait for far away drivers who take long. The more it’s used, the worse it gets. Most of the driver’s money is taken by the app.

review: maaf jd bintang 3 awalnya kebantu karna ada promo tp drivernya ga mau ambil dgn dalih jauh titiknya ga sesuai dgn pembayarannya kecewa bgt sih sm grab

review: banyak promonya ngertiin di saat cs lagi sekaratsemoga promonya tidak membuat drivernya jadi beban dan sengsarasemoga cs juga ngertiin driver yajangan lupa uang tip ya ka untuk driver gojeknya
translated_review: Lots of promos, understands when customers are broke. Hope promos don’t burden the drivers. Customers, please understand the drivers too. Don’t forget to tip them

review: setelah upgrade jadi lemot susah dibuka sebelumnya lancar2 saja tolong perbaiki sy kasih bintang 1 dulu kalau sudah lancar baru tambah

review: bagusminta tolong lebih banyak promo untuk mobil dan sepeda motor supaya bisa menikmati perjalanan dengan hemat dan nyaman terima kasih

review: kasian driver nya terlalu murah potongan terlalu besar sebagai customer saya merasa iba dengan nasib driver

review: bagus pelayanan nyabisa selalu diandalkan kalo kita pergi ke kota lain bingung jalan tinggal pake gojek

review: complain suda dtngani tuti ttng driver nakal mohondtindak dan disuspend karena mlarikan uang tmn skerja ny

review: udah lama pake gojek pakai gojek harga juga murah ko tapi sayangnya yang harus diperbaiki kalau hujan tolong yg gocar ttp bisa terus kecantol kalau pakai goride oke bangett karna lebih praktis cepet bngt gtu nyantol ke customer mana dapat driver yang baik ramah semua

review: pesen gocar dapet harga 17k dri apl nya kan lumayan tp malah dri drivernya ditolak trusharusnya drivernya jg jgan milih lah sini jg dapet harga promo kan dri aplnya bukan permintaan kita tolong gojek masukannya trims

review: sampah banyak diskon banyak promo yang paling di rugikan jelas mitra driver aplikator paling di untungkan

review: sumpah mapsnya gajelas bgt drivernya keliatan ga jalan padahal dia jalan kasian kalo ada yg tbtb dicancel karena salah paham tlg diperbaiki

review: kalau hujan banyak driver yang dekat tapi lama banget nyantol nya iyasih tau kalau hujan tapi please padahal udah pakai harga yg teratas sampai pencarian cepatpun tetp gak gercep

review: buat go jek akun driver nya di per gacor lagi dong semenjak ada aceng susah yg akun regular anyep parah

review: anak sy sakit trus di jemput sama ibu supir beliau mau mencari anak sy yg susah di hubungima ksh ibu supir sdh mau mencari anak sy yg sedang skt supirx bagus pelayananx
translated_review: My child was sick and picked up by a lady driver. She tried hard to find my child who was hard to contact. Thank you, lady driver, for helping find my sick child. Great service

review: makin nggak jelas semua dari pengembangan aplikasi sama drivernya terlalu lama nunggu malah menjauh malahan ini banyak driver minta di cancel

review: pengen tak viralin sekalian untuk grab car yang dapet promo 10 ribu slalu di perlakuin ga baik custnya untuk ac lampu gada yg di nyalain gila

review: suka pakai gojek dripda sbelahsupirnya suka cancelim alasan takut gelap la ini la itu lagojek driverny cepat2

review: agak kecewa sama drivernya padahal udah tertera harga dari lokasi ke tujuan cuma 35000 tapi driver malah pilih jalan yang lebih jauh untuk sampai ke tujuan dan harganya di naikin jadi 42000

review: driver mobil kebanyakan nolak padahal cm jarak 3 km tujuan nya ngga mau pd mundur aneh min

review: kenapa yah sya pesan driver saya dapat driver alya setelah chatan dan menunggu tetiba ditelpon driver sigra dengan nopol yang sama dan chat sya dengan driver alya hilang dari obrolan aneh

review: tolong dong diperiksa semua driver nyaaa apalagi daerah jambi kalo malam banyak yang pada upping price sampe 2 kali lipat bukan nya ga mampu tapi masa sampe segitu nya

review: driver b2260koe banyak ngeluhnya kalo ga punya jiwa melayani ga usah diambil jobnya udh minta tambahan terang2an penumpang disuruh keluar tengah jalan sakit itu driver

review: aplikasi gocar nya kurang bagus selalu di cencal terus alesannya jarak terlalu jauh dan harga terlalu murah macet lah bla bla bla bla

review: sangat susah mengguna apk ini saya harus menunggu berjamjam itu pun tidak di terima sombong sekali driver nya ini semua susah payah sekali ga beres ga jelas

review: aneh banget driver yang minta cancel berkalikali lah jadi saya yang rugi karena kena biaya tunggakan kocak

review: tolong mas mba nya bagian operator aplikasi gojek saya minta kalau mencari driver itu yg cepet karna kalau pesan gojek pas lagi buru2 itu biasanya lama tolong diperbaiki lagi
translated_review: Please, the operators at gojek, I ask that when searching for a driver it should be fast, because when ordering in a rush it usually takes too long, please fix it.

review: kecewa banget sama gojek sekarang sering banget bug trs susah banget dapet pengemuditrs sering dpt gojek yg bilang dh jalan padahal belum skrng ga mau pake lagi padahal sering make buat sekolah semenjak sering bgitu ga dlu

review: oknum driver diberi pengertian sebagai penyedia jasa utamakan kenyamanan pelanggan misalkan membawa kendaraan tidak ugal ugalan ramah jika kondisi mental tidak baik2 saja lebih baik istirahat saingan jasa transportasi lain banyak
translated_review: Drivers need to be educated as service providers to prioritize customer comfort, for example drive safely, be polite, and if their mental state isn’t good they should rest, many other transportation options out there.

review: saya pesen grab car supir nya di lempar2 terus maksudnya gimana inibikin kerja saya telattolong dong kerjasama nya kalau ga niat kerja gausah kerja bikin orang telat aja
translated_review: I ordered grabcar but the driver kept switching, what does that even mean, made me late for work, please cooperate, if you don’t want to work then don’t, you’re just making people late.

review: kenapa grab susah banget di buka padahal sinyal handphone saya aman aman ajasaya cek buat aplikasi sosmed sama browser lancartapi pas buka aplikasi grab malah gak bisa seolah olah sinyal nya gak adabagaimana dari pihak grab mohon penjelasannya

review: kenapa di aplikasi chat dan juga map tidak ada update nya sama sekali merugikan pihak driver dan juga konsumen
translated_review: Why are the chat and map in the app not updating at all, it harms both the driver and the customer.

review: sebagai saran untuk kedepannya lebih baik dan terbaik lagipihak maxim memberikan training atau edukasi aplikasi buat driver krn di area daerah makassar driver sebagian belum memahami tentang platform fee dan parking fee
translated_review: As a suggestion for the future, Maxim should provide training or education for drivers because in the Makassar area, some drivers still don’t understand platform fees and parking fees.

review: aplikasi lu terlalu beratgolek yg mb nya sama saja ketika menginstal buka aplikasi nya itu gk lebay lemot kaya grabparah nih aplikasi bukan nya di kembangkan biar lancar di semua hp entengini malah bikin susah customer
translated_review: Your app is too heavy, same as the others, when installed and opened it’s super laggy like grab, terrible app, instead of improving it to run well on all phones, it makes things harder for customers.

review: kalau semisalnya gocar gabisa tuh jangan diterima cobaudah nunggu hampir sejam gocarnya diem aja ga gerakudah beberapa kali pesen diterima ga gerak gerak aneh

review: alhamdulillah bagus ramah hanya saja sempat mendapatkan driver yg tdk sabar pmarah tampak angkuh sekali ingatan itu membekas sampai sekarang

review: sorry to say saya berdebat dengan pengendara karna ga punya attitude dengan cara membohongi pelanggan saya sering kasih uang lebih tanpa di minta pembayaran di aplikasi dengan yang di katakan pengemudi jauh berbeda
translated_review: Sorry to say, I argued with the driver because he had no attitude, lied to the customer, I often give extra money without asking, but what the driver says and what’s in the app are very different.

review: pelayanan cs kurang baikdan tidak sopan sebaiknya tutup aja aplikasi inidi tambah driver nya sombong sombong
translated_review: Customer service is bad and rude, better just shut down the app, plus the drivers are arrogant.

review: gojek kalau mau drivernya ngebahagian keluarganya jangan cuma suruh customer kasih tips dong tapi jangan gede gede potongannya pantes banyak driver minta bayaran offline

review: makin lama makin ga ada beres nya ini aplk gojek mesan gocar selalu di cancel pengemudi dan selalu susah buat dapati pengemudi tolong diperbaiki lagi la

review: saya kasi bintang 1 karna tiba tiba akun saya kena blokir padahal udah ajuin banding katanya karna sering melakukan pembatalan padahal baru bikin akun gojek baru

review: grab tuh banyak diskon keren cma drivernya aja klo kita pke diskon untuk berpergian kurang bikin nyaman giliran kemablian nya kita kasih aja berubah raut wajahnya wkwk

review: apknya bagus cuman ini ada saran dari saya tolong adain fitur ganti ratingbintang saya pernah salah kasih rating karena hp error padahal mau kasih bintang 5 kasian drivernya

review: makan tuh kebijakan buat driver pake sistem slot pengguna bayar mahal tp driver cuma dpt ongkos 5rb blm aja ntar juga lama2 di geruduk driver senasional aplikasi penjajah driver
translated_review: Take that policy where drivers use the slot system, users pay a lot but the driver only gets 5k, just wait, eventually all drivers will protest against this exploitative app.

review: mitra mu banyak jd pengemis online dengan tarif 5rb jd banyak di tinggali pelanggan mu krna merasa risih dengan meminta minta alias di kasihani

review: gocar sering gak respon gak jalan nunggu lama akhir nya di cancel nanti cari lg malah ambil yg jauh bgt

review: kondisi hujan reda udh pake comfort pelanggan prioritas biar cpet dpet driver udah 10 menit malah ga dapet sama sekali sekali dapet juga posisi jauh bener kena cancel juga sama driver
translated_review: Rain just stopped, used comfort and priority so it’d be faster to get a driver, waited 10 minutes and still got none, and the one I got was far away and canceled too.

review: aplikasi gojek tolol gua lagi zoomin peta malah balik zoom out gitu aja terus bikin darah orang naik aja udah gitu notif promo gak guna aja dibanyakin tiap hari

review: gojek semakin rakus dengan drivernya potongannya tidak manusiawi pelanggan bayar mahal yg d terima driver kecil

review: tolong klo driver sering cancel di kasih peringatan sumpah ya tiap pagi pasti selalu gitu di batalin terus alasan jauh lah ini lah itu lah padhal pake yg prioritas bukan yg hemat kadang juga nakal minta duit parkir padhal gk ada

review: tolong bilangin ke driver mu itu kalau nyetir sepeda itu yang cepet dong padahal jalannya sepi masih aja dilambatin nyetirnya cokk anj bangkrut aja luhh punya nya makarim bedes

review: sistem rating jangan bikin driver di suspend pak skarang bnyak pelanggan yg kurangajar padahal sudah dilayani dengan baik oleh driver cari solusi yg lebih baik untuk kenyamanan bersama

review: gojek emang ngebantu banget saat di situasi gaada temen buat nganteruntung nya ada apk ini nih yg mantul banget apalagi suka di kasih diskon makasih banget pokoknya hhe

review: makin kesini kebijakan buat castamer udah kaya kebijakan buat driver selalu di persulit tiap ada masalah

review: ini grab car error kah aplikasi nya bayar tunai gk bsa2 maupun pake superbank tolong ini akun saya tidak bisa di gunakan sama sekali sudah beberapa hari kepusat bantuan pun sudah mengadu tapi tidak ada solusi tanggapan apapun

review: pay later saya di blokir dari bulan dersember kenapa padahal pembayaran lancar bahkan sampai saat ini masih ada pembayaran yg lancar sampai bulan depan saya mau isi token listrik nih gimana udah malem nih hadehhhhh

review: terimakasih abang udah anterin bapa saya abang nya ramah dan humoris lancar terus rezekinya bangg
translated_review: Thank you brother for taking my father, you were friendly and humorous, wishing you lots of blessings

review: di mohon yaa maxim lebih di perbaiki lagi saya udah terlambat mau ke kampus ehh maximnya mencari pelaksana terdekat udah 2 jam saya nunggu minimal bgusin lagi kek saya ksih bintang 1
translated_review: Please improve Maxim, I was late to campus because Maxim took 2 hours searching for a driver, at least make it better, I’m giving 1 star

review: limit ganaik2 padahal lancar pembayaran pngajuan pinjaman 2x gagal apa yang harusd di banggakan dari aplikasi ini tdak seperti app sebelah padatin memori aja go unistall
translated_review: Loan application limit fluctuates even though payments go smoothly. Twice loan application failed. What is there to be proud of in this app? Not like the other app that’s full of memory, so I uninstalled it.

review: gojeknya bagus tapi rekanan pinjolnya yg sangat tidak ada etika dalam penagihan baru telat sehari tapi cara nagihnya sudah seolah olah nasabah tidak mau bayar padahal sudah cicilan kedua dari 3x cicilan dengan cara menakut nakuti nasabah
translated_review: Gojek is good but their loan partners have no ethics in collecting debts, just one day late and they act like the customer doesn’t want to pay, even though I’m on my second of three payments, threatening the customer

review: menurut pendapat subyektif kami pihak pengelola app ini memperlakukan kami dgn diskriminatif dan tdk memberika pelayanan yg terbaik seprti costumer lain semoga masukan ini dpt menjadikan bahan evaluasi demi kemajuan app ini semoga driver dan costumer yg membaca ini selalu sehat dan sukses
translated_review: In our subjective opinion, the app management treats us unfairly and doesn’t provide equal service like to other customers, hope this feedback helps improve the app, wishing health and success to drivers and readers

review: klo driver grabcar jngan seenak nya dong udah nunggu lama selalu di cancel sma driver nya seenak nya sajaa selaluu gtuu
translated_review: GrabCar drivers shouldn’t act like they own the place, kept waiting and they cancel freely, always like this

review: aplikasi tidak d sertai laporan darurat sehingga sulit untuk melakukan pengadun atas tindakan pelanggaran yg mungkin di lakukan driver2 nakal
translated_review: The app doesn’t include an emergency report, making it hard to report any violations by bad drivers

review: bagus sih sebenernya cuman tolong ya mohon untuk mengerti dengan para buyyerdriver dan yang lainya jika ada yang mengkritik dengan baik untuk kepentingan kita semua mohon di responya untuk developer jadi jangan diam saja seperti robot yang kehabisan baterai
translated_review: It’s actually good, but please understand feedback from buyers, drivers, and others, if someone gives polite criticism for the common good, please respond, don’t stay silent like a robot with a dead battery

review: drivernya songong udah nunggu setengah jam pas mau dket lokasi penjemputan malah di batalkan lagi buru malah di batalin terus kalau ga niat jadi driver gausah deh
translated_review: Driver was rude, waited 30 minutes, and when I got close, he canceled, then kept doing it, if you don’t want to be a driver, don’t be

review: bagus sih tapi manusnya gak semua kota ada gojek contohnya samosir tempat ramai gitu kok belum ada gojek
translated_review: It’s good but not all cities have Gojek, like Samosir, a crowded place, still no Gojek

review: hallo grab terima kasih untuk diskonnya yg banyak ini cuman map nya di di perbaiki karena driver sdh sampe di depan rumah tqpi d map driver masih d setengah jaln
translated_review: Hello Grab, thanks for all the discounts, but please fix the map, driver was already in front of my house but on the map still halfway

review: min tolong ada kan gojek donk apa gocar didaerah entikong soal nya gak ada satu pun gojek disini tapi kalau ada pasti laris soalnya belum ada satupun
translated_review: Admin, please bring Gojek or Gocar to Entikong area, there’s none here, if there was, it would definitely be popular

review: aplikasi bagus driver aja yg gk jelas pd suka cancel heran banget kalau kagak mau kerja y gk usah di aktifkan akunnya di cancel mulu buat gojek di seleksi lagi drivernya
translated_review: Good app, but the drivers are problematic, always canceling, if they don’t want to work, don’t activate their accounts, Gojek please re-screen drivers

review: alllhamdulilllah ramah banget dan mau menolong penumpang nyh bangus banget makasih pak udh mau menolong keluarga ku
