review: sejauh ini saya menggunakan gojek c baik saja yah dan saya harap kedepannya bisa semakin baik lagi
translated_review: So far my experience using Gojek has been good, and I hope it gets even better going forward

review: min mohon bantuan nya saya tidk bisa login ke akun taxse driver sayasoalnya nomer hp sya sudah tidak aktif
translated_review: Admin, please help, I can’t log in to my Taxsee Driver account because my phone number is no longer active

review: murah cmn lebih nyebelin dr gojek kalau ga mau nerima jgn d terima udah nunggu driver g gerak2
translated_review: Cheap but more annoying than Gojek, if you don’t want to accept, then don’t, waited and the driver didn’t move

review: udah 2 minggu gagal vermuk email sampe penuh laporan gojek semua mau traksansi susah di email gada penyelesaian yg pasti balesnya gitu2 aja konyol
translated_review: Two weeks of failed verification, my email inbox is full of Gojek reports, hard to make any transactions, no clear resolution, responses are repetitive, ridiculous

review: bpknya sabar dan baik menunggu ank sy yg jauh dr kotake bekasi muter2 nyari ank driver yg handal top bgt
translated_review: The driver was patient and kind, waited for my child from far away in Bekasi, even searched around, top-notch driver

review: sangat membantudi saat mau pergi kemana2 pas lagi ga ada kendaraan d rumah tarif nya terjangkau
translated_review: Very helpful when needing to go out and no vehicle at home, affordable fare

review: sering banget driver gocar minta di cancel yang rugi kita nunggu lama dan dia yang ga mau pickup kalau customer cancel kita dapetnya lagi makin lama kebiasaan harusnya yang minta cncel ke customer itu kena banned tolong kasih optional biar tidak merugikan customer
translated_review: So often Gocar drivers ask to cancel, we lose time waiting and they don’t want to pick up, if we cancel, we wait even longer, those who ask the customer to cancel should be banned, please add an option to avoid customer losses

review: akibat fiturnya pelayanan jadi gak ramah saya cuma telat satu menit ngambil garagara dipanggil dulu malah dimarahin sama ojolnya depan orang ramai
translated_review: Because of the app’s features, service becomes unfriendly, I was just one minute late picking up because I was called, but got scolded by the driver in front of a crowd

review: kak kok gabisa dibuat pesenpadahal baru download tabnya ini harus nya masih support app gojek baru pesen 7 tahun lalu pesennya tolong bantuannya waktu masuk app gojek malah putih doang
translated_review: Why can’t I place an order? I just downloaded the tab, it should still support the Gojek app, last ordered 7 years ago, please help, the app only shows a white screen

review: ongkos murah tapi drivernya aneh2 minta di cancel begitu di cancel ternyata drivernya datang mintanya offline saja
translated_review: Cheap fare, but weird drivers, ask to cancel, and after canceling, they still come and ask to go offline

review: pernah dapet driver namanya ardiansyah dari bandara menuju apartement kalibata driver nya baik sekali ramah dan sangat membantu
translated_review: Once had a driver named Ardiansyah from the airport to Kalibata apartment, he was very kind, friendly, and helpful

review: aplikasi boncos tarif minimum sudah menyentuh 10200 untuk layanan gocar kau kira apaan mobil pribadi kau hargai segitu jek mafia bgt kau aplikasi laknat
translated_review: This app sucks, minimum fare for Gocar is already 10,200, what do you think this is, your private car? Such a mafia app

review: akun saya tibatiba tidak bisa login ya allah padahal pencarian rezeki saya hanya digojek ini udah berjuang membangun nama gojek ini sampai sukses
translated_review: My account suddenly can’t log in. Oh God, this is my only income source. I’ve worked hard to build my name with Gojek.

review: padahal udah lama pake iniiii syg banget beralih ke sebelah karena saya sebagai pengguna lama makin lama malah makin mahal tarifnya mungkin bisa kasih pengguna lama voucher sekali teman saya yg baru pakai dapet voucher besaran mungkin marketingnya emg gitu yaa sedih aja sii
translated_review: I’ve used this for a long time, sad to switch to another app because as a long-time user, the fares kept increasing, maybe give loyal users a voucher too, new users get big vouchers, maybe it’s marketing, but still sad

review: aplikasi gak guna masa waktu hujan pesan gojekgocar gak dapat padahal di map ada lho gojekgocar yg gak jauh dari lokasi pemesananku bener aplikasi yg gak guna
translated_review: Useless app, during rain, can’t get a Gojek or Gocar, even though the map shows nearby ones, seriously a useless app

review: orangnya ramah dan sosialnya sangat tinggi dijamin puas bagi kalian kalo ketemu driver kayak mbaknyamakasih mbak
translated_review: Very friendly and social, guaranteed satisfaction if you meet a driver like her, thank you ma’am

review: biaya di aplikasi 25k pas sampe jd 29k di aplikasi drivernya isi e wallet lama masuknya isi 26k yang masuk cuma 22k dan ini perdana nyoba maxim tapi kesan pertama langsung bikin kecewa
translated_review: App said 25k fare, ended up 29k, driver’s e-wallet delayed, he entered 26k but only 22k received, first time trying Maxim, first impression was disappointing

review: dapat driver sangat lama layanan cs ga guna estimasi waktu saat tidak ada driver juga tidak berubah dan tidak berguna seenggaknya baikin dulu lah sistem nya buat kenyamanan customer
translated_review: Took forever to get a driver, customer service useless, estimated time didn’t change when no drivers were around, at least fix the system for customer comfort

review: baik sih cm apapun rutenya harusnya legowo berjuang jgn ngedumel dulu jln sempitlah bnyak kelok lah padahal kami siap byr lebih untuk itudan jalan sering dilalui car online
translated_review: It’s fine, but whatever the route is, be willing to go through it, don’t complain right away, narrow roads, many turns, we’re willing to pay more, the route is common for online cars

review: udah lama langganan gojek dan puas sayang sekarang tarif mahal dibanding aplikasi lain smoga pelanggan setia sering dikasih bonus
translated_review: Been a loyal Gojek user and satisfied, but now fares are more expensive than other apps, hope loyal users get more bonuses

review: liatt baik baik anjeeeng tujuan ga sampe sekilo masa ongkosnya sama dengan jarak yg 5 kilo kalo kek gini siapa yg mau pake goride mending gocarr lah selisih cuma 3 rebu
translated_review: Look closely, man, the destination is less than 1 km, but the fare is the same as for 5 km, if it’s like this, who’d want to use GoRide, better take GoCar, the difference is only 3k

review: tolong evaluasi mapgps dari tadi saya dihubungkan dengan driver yang jauh melulu udah lebih dari 10 kali
translated_review: Please evaluate the map/GPS, I keep getting connected with faraway drivers, happened more than 10 times

review: aku pakai maxim dari awal smp kurang lebih udah 4 tahun bagus banget drivers nya juga baik baik
translated_review: I’ve used Maxim from the start, almost 4 years, very good, the drivers are all kind

review: driver tidak sopan berbicara tidak sewajar nya ngejugde saya dengan sebutan buta padahal saya sudah nunggu 20 menit mempermalukan saya di tempat ramai bentak2 sangat kecewaaa padahal sya pengguna maxim cukup lamaaa tapi ini benar2 kelewatan sangat tidak rekomen
translated_review: Driver was rude, spoke inappropriately, judged me as blind even though I waited 20 minutes, embarrassed me in a crowd, shouted, very disappointed, I’ve used Maxim for a long time but this was too much, not recommended

review: trmksh bnyak driver sangat ramah dan baiktrmksh sdh membantu mngendong ank smp k rmh ank kondisi sakit trmksh sllu nerbuat baik ya omm
translated_review: Thank you so much — the driver was kind and helpful, even carried my sick child home. God bless you, sir. Always be kind like that.

review: ini gojek kenapa ya sekarang saya pakai akun baru biasanya suka ada voucher tapi voucher goride sekarang tidak ada tapi giliran saya beralih ke gocar ada 2 voucher tapi pas giliran saya buka voucher ternyata tidak ada voucher apakah bug tolong di perbaiki lahi
translated_review: What’s wrong with Gojek? I’m using a new account, usually there are vouchers, but Goride vouchers… (incomplete)

review: bayar mahal tapi banyak driver bilang nerima cuma 5 rb pesen goride driver depan mata banyak yang online dapatnya jauh jauh terus gojek gojek makin tidak fungsional
translated_review: Paid a lot but many drivers say they only receive 5,000 [rupiah]. Ordered GoRide with a driver right in front of me, many drivers were online, but I kept getting matched with faraway ones. Gojek is becoming more and more dysfunctional.

review: mohon maaf pindah ke toko sebelah selisihnya lumayan skrg gojek harganya naiklebih mahal dari toko sebelah padahal sering bgt pake sehari pp pake ojek terus
translated_review: Sorry, I’m switching to the competitor — the price difference is quite big now. Gojek's prices have gone up and are now more expensive than the other app, even though I used it often, round trip daily by bike.

review: gila harga aplikasi sebelah jauh lebih murah dan ramah disini harganya edunn banget diskonnya sedikit padahal udah lama banget pake gojek setia sekali
translated_review: Crazy, the other app’s prices are much cheaper and friendlier. Here, the prices are insanely high and the discounts are minimal, even though I’ve been using Gojek for a very long time and have been super loyal.

review: pembelian ga bisa dibatalkan padahal sudah minta bantuan beberapa kali ke gojek dan alasannya sama dan tidak masuk akal
translated_review: Purchase cannot be canceled even though i have asked for help from gojek several times and the reason is always the same and unreasonable

review: driver maxim pada jorok udh sesuai titik bilang ny gk sesuai titik giliran dikasih tau aplikasi customer mla driver nya diem
translated_review: The Maxim driver was dirty. Even though it was at the correct pickup point, he claimed it wasn’t. When the customer pointed it out through the app, the driver stayed silent.

review: saya boking driver tertera di aplikasi harga sampe tujuan cuma 16 ribu untuk 3 orangsudah smpai tujuan dimintanya 30rbu katanya per orang 10rbu andai aplikasi ini bisa ters kejujuran manusia yg jdi tukang drivernya apalah daya mau minta tolong sma siapa
translated_review: I booked a driver and the app showed the fare to the destination was only 16 thousand for 3 people. But when we arrived, he asked for 30 thousand, saying it was 10 thousand per person. If only this app could detect the honesty of its drivers. What can we do, who can we ask for help

review: kadng cepet pdsan gojek tp kdng klo udh samapi krena bawa ank suka ditolak ojol kadang suka sebel am gojek menfing maxim
translated_review: Sometimes Gojek responds fast, but sometimes once they see I have a child, they cancel. That’s annoying. I prefer Maxim instead

review: senang banget naik gojek seru dan menyenangkan terima kasih gojek sering kasih promo promo banyak banyak ayo cobakan gojek kawan kawan seru dan dapat promo
translated_review: Really happy riding with Gojek, it’s fun and enjoyable. Thank you, Gojek, for frequently giving lots of promos. Come on friends, try Gojek—it’s fun and you get promos

review: klo untuk maxim motor sih udh mantaap banget tapi klo untuk maxim mobilnya kurang baik kadang milih argo dan jarak penjemputan suka banget di cancel ga jelas dari drivernya harus di perbaiki lagi jasa maxim untuk driver mobilnya
translated_review: For Maxim motorcycles, it's already great, but for Maxim cars, it's not so good. Sometimes the driver insists on using the meter, and pickup distance often leads to unexplained cancellations. Maxim needs to improve their car service

review: gojek ngebug pesen malah gak keluar notif histori gak keluar map driver ga ada cuma keluar transaksi uang
translated_review: Gojek is buggy. When ordering, there are no notifications, no trip history, no driver map—only the payment transaction shows up

review: dlu saya pernh memakai aplikasi gojek dan bagus pelayanan sekarg saya mendownload nya lagi karena dlu hp syg hilang
translated_review: I used to use the Gojek app and the service was good. Now I downloaded it again because I lost my previous phone

review: ada pilihan jemput di lobi tapi supirnya g ada yg mau ke lobi semakin turun rating ada pilihan 2 tujuan di aplikasi tapi saat dibandara juanda katanya tidak bisa 2 tujuan
translated_review: There’s an option to be picked up at the lobby, but no driver wants to go there, so my rating keeps dropping. There’s also an option for two destinations in the app, but at Juanda Airport they said it’s not allowed

review: tolong turun kan ongkos akhir akhir ini ongkos gojek samgat mahal jika sepi penumpang sekarang itu wajar karena terlalu mahal
translated_review: Please lower the fares. Lately, Gojek fares are extremely expensive. It’s no wonder there are fewer passengers now—it’s just too pricey.

review: baaiikkk bgt bapak nya ramah juga lebih murah aplikasi ini dri pada aplikasi ojek yg lain
translated_review: Soo nice, the driver was friendly and this app is cheaper than other ride-hailing apps

review: pelayannnya mantep aku pengguna gojek beralih ke maxim overall aku puas banget sama pelayanan di maxim
translated_review: The service is excellent. I used to be a Gojek user but switched to Maxim. Overall, I'm very satisfied with Maxim's service.

review: perbarui lagi ya apk nya ta3k banget sama driver suka cancel suspend aja yg suka cancel atau mau saya kerjain para driver pesenpas sampe saya cancel
translated_review: Please update the app again. Drivers keep canceling, just suspend those who cancel or I’ll deal with those drivers myself. I order then cancel.

review: kasian bgt upah driver nya cuman di bayar goceng alias 5rb padahal sya bayar 22 rb ongkir kapitalisme bgt aplikasinya ga manusia wi potong an ke drivernya hampir 75 bukan 20 pa sehancur ini kah
translated_review: I feel so bad for the driver, they only got paid 5,000 even though I paid 22,000 for delivery. This app is so capitalistic and inhumane, taking nearly 75% instead of 20%. How did it get this bad

review: tarif mahal tidak sesuai dengan kendaraan yang bikin tidak nyaman kotor dan ac panas mau cari alamat juga tidak lengkap
translated_review: The fare is expensive but not worth the vehicle—it's uncomfortable, dirty, and the AC is hot. They also don’t even have a complete address to navigate

review: sedih akun saya di tuduh penyalahan promo promo pada akun saya hilang padahal teman saya hanya login melalui ponsel dan aplikasi gojek di hp saya memesan makan seharusnya itu tidak masalah karena saya tidak ada membuat akun lain dan hanya punya satu akun
translated_review: I'm sad my account was accused of promo abuse and I lost access to it. My friend only logged in through their phone and ordered food using the Gojek app on my phone. That shouldn't be a problem since I never created another account—I only have one

review: b1 menyala bos qu apk gojek sekarang cuma di bikin akaln demi meraup keuntungan yang besar sudah tidak meningkatkan pelayanan dan hanya bisa memeras driver nya sudah tidak pantas di sebut gojek karya anak bangsa
translated_review: Big brain move, boss. Gojek now only exists to rake in profits. They no longer improve service and just exploit their drivers. It’s no longer worthy of being called a product of the nation’s youth

review: kalo gk ada gojek mungkin akan selalu kejebak macet dan telat masuk kerjatpi semenjak pakai gojek aktifitas lancar tidak pernah terlambat kerja lagi terimakasih gojek
translated_review: If Gojek didn’t exist, I’d probably always be stuck in traffic and late for work. But since I started using Gojek, everything runs smoothly and I’m never late anymore. Thank you, Gojek

review: lebih di seleksi lagi drivernya yang bisa mikir punya attitude sopan santun kasi pinalty yang batalin sepihak tanpa ada konfirmasi
translated_review: Please be more selective with drivers—choose ones who can think and have manners. Penalize those who cancel unilaterally without confirmation

review: akhir ini sy kalo pesen grab dikasih pengemudinya yg jauh bgt udah gitu pencariannya lama bgt jd selalu buat sy telat kerja dan dipotong gajinya
translated_review: Lately, when I order Grab, I get assigned drivers who are very far away, and the search takes so long that I’m always late for work and get my salary deducted

review: dikasih driver yg jauh terus sedangkan driver grab di sebrang jln banyak ga ngerti lgi sama apk ini
translated_review: I keep getting assigned drivers who are far away, even though there are many Grab drivers right across the street. I don’t understand this app anymore

review: cari gocar lama bgt mau tf ke bank lain jg lama bgt loading nya ga muncul2
translated_review: Takes forever to find a GoCar. Also very slow when trying to transfer to another bank—keeps loading and doesn’t show up.

review: nyoba sistem maxim wallet isi untuk pertama kali menggunakan bank sebesar 30000 outputnya yang keluar malah 27000 ini siapa yang ngambil dalam keterangan cara pembayaran tidak ada biaya admin dan lebih parahnya lagi banyak drive yang menolak menggunakan maxim wallet dengan alasan sistem sedang eror
translated_review: I tried the Maxim Wallet system for the first time and deposited 30,000 through a bank, but only 27,000 showed up. Who took the rest? The payment instructions said there were no admin fees. Even worse, many drivers refuse to use Maxim Wallet claiming the system is having errors

review: saya memberikan laporan beberapa hari lalu terkait pelayanan driver tapi belum ditindak lanjuti sampai hari ini kenapa
translated_review: I submitted a report a few days ago regarding a driver’s service, but it hasn't been followed up until today—why?

review: sangat membantu juara sekali ramah pertahankan driver seperti ini si saat yang lain minta cancel minta tambahan biaya yang ini malah nggk mau si bayar karena sama2 jualan online juga
translated_review: Extremely helpful and very polite—keep drivers like this. While others ask to cancel or demand extra fees, this one didn’t even want to be paid because we both sell online

review: males ngawur email 30 akun keterangan udah dipakai semua padahal gak pernah nyentuh gojek sekalinya login dulu gak pake email malah kepakai email punya orang benerin gak
translated_review: So annoying—tried 30 email accounts and it said they were all used, even though I never touched Gojek. When I did log in before, it wasn’t even with an email. Now it's using someone else’s email. Can you fix it

review: aplikasi yang tidak manusiawi ke driver kami pelanggan bayar full tapi yg di terima driver cuman 5000 ribu dan potongan driver mencapai 50
translated_review: This app is inhumane to drivers. We as customers pay full fare, but the driver only receives 5,000, and the cut taken from drivers reaches 50%

review: tolong di perbaiki tarifargo nya agar adil buat driver dan juga customer dan juga perbaiki sistem maps nya agar mudah di pahami
translated_review: Please fix the fare rates so they’re fair to both drivers and customers, and also improve the map system to make it easier to understand

review: makin kesini makin buruk kualitas pelayan tidak sebanding dengan harga yang di bayar dan lebih parahnya driver ternyata yang di terima jauh bedanya dengan yang di bayar
translated_review: The service quality keeps getting worse, and it’s not worth the price paid. Even worse, the amount received by the driver is very different from what we pay

review: knp klo pesan gocar ad diskon pad nd sopan tolong yg nd sopan dan suka cancel customer seenaknya di tegur
translated_review: Why is it that when ordering GoCar with a discount, the drivers are rude? Please reprimand those who are impolite and like to cancel on customers at wil

review: parah kalo sudah hujan harganya tidak stabil sehingga drivernya jadi ga mau mengangkut penumpang karena berharap harga naik dan terus naik ga jelas manajemen nya ini
translated_review: Terrible, when it rains prices are unstable so drivers refuse to pick passengers hoping prices will go up. Management is unclear.

review: gw pengguna gojek udah lebih dari 2 tahun baru kali ini 3 bulan berturut kagaada voucher sama sekali kalo kaga beli padahal tiap hari gw selalu pake gojek lohh admin ayo mana kode promonya masa iya 3 bukan kaga ada promo sama sekali
translated_review: I’ve been a Gojek user for over 2 years, but for the past 3 months, there have been zero vouchers unless I buy them. I use Gojek every single day. Come on, admin—where are the promo codes? How can there be none for 3 straight months

review: tolong buat pusat grab perbaiki lagi jangan dikit di tangguhkan dan buat para driver jngn gampang melaporkan krna laporan km menghilangkan rezeki driver lainnya
translated_review: Please Grab HQ, improve your system — don't suspend drivers so easily, and tell drivers not to report over small things, because it affects other drivers’ incomes.

review: udah mahal cari driver susah trs bnyak driver yg kurang sopan akun saya udah jadi ank sultan karena saking lama dan seringnya saya pke gojek stelah hapir 6 thnan saya putuskan untuk pindah ke grab krna udah ga enak pke gojek
translated_review: It’s already expensive, hard to find drivers, and many are impolite. My account is like a “sultan” one because I’ve used Gojek for so long and so often. But after almost 6 years, I’ve decided to switch to Grab because Gojek just isn’t enjoyable anymore

review: suka bngt pake apk ini hanya saja pasti di pihak gojek sudah ada data mobil atau motor driver tolong jika pelanggan pesan comfort atau xl ya yg beneran jangan malah dikasih yang ga sesuai atau yg kecil sedikit kecewa tentang ini
translated_review: I really love using this app, but I’m sure Gojek has data on the drivers’ vehicles. So please, if a customer requests Comfort or XL, make sure they actually get the right type—not something smaller. This was a bit disappointing

review: terlalu mementingkan custumer suami g bisa narik seminggu krn bintang 1 customermemang kita seminggu g mkn g jajan apa anak2 tolong dunk gojek jgn main suspen minimal ada diskusi dl
translated_review: Gojek is too focused on customers. My husband couldn’t work for a week because of a 1-star rating from a customer. How are we supposed to eat or buy things for our kids? Please, Gojek, don’t just suspend drivers—at least have a discussion first

review: terlalu banyak kecewa nya pergi ke tempat wisata padahal deket dari stasiun ga ada yg pick up padahal di maps nya banyak driver
translated_review: So disappointing—went to a tourist spot near the station and couldn’t get picked up, even though the map showed lots of drivers around

review: tolong buat sistemnya agar bisa memblokir driver agar tdk ketemu lagi dengan driver yang di rasa kurang sopan
translated_review: Please create a system that allows users to block certain drivers so we don’t get matched again with those who are impolite

review: sekarang susah banget dapet driver mereka terlalu pilih pilih males pdhl saya selalu kasih tips udah bertahun tahun pake skrg kesel banget drivernya kalo gamau pick up yaudah langsung cancel aja jngn dibiarin kita nunggu lama lama gak gerak gerak gak mau konfirmasi juga
translated_review: Now it’s very hard to get drivers, they’re too picky and lazy. Even though I always tip, used the app for years. Now very annoyed. If you don’t want to pick up, just cancel immediately. Don’t make us wait long without moving or confirming.

review: hai min saya mau komplen kenapa yaa sekarang gojek tuh susah bgt dpet drivernyaa ga kayak dulu langsung cepet dpet sekarang bahkan sampe 30 menitan dpet drivernyaa mohon diperbaiki untuk kendala ini terimakasih
translated_review: Hi admin, I want to complain—why is it so hard to get a driver on Gojek now? It used to be fast, but now it takes up to 30 minutes. Please fix this issue, thank you

review: bugs apk nya perbaiki donk udah 3 kali kejadian yg jemput nya doubel kasihan driver nya
translated_review: Please fix the bugs in the app. It’s already happened 3 times that two drivers showed up to pick me up. I feel bad for the drivers

review: driver cancel didepan mata saya saat di lobby bahkan saya sudar teriakteriak memanggil driver tersebut dibantu dengan orangorang sekitar saya yg menunggu jemputan juga ntah ada konsekuensinya atau tidak dari pihak grab
translated_review: The driver canceled right in front of me at the lobby—even after I was shouting and calling out to them, with others around helping me. I wonder if there will be any consequences from Grab for this

review: sepertinya dept colector pinjaman online sudah mulai memakai fitur chat gojek untuk menerror pengguna akunjujur saya memang menggunakan peminjaman online jatuh tempo 3 hari lagi tapi seperti biasa sdh ditagihsekarang dc sudah mulai menggunakan fitur chat gojek
translated_review: It seems like online loan debt collectors are now using the Gojek chat feature to harass users. Honestly, I did take a loan that’s due in 3 days, but they’ve already started collecting. Now they’re even using Gojek’s chat feature

review: gojek sudah lebih baik dan oke thank you buat promo2 nya gojek jaya terus dalam melayani konsumen dan mitra
translated_review: Gojek has improved and is doing well. Thank you for the promos. Keep thriving in serving customers and partners

review: kenapa ya saya kalo pesen selalu di cancle sampe 5x loh udah buru buru tolong ya ini gojek
translated_review: Why is it that whenever I order, it keeps getting canceled—up to 5 times! I was in a hurry. Please fix this, Gojek

review: selama ini sy pakai grab sih oke2 sj hanya saja tolong perbaiki di map nya untuk rute perjalanan tolong diarahkan ke jalan yang benar yaa jangan diarahkan ke jalan alternatif di map nya dan berikan banyak reward buat pengemudi kan dipotong ongkosnya uda gede
translated_review: So far, using Grab has been okay. Just please improve the map for routing—guide us through the correct roads, not alternate ones. Also, give more rewards to the drivers since a large portion of their earnings is already deducted

review: driver terbaik bintang nya kalo ada 10 tak kasih nya 11 pelayanan sangat luar biasa baik nya
translated_review: Best driver, if I could give 10 stars, I’d give 11. Very excellent service.

review: saya pelanggan setia grabkarna kemana2 naik grabgrab sangat membantu sy tarifnya jg tdk mahalkebanyakan sy ksh bintang 5 tp ada jg sesekali sy ksh bintang 1 sepwrti yg barusan drivernya chat saya dgn kata2 yg kurang pantasmohon ditindaklanjuti
translated_review: I’m a loyal Grab customer because I always travel with Grab. Grab really helps me, and the fares aren’t expensive. Most of the time I give 5 stars, but occasionally I give 1 star — like just now, the driver messaged me with inappropriate words. Please follow up on this

review: fitur one tap sebaiknya dihapus saja kadang kita sebagai user belum tahu jika dengan menekan tombol itu maka gojek akan langsung ter pesan yang awalnya hanya ingin cek promo jadi kepesan gojek
translated_review: The one-tap feature should be removed. Sometimes, as users, we don't realize that tapping the button means Gojek will immediately be ordered, when we just wanted to check promotions

review: jangan beri ruang untuk saingan mu jadikan dirimu nomer 1 di indonesia jek stay in gojek arahan sedikit tolong kurangi pemasukan ke kantong pribadi anda jadi senantiasa costumer lebih murah dan mendapatkan perjalanan lebih baik aman dan nyaman
translated_review: Don’t give room to your competitors. Make yourself number one in Indonesia, Jek! Stay in Gojek. Just a small suggestion: reduce your personal profits a bit so that customers can enjoy cheaper, better, safer, and more comfortable rides

review: enggaakkk bangettt masa katanya mencari pelaksana terdekat tapi kok nga ada udah itu di tolak semuanya lagi
translated_review: This is so frustrating! They said they were looking for the nearest service provider, but none were available, and all requests were rejected too

review: tolonglah grabcar xl nyalakan kembali karena grabcar new plus terlalu mahal bagi kita yang menengah tolong grabcar xl kembalikan dear pt grab indonesia
translated_review: Please bring back GrabCar XL. GrabCar New Plus is too expensive for middle-class users. Please return GrabCar XL, dear PT Grab Indonesia

review: tlg buatkan fitur foto shg pelanggan bisa mengirimkan lokasi akurat ke driver sprti gab dan gek kasian cari2an terimakasih
translated_review: Please create a photo feature so customers can send accurate locations to drivers like in Gab and Gek. It's tiring searching for each other. Thank you

review: mahal kalo jauh dari kota tak ada driver grab yg punya orang malaysia mending saya pakai hijau yg sebelah
translated_review: It’s expensive if you're far from the city, and there are no Grab drivers — they’re owned by Malaysians. I'd rather use the green app next door

review: very good tolong pertahankan tarif murah 75009500 selama sebulan itu sangat membantu kami pencari uang juga kami bisa berhemat untuk biaya transportasi
translated_review: Very good! Please maintain the cheap fare of 7500–9500 for a month. It really helps us who are working and helps save on transportation costs

review: pada apk gojek pelanggan notif chat tidak muncul yg biasanya warna merah muncul di pojok kanan atas chat kemudian pesan gojek lama betul pedahal sekitar saya pesan ada driver malah yg jauh dapetnya
translated_review: On the Gojek app, customer chat notifications don’t appear — usually, there’s a red mark in the top right of the chat icon. Also, Gojek takes a long time to find a driver, even when nearby drivers are available, but we get assigned distant ones

review: aplikasi yg pengen untungnya aja tidak mementingkan driver kalo ada perusahaan lain yg mau kerjasamabisnis dengan grab paling semangat tapi liat kalo driver nya ngeluh pengen mengungkapkan perasaan selama dilapangan ehh malah pura pura ga denger dasar kacang lupa kulitnya
translated_review: The app only wants profit and doesn't care about drivers. If another company wants to collaborate with Grab, you get excited. But if a driver complains or wants to express feelings from the field, you pretend not to hear — ungrateful

review: baru ku install langsung nyoba grabcar dapet lebih murah 10k dari apps ijo sebelah eh giliran udah jalan kok beda arah jalan nya beneran pas sampai tujuan di todong yg harga awal 80 10tol jadi 150 alasan nya macet lah di maps aja lancar gajelas
translated_review: Just installed it and tried GrabCar — got a cheaper rate by 10k compared to the green app. But during the ride, the route changed! When we arrived, they demanded 150 instead of the original 80–100, saying it was traffic, even though Maps showed clear roads. Nonsense

review: aplikasinya lemot saya bayar pakai kaspro karena lemot masuk nya si driver minta chas jadi nya dobel bayar nya parahh
translated_review: The app is slow. I paid using KasPro, but due to the lag, the driver asked for cash — I ended up paying double. Terrible

review: driver sangat baik ramah penjeputan cepat bawa motornya halus sangat nyaman berkendara dgn maxim
translated_review: The driver was very nice and polite, pickup was fast, the ride was smooth — very comfortable riding with Maxim

review: nggk pernah dapat driver yg dekat selalu yg jauh padahal diseputaran saya byk yg dekat driver nya
translated_review: Never get nearby drivers — always distant ones, even though many are nearby

review: goride hemat jangan di taro bawah dongtaro paling ataskalo orang yg gatau ngiranya goride hematnya gaada
translated_review: Please don’t place GoRide Hemat (budget rides) at the bottom. Put it at the top. People unfamiliar with the app might think GoRide Hemat doesn’t exist

review: semakin lama semakin ga jelas promo tersedia kok mau cari menu yang lain promonya hilang anehh tolong diperbaiki
translated_review: It’s getting weirder over time. When a promo is available and you look for other menus, the promo disappears. Weird. Please fix it

review: tolong dong grab beberapa kali pesen grab motor slalu ga bergerak dari titik awal di chat pun ga ada balasan dari driver mau ga mau batalinlebih dari 10 menit nunggu perbaiki dong kualitasnya maps juga sulit buat di zoom
translated_review: Please Grab, fix this: several times when ordering GrabBike, the driver never moves from the starting point, and there’s no reply to chats. I have to cancel after waiting more than 10 minutes. Also, the maps are hard to zoom in

review: gojek sekarang mtrnya kadang ga sesuai dengan yg dia pake dan yg dia daftar di aplikasi l kadang ada mtr yg maaf kurang layak buat dipake tapi tetap dipake buat narik bukannya saat pendaftaran ada minimal tahun kendaraan ya
translated_review: Gojek drivers sometimes use a different motorbike than what’s registered in the app, and sometimes the motorbike is in poor condition — not fit for service. Isn’t there a minimum vehicle year requirement during registration

review: gojek kalo nyewain motor listrik ke driver di cek dulu keadaan motornya layak atau engga jangan driver udah bayar untuk sewa tapi dapet motornya yg ga layak sedangkan di aplikasi yg di nilai drivernya
translated_review: If Gojek rents out electric motorbikes to drivers, please check their condition first. Don’t let drivers pay to rent only to receive unfit vehicles, while in the app it’s the drivers who get rated

review: 2 kali pesen nunggu 2 jam lebih gak dapet driver pas mau di batalin malah di tolak sama gojeknya maksud nyaa apaahh yaaaa keburu tengah malem nungguin nyaaaa
translated_review: I ordered twice and waited over 2 hours, no driver accepted. When I tried to cancel, Gojek rejected it. What was that about? I ended up waiting until midnight.

review: sy berharap dari pihak grab agar lebih meningkatkan kesejahteraan para driver karena adanya mereka perusahaan grab menjadi lebih sukses dan kaya tetapi kasihan driver hidupnya tidak ada yg sejahtera hanya menguntungkan pihak grab sematatdk peduli nasib dan keadaan para drivernyahidup ojol
translated_review: I hope Grab improves driver welfare. Because of them, Grab has become successful and rich. But sadly, the drivers don’t live prosperously — only benefiting Grab while ignoring the drivers’ conditions. Long live the ojol (online motorcycle taxi) drivers

review: peta belum real time saat penentuan lokasi tidak ada titik lokasi sayapenumpang jadi penumpang mengarahkan titik secara manual dan bs berpotensi salah titik driver ok dan ramah
translated_review: The map isn’t real-time when setting the location; there's no passenger location point, so passengers have to manually set it, which can lead to errors. The driver was okay and friendly

review: berdasarkan pengalaman saya akhir ini menggunakan grab kenapa mendapatkan driver jarak nya cukup jauh ya dari titik penjemputan
translated_review: Based on my recent experience using Grab, why do I often get drivers who are quite far from the pickup point

review: grab selalu terdepan dan semoga selalu membantu driver di jalan dan stop mempersulit driver terima kasih
translated_review: Grab is always at the forefront, and hopefully, it will continue to support drivers on the road and stop making things difficult for them. Thank you

review: ini gimana sih aplikasinya saya ga bisa hubungi driver dan di drivernya kebatal padahal ga ada yang batalin
translated_review: What’s going on with this app? I can’t contact the driver, and it shows the driver canceled, even though no one canceled

review: tambahin lg promo grabike buat penumpang yg tiap hr pakai jasa ojek online grab bike terimakasih
translated_review: Please add more GrabBike promos for passengers who use GrabBike services daily. Thank you

review: kasih paham para pekerja nya kalo mau kerja jangan pilih pilih kerjaan banyak driver tapi di waktu tertentu alasanya yg pesen lagi rame tolong
translated_review: Educate your workers not to be picky with orders. There are many drivers, but at certain times they say it’s busy with orders. Please fix this

review: tarif terlalu mahal jarak dekat 25k tidak masuk akal dan jika ada promo juga susah untuk di ambil
translated_review: The fare is too expensive — 25k for a short distance is unreasonable, and even when there are promos, they’re hard to claim

review: mau masuk akun disuruh verifikasi wajah gagal terus ga jelas nih gojek saya mau ada perlu jadi ga bisa ngapain
translated_review: I keep failing face verification when trying to log into my Gojek account. It’s unclear. I need it for something important, and now I can’t do anything

review: biar apa coba konsumen pakai verifikasi wajah mau log in jadi gagal terus emang wajah orang ga rubah ya kalo tambah umur kacau mau transaksi di gojek jadi males ribet bye gojelk
translated_review: What’s the point of face verification for login if it just keeps failing? People’s faces change over time. This is messed up — I don’t feel like using Gojek anymore, it’s such a hassle. Bye, Gojek

review: gocar drivernya pada jual mahal pada sombong saya sudah 4x di cancel kalau gamau nyopir jangan daftar jadi driver gocar
translated_review: GoCar drivers are charging high fares and acting arrogant. I’ve had four cancellations already. If you don’t want to drive, don’t sign up as a GoCar driver

review: susah dapet driver gocar kalo cuaca lagi hujan atau saat posisi rute jauh sebaiknya dibenahi lagi
translated_review: It’s hard to get a GoCar driver when it’s raining or for long routes. This needs improvement

review: driver gocar terkadang susah untuk nganter konsumen dengan alasan jauh lah jemput nya sebagai nya inti nya driver tidak mau jemput tapi lucu nya saat minta pembatalan harus konsumen yang ngebatalin pada hal konsumen mau menunggu
translated_review: GoCar drivers often refuse to pick up passengers, giving excuses like the pickup is too far, etc. But ironically, if you ask them to cancel, they want you to cancel, even when you’re willing to wait

review: seharusnya nasabah jago jadi prioritas pada promo dan ongkir digojek niatnya buka bank jago biar dapat promo dan gratis ongkir di gojek tapi kenyataan sama aja kaya pembayaran yg lain
translated_review: Jago Bank customers should be prioritized for promos and free delivery on Gojek. I signed up for Jago to get those benefits, but it turns out it’s no different from other payment methods

review: pengemudi saputra hair ludin dengan motorcycle warna hitam nopol bp2026kb selamat menikmati perjalanan anda rating 490 bugusramahbaik
translated_review: Driver Saputra Hair Ludin with a black motorcycle and license plate BP2026KB — enjoy your ride, he’s great, friendly, and nice. Rating: 490

review: pilihannya sih ada ya gocar hemat dll tapi kalonmilihnya hemat gak ada driver yg mau ambil giliran ganti yg prioritas langsung ada driver lawak
translated_review: There are options like GoCar Hemat (economy) and such, but when you choose Hemat, no driver wants to take it. The moment you switch to priority, a driver shows up. What a joke

review: tolong buatkan fitur laporan tapi anonim agar para pelanggan bisa memberikan laporan secara aman karena saya telah memesan gocar comfort tapi tidak nyaman dan sedikit tertekan terimakasih atas perhatiannya
translated_review: Please create an anonymous report feature so customers can report safely. I booked GoCar Comfort but it wasn’t comfortable, and I felt a bit pressured. Thank you for your attention

review: apk nyaa sulit untuk ke adaan kita lagi darurat tapi kalo lagi santai apk nyaa bgus tapi setiap kita membatalkan harga gojek atau goride menambah
translated_review: The app works well when we’re relaxed, but in emergencies, it’s difficult. Also, whenever we cancel a Gojek or GoRide booking, the price increases

review: disaat lagi butuh banget susah sekali cari gojek padahal udah dari jm 6 pagi ni udah jam 8 ga ada sekali kesel
translated_review: When you really need a Gojek, it’s super hard to find one. I’ve been trying since 6 a.m., and now it’s 8 a.m. — still nothing. So frustrating

review: udh ditunggu dari jam 5 ga otw otw driver nya akhir nya pas udh mau buka minta dibatalin lol
translated_review: Waited since 5 a.m. and the driver never showed up. Just when I was about to cancel, they asked me to cancel. Lol

review: bintang 4 dulu yah kadang kalo ambil gojekgocar hemat driverrider pada ga mau pick up kalo memang tidak menguntungkan untuk para mitra ya ga usah ada gocargojek hemat bikin sebel aja
translated_review: I’m giving 4 stars for now. Sometimes when I pick GoCar Hemat, the drivers don’t want to pick me up. If the service isn’t profitable for drivers, just remove GoCar Hemat. It’s annoying

review: saya kalau sudah di banda aceh kalau pakai ojek tetap maxim cara pakai mudah biaya pun lebih murah terimakasih
translated_review: When I’m in Banda Aceh and use motorcycle taxis, I still prefer Maxim. It’s easy to use and cheaper. Thank you

review: drivernya lebih banyak yang ramah dan baik hati cuma sebagian kecil aja yang ngeselin bravo gojek
translated_review: Most drivers are friendly and kind, only a small portion are annoying. Bravo, Gojek

review: maxin sangat ribet menentukan lokasi tidak seperti gojek atau grab sangat kecewa mohon di evaluasi kembali apk maxim
translated_review: Maxim is so frustrating when it comes to setting a location — not like Gojek or Grab. Very disappointed. Please reevaluate the app.

review: jika ada kendala dg driver solusinya tdk tepat karena respon hanya berupa bot sementara permasalahan tdk tercover dlm solusi yg diberikan dlm percakapan bot
translated_review: If there’s a problem with a driver, the solution given isn’t accurate because the response is just a bot, while the issue isn’t covered by the bot’s answers

review: sistem terlalu ribet buat nyari driver yang cepat harus bayar tambahan lagi kalau tidak mau nunggu untuk dapat driver sama 10 menit lebih lamalama makin mencekik user ini aplikasi
translated_review: The system is too complicated to get a quick driver. You have to pay extra if you don’t want to wait. Sometimes it takes over 10 minutes to get a driver. This app is squeezing users

review: ga usah kasih menit kalo driver gabisa dateng sesuai menit an sebel mana driver ada yang ga jujur teruss nyebelinnya itu kadang ada driver suka marah marah dari admin maxim juga slow res bgt
translated_review: Don’t give an estimated arrival time if the driver can’t come on time. Worse, some drivers are dishonest. What’s annoying is sometimes drivers get angry. The Maxim admin response is also very slow

review: kl grab car atau bike tlg jangan kasih driver yg posisi macet parah masa penumpang tunggu in 2 jam nga masuk akal woi tlg di perbaiki
translated_review: For GrabCar or GrabBike, please don’t assign drivers who are stuck in heavy traffic. Passengers waiting for 2 hours is not acceptable. Please fix this

review: pas lagi hujan walau cuman gerimis doang susah banget dapet driver gojek udah gitu jauh semua posisinya
translated_review: When it’s raining, even just drizzling, it’s very hard to get a Gojek driver. And those available are all far away

review: baru pertama x pakai maxim udah dikasih bonus kereeen maxim sukses selalu buat para driver
translated_review: First time using Maxim and I got a great bonus. Great job Maxim, success always for your drivers

review: selama ini aman aman ajacuma kadang suka sebel klw pas masuk grab carkecium bekas driver habis ngerokok nafas jdi sesakgk nyaman jadinya dan ini sekarang kenapa aplikasi saya gk bisa bukaudh bbrp harieror terus
translated_review: So far it’s been fine, but sometimes I get annoyed when I enter GrabCar and smell cigarette smoke from the previous driver’s seat, making it uncomfortable. Also, why can’t I open the app these days? It keeps showing errors for several days

review: driver pada jauh jadi lama tolong perbaiki lagi sistemnya jarak driver sama cs tidak lebih dari 2km jadi tidak nunggu lama
translated_review: Drivers are far away so it takes a long time. Please improve the system so the distance between driver and customer is no more than 2km to avoid long waits.

review: menyediakan pelayanan publik yang menyenangkan baik driver yang ramah dan armada baik tetap semangat sukses berkah bagi semua
translated_review: Providing enjoyable public service with friendly drivers and good vehicles — keep it up, wishing success and blessings for all

review: aplikasinya sangat membantutapi tlnglah jarak jemput jangan terlalu jauhkemarin saya pesan khusus penumpang drivernya minta di batalin karena jaraknya terlalu jauh mau nggak mau ya harus saya batalkan
translated_review: The app is very helpful, but please don’t let the pickup distance be too far. Yesterday I booked a special ride but the driver asked to cancel because the distance was too far. I had no choice but to cancel

review: tolong pemilihan driver nya lebih diseleksi lagi laah orang tua atau aki kalo bisa dihold dulu udah 2x ngalamin dapet orang tua jalanya lelet ngantukan kagetan pula
translated_review: Please select drivers more carefully. If the driver is elderly or very old man, maybe hold them back. I’ve twice gotten elderly drivers who walk slowly and look sleepy, which was surprising

review: pengemudi ade humaedi dengan motorcycle warna hitam nopol a5900nl selamat menikmati perjalanan anda rating 495 asik di ajak berbicara sopan dan ramah
translated_review: Driver Ade Humaedi with a black motorcycle, license plate A5900NL — enjoy your ride, rating 495, fun to talk to, polite and friendly

review: maaf mau nanya baru daftar gojek kok tiba tiba nama nya sama email nya bukan punya saya yah padahal nomor hp nya nomor saya yang tahu kenapa tolong bantuannya terimakasih
translated_review: Sorry, I want to ask. I just registered with Gojek but suddenly my name and email aren’t mine, though the phone number is mine. Do you know why? Please help, thank you

review: jalan dari kost ke kantor udah selesai di cor tapi ini tarif nya masih tarif lama yang muter tolong dong di update
translated_review: The road from my boarding house to the office has been paved, but the fare is still calculated based on the old, longer route. Please update it

review: driver pilihpilih pembayaran menggunakan ewallet tdk ada yg mau tpi klo pke tunai minta lebih susah juga nyari driver yg mau jemput alasannya jauh terus minta naik harga
translated_review: Drivers are picky about payment using e-wallets; no one wants to accept it, but if you pay cash, it’s even harder to find drivers willing to pick you up. Their excuse is that the distance is too far, and they want to increase the price

review: maxim ini sudah bagus apk nya tapi tolong demi kenyamanan bersama di perbaiki lagi titik lokasi nya driver suka marah sama saya karena titik tidak sesuai ujung ujungnya saya harus memberi biaya tambahan karna tidak sesuai titik
translated_review: Maxim’s app is good, but please improve the location feature. Drivers often get angry with me because the pickup point doesn’t match, and I end up paying extra for the wrong location

review: sangat kecewaa dengan sistem pembatalan pembelian yg sudah di klik tapi tetap diproseeess semogaa lekas bangkrut gojek
translated_review: Very disappointed with the cancellation system — even after clicking cancel, the process continues. I hope Gojek goes bankrupt soon

review: tolong yaa buat perekrutan driver nya cri yang benar benar punya akhlakyg saya dpat driver nya selalu yg kyk ga berpendidikan ga tau atitude dalam bekerjaga profesional
translated_review: Please recruit drivers who truly have good morals. The drivers I get often seem uneducated, don’t know how to behave, or work professionally

review: lambat sudah naikin harga pun tak da yang mau jemput sye dikota besar pun mcm tak da driver yg mau ambik
translated_review: It’s slow; even after raising prices, no one wants to pick me up. Even in a big city, it feels like no drivers want to accept orders

review: setiap pesan gocar mau hemattidak jam malam gk ada yg nerima padahal ada banyak sekitaran daerah saya di stasiun prambanan heran
translated_review: Every time I order GoCar Hemat, no one accepts at night, even though there are many around my area at Prambanan station. Strange.

review: aplikasi gojek apa yg selalu lama dalam jemput customer bilangnya 1 menit tp bisa datang 5 menit kemudian ga jelsss ga usah pakai apk ini
translated_review: Gojek always takes a long time to pick up customers. Says “1 minute,” but comes in 5. Not clear. Don’t bother with this app.

review: gojek sekarang kacau tidak manusiawi banget potongan harga nya miris driver2 sekarang banyak yang ngeluh karena potongan nya pelanggan bayar gede tapi masuk ke driver miris kasian
translated_review: Gojek is messed up now, very inhumane with the fare cuts. Many drivers complain because the cuts are heavy. Customers pay a lot, but drivers get very little. It’s sad, I feel sorry for them

review: baik sekali drivernya ramah tidak sombong sangat membantu terimakasih banyak ya pak semoga kebaikannya di balas oleh allah
translated_review: The drivers are very kind, friendly, not arrogant, and very helpful. Thank you so much, sir. May your kindness be rewarded by Allah

review: tarif grabbike atau grabcar tanpa hematterlalu mahalsdgkan tarif di aplikasi driver ternyata sangatlah murahadilkah andamemberatkan pemesanmenyulitkan drivermenguntungkan andadrpd demikian kenapa anda tidak buat sistem tarif dr jarak driver brangkatkasian drivertengah mlm malah makin murahmikir
translated_review: GrabBike or GrabCar fares without the economy option are too expensive, but driver fares on the app are very cheap. Is this fair? You burden the customers, make it difficult for drivers, and profit yourself. If so, why not make a fare system based on the driver’s starting distance? Feel sorry for drivers working late at night with increasingly cheap fares — think about it

review: bug di apknya minta ampun tiap msk apk slalu lodingnya lama ngeleg parah sampe buat hp saya kayak error mau jawab pesan dari driver aja bikin susah ini engga ad mau perbaikin ap
translated_review: The app is full of bugs. Every time I open it, the loading is slow and laggy, making my phone feel like it’s malfunctioning. Even replying to driver messages is hard. No one wants to fix this app

review: kirain cuman saya ajah ternyata banyak juga yang komplain dikasih driver yang jauh pantesan ga kasian sama driver dan pelanggan sekalian kasih driver dari pulau seberang
translated_review: I thought it was just me, but many people complain about being assigned drivers who are far away. No wonder, no consideration for drivers or customers, sometimes drivers come from an entirely different island

review: saya pribadi sudah lama pakai aplikasi inidan sangat membantusukses buat gojek dan pertahankan layanannyasukses buat gojekdan drivernya pada sehat semua dan semoga rezeqinya ngalir terus yasemuanya terimakasihdan tetap semangat
translated_review: Personally, I have used this app for a long time and it’s very helpful. Success for Gojek, keep the service going strong. Wishing health and continuous blessings for all the drivers. Thank you and keep up the spirit

review: alogaritma mu benerin masa ada driver deket malah di kasih jauh lokasinya ga semua orang mau nunggu ya
translated_review: Fix your algorithm. How come when there is a driver nearby, the system assigns one far away? Not everyone wants to wait

review: parahpesen goride skrg mahal jrk ke rmh cm 4 km 18 rbu biasany 10 rbuskrg g ada lg voucher utk pnumpang voucher hny brlaku bgi yg memiliki kartu kredit sgla bank
translated_review: It’s bad now, ordering GoRide is expensive. The trip home is only 4 km but costs 18k. It used to be 10k. Now there are no more vouchers for passengers, vouchers only apply to those with credit cards from certain banks

review: kalau perusahaan yang banyak menipu hasil driver dan pembayaran nya dan bayak melakukan kecurangan biaya kepada customer akhir nya buat app pun seperti di kerjakan oleh tangan haram makin hari makin tidak becus semua kerja karyawan dan teknisi perusahaan goto
translated_review: If the company cheats drivers on payment and commits fraud with customers, it’s like the app is made by dishonest hands. Every day the employees and technicians at Goto company get worse at their jobs

review: saya mesen tunai bayar juga k drivernya tapi ada keterangan bayar nontunai agar bsa menyelesaikan pemesanan berikutnya padahal uda bayar

review: bagus aplikasinya driver goride selalu bagus pelayanannya cuma minus driver mobilnya aja kebanyakan kayak minus attitude
translated_review: The app is good; GoRide drivers always have good service. The only downside is many car drivers have bad attitudes

review: kebanyakan di cancel rata rata gojek ad yg ngebales chat tpi ujung ujungnya ttp di cancel setelah 35 menit buang waktu

review: saya sangat suka pakai aplikasi gojek tiap hari saya pakai goride untuk berangkat sekolah tapi banyakin vouchernya dong kadang saya sebagai pelajar yang tiap hari menggunakan gojek sangat menguras uang kalau tidak ada voucher murah terimakasih
translated_review: I really like using Gojek; I use GoRide every day to go to school. Please give more vouchers. As a student who uses Gojek daily, it drains my money if there are no cheap vouchers. Thank you

review: tiap pesan gocar selalu dicancel sama driver nya ngak cuma sekali dua kali padahal kita pakenya go car biasa bukan yang hemat mengecewakan sekali

review: coba tolong setiap bulannya dari pihak maxim ada pengecekan kendaraan drivernya terutama mobil saya 2x naik maxim mobil dlm keadaan kotor dan bau tidak sedap gak nyaman banget rasa mual saya slama di perjalanan cium aroma didalam mobil
translated_review: Please have monthly vehicle checks for Maxim drivers, especially cars. Twice I rode in Maxim cars that were dirty and smelled bad — very uncomfortable and made me nauseous during the ride

review: agak kecewa nih sama gojek gojek kenapa sih setiap pas lagi hujan trs pesen grap kenapa banyak yang cancel klo gak minta cancel dengan alasan kejauhan rute penjemputan tolong dong gojek
translated_review: I’m a bit disappointed with Gojek. Why is it that every time it rains and I order Grab, many drivers cancel or ask to cancel, saying the pickup route is too far? Please fix this, Gojek

review: selama ini saya selalu pakai aplikasi grab oke ajj ga ada kendala apa tidak ada keluhan apa kadang ada diskon hahahaa mantap semoga selalu meningkatkan kualitas aplikasi dan driver nya yg lebih penting terimaakasih
translated_review: So far I’ve always used Grab and it’s okay, no problems or complaints. Sometimes there are discounts, haha. Great. Hope the app and drivers continue to improve. Thank you

review: aplikasi gak guna jangan didownload ngak sesuai aplikasinya saya mau mencari tujuan ngak keluar sama sekali tidak jelas alamatnya

review: tolong jangan sakiti driver gojek dgn program2 kalianadanya kami drver adanya gojek dan adanya juga castamer kalian blunder kalau menyakiti driverbelajarlah sejarah berdirinya gojek jangan lupa belajar pakai hati

review: tolong lah grab mapnya di update di gojek aja mapnya terbaru ini di grab lokasi saya malah ga keliatan kesian driver suka nyasar gua harap ini bisa di baca

review: promo hanya untuk akun tertentu hal ini sangat tidak adil apalagi untuk pengguna yg sudah lama menggunakan aplikasi gojek tolong untuk peraturannya diubah agar semua user bisa menikmati promo yg sama tanpa pilih kasih
translated_review: Promo is only for certain accounts, this is very unfair especially for users who have been using the Gojek app for a long time. Please change the rules so that all users can enjoy the same promos without favoritism

review: kecewaudah bayar buat langganantetep aja ongkos goride hemat nya lebih mahal dari apk sebelahhabeuuuuuuuh makin irit drmn

review: knpa skrng driver sering cancel jelek banget gojek skrng sy udah dua minggu ga bs pakai goride dan go grabe cz driver sering cancel dan ga prnh dapat akhirnya cr gojek pangkalan mahal dikit tp cpt dpt ojeknya tolong d perbaiki lg pr drivernya
translated_review: Why do drivers often cancel now? Gojek is really bad these days. I haven't been able to use GoRide and GoGrab for two weeks because drivers often cancel and I never get one. In the end, I look for Gojek pangkalan (traditional ojek) even though it's a bit more expensive but at least I get a ride. Please fix the driver issue

review: pelayanan ramahmusik ok gak bikin jenuhperjalanan nyamansupir orangnya asikbaikreccomender deh pokoknyapengemudi pratama ananditya dengan toyota avanza warna hitam nopol b1539pyr selamat menikmati perjalanan anda rating 400
translated_review:
Friendly service, good music that doesn't get boring, comfortable trip, driver is fun, nice, and polite. Highly recommended.
 Driver Pratama Ananditya with a black Toyota Avanza, license plate B1539PYR. Enjoy your trip, rating 400

review: sering di cancel driver tunggu lama stlh itu di cancel kenaikan harga kl driver minta cancel lumayan besar 2x driver minta cancel biaya jd membengkak tolong dong diperbaiki penghitungan kenaikan harga dan driver komitmen dlm ambil penumpang terima kasih
translated_review: Often canceled by drivers. Wait long then canceled. Price increase if driver cancels is quite big. Twice drivers canceled, so the cost increases a lot. Please fix the price increase calculation and drivers' commitment to take passengers. Thank you

review: saya gatau kenapa ya kalo setiap pesan gojek selalu di cancel dari drivernya udah ada ke 10x padhl lagi buru2 developernya bagaimana apk kok jadi gini pdhl dulu fine fine saja
translated_review: I don’t know why every time I order Gojek it’s always canceled by the driver. Happened more than 10 times, even when I’m in a hurry. Developers, why is the app like this? It used to be fine.

review: untuk penitikan lokasi jemputtujuan tidak bisa nitik manual kalau ada patokan lokasi bisa input manual input lokasi sering lokasi tidak tersedia coba belajar dari grab gojek

review: sangat nyaman pengemudi albar mohan syah makatita dengan motorcycle warna cokelat nopol de4395ma selamat menikmati perjalanan anda ramadhan mubarak rating 485

review: tolong driver car untuk wilayah kota kendarijangan suka naik kan hargadi aplikasi maxim tujuan ke kelurahan sebelah cuma 24 800rpsampai di tujuan jadi 27 ribukadang naik hampir 10 ribukami pengguna maxim jdi ragu menggunakan maxim car
translated_review: Please, car drivers in Kendari city, don't often increase prices in Maxim app. For destination to the next village, fare is only 24,800 IDR but at destination it becomes 27,000 IDR. Sometimes it rises almost 10,000 IDR. We, Maxim users, become hesitant to use Maxim car

review: susah dapet driver sampe pesan 2x yg pertama udah telat 20menit lebih malah ke cancel yang kedua udah nunggu juga 20menit lebih ke cancel hadehhhh

review: saya kecewa sekali dengan aplikasi ini di app lokasi driver sudah dekat tapi berhentistuck tidak bergerak saya sudah tunggu 2 jam tapi tdk datang akibatnya saya yang repot karena terlambat tidak efisien saya harap diperbaiki lagi jgn ada yg curang
translated_review: I'm very disappointed with this app. The driver location on the app is already close but the driver stopped and stuck, not moving. I have waited 2 hours but no arrival. The result is I am the one troubled because I am late, inefficient. I hope this is fixed and no cheating happens

review: jadi mahal banget biasanya ke kampus cuma 9k udah make gojek plus baru sekarang jadi 13k padahal udah plus

review: saya sangat kecewa dengan driver maxim yang ugalan karna menyetir ugalan apa lagi sampai pukul penumpang sangat kecewa mohon untuk pihak maxim mengurus pada driver yang ugalan agar tidak kejadian seperti saya
translated_review: I am very disappointed with the reckless Maxim driver because of reckless driving, especially until the passenger is late. Very disappointed. Please the Maxim team manage reckless drivers to avoid incidents like mine

review: mantab pengemudi prancis limbong dengan honda mobilio warna hitam nopol bp1536dh selamat menikmati perjalanan anda rating 485
translated_review: Awesome driver Prancis Limbong with a black Honda Mobilio, license plate BP1536DH. Enjoy your trip, rating 485

review: pelayanannya kemenyek kalau ada promo selalu di batalin sama drive nya beda banget sama grab gojek itu sombong orang2nya
translated_review: Service is bad, whenever there is a promo the driver always cancels. Very different from Grab, Gojek drivers are arrogant

review: sinyalnya buruk pakai kartu perdana apapun kalau chatingan pasti pending pending mulu heran aku sama gojek
translated_review: Signal is bad using any prepaid card, chatting always pending. I’m confused about Gojek.

review: driver nya pada jorok semuanya jgn pesan disini dan driver nya naik ugal2an kalo dijln
translated_review: All drivers are dirty, don't order here and drivers drive recklessly on the road

review: harusnya kasi solusi kalau sedang susah buat cari driver jangan udh nunggu lama malah tiba tiba dibatalin karna gak ada driver harus dipikirkan solusi buat kedepannya supaya tidak merugikan konsumen
translated_review: There should be a solution when it's hard to find a driver. Don't just wait a long time then suddenly canceled because no driver. Please think about a solution for the future so it doesn't harm consumers

review: gojek makin kesini makin gjls segitu banyak nya gojek di deket stasiun gaada yg ngambil sama sekali posisi saya lagi mau kerja buru buru lebih baik ojek pangkalan meskipun mahal yg penting sat set
translated_review: Gojek is getting worse. There are so many Gojek near the station but none take orders. I am in a hurry to work. Better to use ojek pangkalan even though expensive, at least quick

review: gojek goride drivernya gak ramah garagara cancel malah didatengin sambil bawa emosi sambil caci maki bahwa akunnya bermasalah sebagai customer agak trauma padahal pesannan driver belum sampe ke lokasi jemput

review: sering pakai gojek malah makin mahal gmn sih ini pakai diskon bukan nya murah malah naik harga hadeh
translated_review: Often use Gojek but it keeps getting more expensive. Why? Using discounts is supposed to be cheaper but prices keep rising. Ugh

review: hilangkan menu kasih tips ke driver dr apk banyak driver ngarep udh mahal masih aja minta tips
translated_review: Remove the tip menu for drivers in the app. Many drivers expect tips but fares are already expensive and they still ask for tips

review: untuk motor bagus bgt hemat tapi untuk mobil saya sudah nunggu hampir 20 menit lebih tapi ga dapet padahal banyak driver di sekitar kalo gamau ambil ya di matiin ajh aplikasi

review: tolong lah kalo ujan itu lebih cepat dicari drivernya ini malah ujan malah makin gamau drivernya
translated_review: Please, when it rains, find drivers faster. Right now, when it rains, drivers are even less willing to take orders

review: uang saya tidak bisa balik di akun lama karena ketidak taun cara sy untuk mengaksesnya lapor tidak memberi siludi

review: ketika pas tidak ada kendaraan pribadi gojek memudahkan transportasi ke tempat tujuan dg cepat terimakasih gojek

review: banayk iklan gk jelas padahal lagi main geme seru seru nya keluar secara tiba tiba karna iklan ini tolong iklan jangan ganggu

review: mending hapus aja grab2 hemat itu mesan grab car di terima tp didiemin ditelpon jg gak ngangkat tolong ya grab kita butuh kadang urgent jg kebutuhannya kalau ketemu yg beginian ah sudah lah

review: apk payah saya nunggu hampir 2 jam ngak ada yang menerima sekali sudah di terima malah ngak mau driver nya malah katanya cari yang lain aja mas katanya gitu

review: mempermudah kita yang sangat butuh transportasi dengan cepatgak perlu ribet tinggal klikgojekpun datangterima kasih sangat membantu

review: setiap kali pesen gocar selalu sulit ataupun di cancel oleh pihak driver apakah pelayanan nya memang seperti ini maaf tapi driver slalu pilih2 konsumen karena nominal harga atau trip
translated_review: Every time I order GoCar, it’s always difficult or canceled by the driver. Is the service really like this? Sorry, but drivers always pick consumers based on price or trip

review: sangat baik n ontime pdhl malam bgt kasian tuh pak driver nyasukses trs n trslah amanah
translated_review: Very good and on time even late at night, pity the driver. Keep succeeding and stay trustworthy

review: mending grab kerjasama dengan blubet aja hemat maupun yang lain kita individu gabung di aplikasi gocar aja
translated_review: Better if Grab cooperates with Blubet or others; individually join the GoCar app

review: klo sudah selesai mau buka chat nya lg ko ga bs ya kira gmn soalnya sy td ada brg ketinggalan ditaro didpn motor pas turun sy lupa mungkin driver jg lupa sy tdk tau

review: sebernarnya untuk apk nya bagus tapi masalahnya selalu terletak pada lokasi drivernya yng padahal bergerak tetapi di map apk tidak bergerak

review: untuk saat ini kenpa tarif goride sangat mahal tolong di murahin sdikit lah biar pengguna nya ga berpindah ke apk sebelah

review: boking dari pukul 3 sampe pukul 5 tidak dapat driverkenapa kalo boking sekarang lamadan sampe berkali kalimuncul keterangan wadidaw kebanyakan pencetpadahal kami tidak mencetmohon dimudahkan kembali
translated_review: Booked from 3 PM until 5 PM but no driver found. Why if booking now is slow and several times shows “wadidaw” (error)? Many accidental taps though we didn’t tap. Please make it easier again

review: bagus dan di tingkatkan lagi seperti kebersihan dan helm untuk penumpang nya lebih di perhatikan lagi kebersihan nya tks
translated_review: Good and please improve cleanliness and helmets for passengers, pay more attention to cleanliness. Thanks

review: semakin lama semakin tidak memuaskan mudah error susah cari driver dan lama bangettt hrus berjam baru dibatalin oleh sitem
translated_review: Longer it goes, more unsatisfactory. Easy to error, hard to find drivers, takes hours then system cancels

review: aplikasi ojol yg memang murah sih menurutkutdk kalah dgn yg laintrus tingkatkan lgklo bs adakan voucher2 dong kaya di ojol2 yg lain
translated_review: Online motorcycle taxi apps are indeed cheap in my opinion, better than others. Keep improving, if possible add vouchers like other online taxis

review: gojek sekarang mahal meskipun pakai voucher perjalanan 77 km biasanya dg harga 9500 pake voucher go ride aja pot 10rb sekarang jadi 14500 alhasil beralih ke ojol sebelah
translated_review: Gojek is expensive now even with voucher. For a 7.7 km trip usually costs 9,500 IDR with GoRide voucher discount of 10k, now it costs 14,500. I switched to another online taxi

review: banyak driver yang tidak sesuai di aplikasi jadi takut kalau pulang malam mangkanya aq pulang malam mending pakai grab
translated_review: Many drivers are not suitable on the app, so I’m afraid to go home late. That’s why I prefer using Grab for late rides.

review: kapok baru pertama kali pesen di grab malah dapet driver yang ga ramah dan ga sopan banget marahmarah gajelas dengan nada tinggi dahlah udah gamau pesen lagi di grab mengecewakan

review: aplikasi nggak ada gunanyahujan dikit nggak ada sama sekali driver gojek yang mau narik beda jauh dengan aplikasi sebelah

review: drivernya lebih safety dr helm nya kurang bagus motornya jg ada yg udah bobrok bahkan jas ujan nya bau

review: fitur chat gojek tdk ada penyelesaian sy setiap saat paka aplikasi gojek kenapa fitur chat tdk bisa menyesaikan masalah
translated_review: The Gojek chat feature doesn’t solve anything. I always use the app, why can’t the chat feature solve problems?

review: gojek brengsek qta bayar sesuai tapi pelaksanaan dilapangan beda jiwa penjajahan qta bayar mahal tetep aja masuk driver goceng

review: driver nya mantap karena jln utam kena banjirtapi dengan lihainya cari jalan tikus akhirnya sampe tempat kerja terima kasih

review: aplikasi buruk driver terdekat malah dapet yang jauh pakai otak mereka datang pakai bensin bukan pakai modal cuma cuma perusahaan mu
translated_review: The app is bad. The nearest driver was far away. Use your brain, they come using fuel not free capital, your company is stingy.

review: yeeeemakacihhh di saat driver yg lain slalu pilih customer tpi driver ini dgn ramah dan sopan mau nganterinbukan soal ongkos tpi memang orgnya baik good job
translated_review: Thank you so much, while other drivers always pick customers, this driver was friendly and polite and willing to deliver. Not about the fare, just that the person is good. Good job.

review: butut kasih denda g ngotak sehari doang lupa bayar dendanya 50k mau pada ngebet naik haji ya lu tdinya mau langganan gojek plus lgi tpi haroream mening boikot sekalian
translated_review: Pathetic, give a one-day fine, forgot to pay the fine of 50k. Now everyone’s in a rush to go on Hajj. I wanted to subscribe to Gojek Plus but no, better boycott it all.

review: ini driver nya kurang ajar min minta tolong driver ini di briefingin atas nama henry situmorang plat no b 5286 kbu kalau bisa jangan sampe gara gara satu orang ini nama grab jadi jelek
translated_review: This driver is rude, please brief this driver Henry Situmorang, plate no. B 5286 KBU. If possible, don’t let one person make Grab look bad.

review: aplikasi nya berat banget woi hp lemot bener klo buka aplikasi grab yg lain aman saja buka shopp aja lancar
translated_review: The app is so heavy, my phone gets really slow when opening the app. Other apps open fine, even Shopee runs smoothly.

review: saran aja buat hrd driver maximtolong sebelum ngerekrut orangitu kepribadian sama ahklak pelamar di tes jugarata driver maxim pada nyolot dan ga beretikakayak preman semua
translated_review: Just a suggestion for Maxim HR: please test the personality and morals of applicants before recruiting. Many Maxim drivers are rude and unethical, like thugs.

review: terimakasih grabtitik jemput jaminan 5 menit sampemengutamakan pelanggan dan terimakasih gojek berkat anda kami telat jemput nya grab terdepan

review: pelayanan terbaik driver sangat membantu hanya saja aplikasi error namun driver tetap menjalankan tugas nya dengan sangat baik terimakasih maxim
translated_review: Best service, the driver was very helpful, even though the app had errors, the driver still did the job very well. Thanks, Maxim!

review: alhamdulillah saya mendapatkan pelayanan grab yg ramah tamah terima kasih banyak ya grab ijin bertanya untuk mendapatkan grab hemat caranya bagaimana ya karena saya sering menggunakan pelayanan grab baik mobil atau motor terima kasih dan maaf bila pertanyaan kurang berkenan terima kasih
translated_review: Alhamdulillah, I got friendly service from Grab, thank you very much. May I ask how to get GrabHemat? I often use Grab for car or motorbike. Thanks and sorry if my question is inappropriate.

review: pengiriman cepat mudah di dapat drivernya juga baik sangat membantu dan biaya nya murah makasii y maxim
translated_review: Fast delivery, easy to get, drivers are good, very helpful, and cheap. Thanks, Maxim.

review: sebagai seorang pengemudi faktor keselamatan adalah yg paling utama diperhatikan selanjutnya adalah kebersihan n kerapian kendaraan maupun driver nya
translated_review: As a driver, safety is the top priority. After that comes cleanliness and the neatness of the vehicle and the driver.

review: noh urusin mitra lu jangan cari keuntungan gede aja anehnya kalo komentar customer diladenin tp kalo mitra dicuekin
translated_review: Handle your partners well, don’t just look for big profits. It’s strange if customer comments get attention but partners are ignored.

review: gojek nyaaa baguss super duper jedar jedorr bintang 5 etmin jgaa asikk nya minta ampunn dahhh angkat tangan kalo ini mahhh yuk egee buruan download gojek jan pake lamaaa sinii gwa tunjukkin pelayanan terbagus
translated_review: Gojek is super good, bang, bang! 5 stars! Amazing service, so fun. Please don’t wait long, hurry and download Gojek, I show the best service here.

review: kenapa melakukan pinjaman lagi selalu gagal dari dulu pakai gojek pinjam tidak pernah telat sama sekali mau ajukan lagi malah telat
translated_review: Why do loans always fail? I’ve never been late with Gojek loans, but when I want to apply again, it’s late.

review: terlalu lama nunggu katanya 2 menit perjalanan tapi driver nya ga jalan jalan di maps nya
translated_review: Waiting too long, it says 2 minutes, but the driver doesn’t move on the map.

review: kalau tidak pakai promo ongkos masih kemahalan buat customerdan terlalu rendah yg di terima driver tolong kebijakan biar saling menguntungkan
translated_review: Without promo, fares are still expensive for customers and the driver’s earnings are too low. Please make policies that benefit both sides.

review: lagi eror apa gimana ya belakangan dapat driver jauh terus padalah sudah prioritas udah gitu pihak driver suka ngecancel tiba tiba
translated_review: Is it having an error or what? Recently always getting distant drivers even on priority. Also, drivers suddenly cancel.

review: aplikasi bagus dan sangat membantu dan tarif ongkirnya standar sukses terus gojek saya beri rating 100
translated_review: The app is good and very helpful, shipping rates are standard. Keep it up Gojek, I rate you 100.

review: sejauh ini belum ketemu driver yg jutek alhamdulillahpesan utk driver yg muslim selalulah diawali dgn bismillahirrahmanirrahimsemoga hasil yg didapat penuh barokah
translated_review: So far haven’t met any rude driver, thank God. A message for Muslim drivers: always start with “Bismillahirrahmanirrahim,” may your earnings be blessed

review: driver pada sibuk semua pesan berulang kali batal terus apalagi pas musim hujan sangat tidak bisa diandalkan
translated_review: All drivers are busy, I keep ordering repeatedly but keep getting canceled, especially during rainy season, very unreliable.

review: lama dapat ojol nya pdhl pilih yg comfort udh aku reset jg masih lama gmn sih
translated_review: It takes a long time to get an ojol (online motorcycle taxi), even though I choose the comfort option and already reset the app, still slow. What’s going on?

review: dengan adanya gojeksaya khususnyasangat terbantu kalau lg malas keluar rmhsmg pelayanannya trus ditingkatkandari baik menjadi lbh baik lgmaksh gojek
translated_review: With Gojek, especially for me, it really helps when I’m feeling lazy to go out. Hopefully the service keeps improving from good to even better. Thanks, Gojek.

review: ya ampun mau pesan gojek malah di suruh menunggu 60 menit karena terjadi banyak percobaan login
translated_review: Oh my, when I try to order Gojek, I’m told to wait 60 minutes due to many login attempts.

review: parah banget saya barusan diminta 10 ribu gara titik maxim menyesatkan driver males jadinya gamau pake aplikasi ini lagi trauma
translated_review: This is awful, I was just asked to pay 10,000 because Maxim’s location misled the driver. Drivers are lazy so I don’t want to use this app anymore, I’m traumatized.

review: asalamualaikum aku pengguna aplikasi grab motor ini pemula ingin skli bepergian dapet kenyamanan semoga aplikasi ini memudahkan aku bepergian dan lancar sllu amin terimaksih
translated_review: Assalamualaikum, I’m a beginner user of Grab motorbike app. I hope to get comfort traveling and that this app makes traveling easy and smooth. Amen, thank you.

review: tolong diupdate jalanya susah kalo mau masuk pelosok ndak ada ancer 1 bulan sekali kek secara berkala
translated_review: Please update the roads, it’s hard to enter remote areas with no signposts. Please do this periodically once a month or so.

review: aplikasi ini sangat membantu tapi klo bisa harga utk lebih murah dan driver potongan hanya 5 supaya dapat memberikan kesejahteraan krn driver tidak ada jaminan kerjanya spt kesehatan tabungan atau bonus thr terimakasih
translated_review: This app is very helpful but if possible, please make prices cheaper and driver commissions only 5% so drivers can have welfare because they have no job security like health, savings, or bonuses. Thank you.

review: tutorial cara pesen grab dari daerah yg belum bisa menemukan pengemudi padahal di apk ada unit sekitar 4 menit di pesen tunggu dan di cariin selama 9 menit pengemudi tidak di temukan apakah bisa pesan grab walau dari daerah
translated_review: Tutorial on how to order Grab from areas that can’t find drivers, even though the app shows about 4 units nearby. I ordered and waited 9 minutes but no driver found. Can I order Grab from these areas?

review: maxim gak jelas kenapa penumpanh di turunkan di jalangak ramah banget cuma gara2 ongkos kecil nganter sampe gerbang perumahan dong kykgini kalitolong di sleksi drivernya
translated_review: Maxim is unclear why passengers are dropped off in the middle of the road. The driver was very polite but only because the fare was small, they only drove to the housing gate. Please select your drivers better.

review: udah pesen gocar xl supaya bisa buat 6 orang tapi driver pada ga mau ambil mending tutup aja dah ganti angkot yg didaftarin buat gocar saya pesan dari mall lippo cikarang
translated_review: I ordered Gocar XL to fit 6 people but drivers don’t want to take the order. Better to just close it and replace with registered angkot (minibus). I ordered from Mall Lippo Cikarang.

review: driver minta nambah mulu klo pesen malem kenapa ga sama aplikasinya aja dinaikin pas malem kok malah minta nambah ke customer kan itu argonya dah jelas berarti emang bener yang di medsos tuh klo taxol kelakuannya pada gini
translated_review: Drivers keep asking for extra payment when ordering at night. Why doesn’t the app just raise the price at night? Instead, drivers ask for more from customers, that’s clearly illegal. It’s true what people say on social media about taxi drivers behaving like this.

review: sangat bangga dan harga sangat terjangkau buat masyarakat menengah kebawah di bandingkan ojol lain lain top lah
translated_review: Very proud and prices are very affordable for lower-middle class compared to other online taxis. Top quality.

review: sangat membantu untuk perjalanan kami memudahkan untuk mencapai tempat yang dituju sehingga mempermudah mendapatkan sesuatu yang diinginkan
translated_review: Very helpful for our travels, makes it easier to reach destinations, which in turn makes it easier to get what we want.

review: kak bagaimana cara daftar maxim audah berulang kali di daftar lewat pesan telpn bahkan pake kode perfikasi tetap tdk bisa
translated_review: Sis, how do I register for Maxim? I’ve tried many times via phone call and using verification code but still can’t.

review: sekarang gocar jelek pelayanan nya argo 20 25 jarak deket ditolak2 terus sama driver nya terus klw kita tetap pesen juga lama2 harga naik 2x lipat kecewa pelayanannya auto delete aplikasi nya ga ke pake sekarang
translated_review: Gocar service is bad now. Fare is 20-25k for a short distance but drivers keep rejecting. When we keep ordering, prices go up double. Disappointed with the service, I’ll just delete the app.

review: untuk sekarang bagi aman dan cepat dapat driver harga masih paling murah dan tentu jadi pilihan cuma satu untuk tetap memperhatikan drivernya dan sering dengar cerita driver dapat ulasan negatif padahal sudah pelayanannya sudah sesuai
translated_review: For now, the safest and fastest to get a driver with the cheapest price is still Gojek. Just pay attention to the drivers; I often hear negative reviews about drivers even though they have been providing good service.
