review: minimal kalo buat iklan tombol skip iklan pas selesai ga di kecilin gue jg pengguna gojek dari lama tp pas tau kyk gitu malahan males pake gojek mnding apk sebelah ono
translated_review: At least for ads, make a skip button after ads finish and don’t shrink it. I’ve been a long time Gojek user but after seeing this, I’m reluctant to use Gojek and prefer the other app.

review: anjir apaaan nyari jln kagak ada muncul2 udah copy link map kopy jln ttp gak muncul udah pencarian ttp gak muncul hadeeeh ribet deh
translated_review: What the heck, looking for a route but it doesn’t appear even after copying the map link, it still doesn’t show. Tried searching multiple times, nothing shows. So complicated.

review: tolong dihapus aja waktu tunggu berbayar nya soalnya ga nunggu juga dibuat berbayar sama drivernya di jalan sejam dari 71 bayar 100 rb parah sih munurutku nama driver nya harrys pratama teguh di serang banten kerjanya ciruas
translated_review: Please remove the paid waiting time because even when we don’t wait, drivers charge it. I once waited an hour but had to pay 100k from 71k fare. That’s outrageous. The driver’s name is Harrys Pratama Teguh in Serang, Banten, working in Ciruas.

review: lama nunggu driver ga bisa dibatalin pdhl udh laporan berkali kali ujung2nya udh sejam lebih baru apl nya yg batalin dasar aneh
translated_review: Long wait times, can’t cancel driver, even though I reported many times. After more than an hour, the app finally cancels the order itself. Strange.

review: halo gojek aplikasi saya tidak bisa dibuka saya sudah menggunakan versi yang terbaru setiap masuk aplikasi selalu keluar tolong bantuannya
translated_review: Hi Gojek, my app can’t open. I already updated to the latest version, but it keeps crashing. Please help.

review: aplikasi gx bermanfaat drivernya cuma mau ambil bayaran gede buat apa ada promo kalo drivernya aja ngebatali jemputan terus
translated_review: The app is useless, drivers just want to take big payments. What’s the point of promos if drivers always cancel pickups?

review: pengemudi terlalu banyak yg meng cancel baik go ride maupun go car apalagi sudah tiba dilokasi juga berani cancelmending pake aplikasi lain
translated_review: Many drivers cancel orders, both GoRide and GoCar, even after arriving at the location. Better to use other apps.

review: selalu gabisa ngeklik chat padahal udh di pencet or klik berulang kali tapi susah bgt masuk room chat jadi sering miscom sama driver tolong diperbaiki fiturnya
translated_review: I can’t click on chat even though I tap repeatedly. It’s very hard to enter the chat room, so often there’s miscommunication with drivers. Please fix this feature.

review: bintang satu karna tertinggal nya hp teman saya si driver juga tidak bisa diajak kerja sama dan yang terakhir penanganan yang lama
translated_review: One star because my friend’s phone was left behind, and the driver was uncooperative. Also, slow customer service handling.

review: tolong peta utk konsumen di perbaiki lagi sering nyangkut peta nya jd gk ketahuan udah sampe mana driver jemput nganter mknan nya
translated_review: Please fix the consumer map, it often gets stuck so it’s unclear where the driver is picking up or delivering food.

review: karna driver minta cancel 2 x saya cari driver lainnya ga dapet karna alasan anda terlalu sering memencet ini kecewa sama apk sampah ini
translated_review: Because the driver canceled twice, I tried finding another driver but couldn’t due to the app saying I pressed too often. Disappointed with this trash app.

review: pengalaman saya untuk pemakaian aplikasi ini sudah bagus hanya saja tolong berikan diskon khusus bagi pelajar terutama sma seperti mendapatkan diskon dengan menunjukkan kartu pelajar karena harga gojek kadang naik dan turun yang menyebabkan pengeluaran yang lebih kepada pelajar
translated_review: My experience using this app is good, but please give special discounts for students, especially high schoolers, like showing a student ID card. Gojek’s prices fluctuate and cause higher expenses for students.

review: kacau banget kecewa saya hanya ingin beri tahu untuk semua driver mobil jangan apa apa lewat tol padahal lewat jalur biasa aja bisa niat mau hemat malah boros karena harus bayar tol
translated_review: Very chaotic and disappointing. I just want to tell all car drivers not to take toll roads unnecessarily. Taking normal roads is cheaper but they want to save money then spend more paying tolls.

review: saya pesen grabride dari sebelum hujan sampai hujan deras susah dapat driver 2 temen saya pesen goride sebelum hujan langsung datang apa aku beralih ke gojek aja grab nya saya uninstall
translated_review: I ordered GrabRide before rain and during heavy rain but had difficulty getting a driver. Two friends ordered GoRide before rain and their drivers came immediately. Should I switch to Gojek? I uninstalled Grab.

review: overall bagus kadang ada satu dua driver yang kadang nyebelin min info dong di bandara sultan mahmud badaruddin ii palembang udah ada gocar airport belum ya
translated_review: Overall good, but sometimes one or two drivers are annoying. Please update, is there Gocar Airport service at Sultan Mahmud Badaruddin II Palembang airport?

review: selama menggunakan maxim aman dan lancar driver juga ramah dan asik di ajak ngobrol meski saya juga jarang ngomong hehehhe harga juga lebih terjangkau dr platform transportasi lain good job maxim
translated_review: Using Maxim is safe and smooth, drivers are friendly and fun to talk to even though I rarely chat. Prices are more affordable than other transport platforms. Good job, Maxim.

review: nunggu driver lama kendaran tidak terawat nomor polisi juga sudah lama mati atribut udah kayak baju pengemis driver nya juga beda tidak patuh rambu lalulitas di perempatan dan suka ngebut mantan pembalap liar yaa driver nya sngat tidak mngutamakn keamanan dan knyamanan pelanggan
translated_review: Long wait, vehicle poorly maintained, license plate expired, driver looks like a beggar, doesn’t obey traffic signs at intersections, drives fast, seems like an ex-racer. Driver does not prioritize customer safety and comfort.

review: penjemputan penumpang cepat kendaraan yang digunakan juga mantap pengemudi baik dan sopan terima kasih maxim dan pengemudinya
translated_review: Quick passenger pick-up, good vehicles, kind and polite drivers. Thanks Maxim and drivers.

review: tarif yang mahal buat pengguna namun hanya 70 atau 60 buat mitra pengemudi sisanya buat aplikator cari untung gede parah
translated_review: Prices are high for users but drivers only get 60-70%, the rest goes to the app provider making huge profits.

review: percuma kasih kode voucher tapi nggak bisa digunakan semua mulai dari kode cobaingojekgorideajalebihhemat dll
translated_review: It’s useless giving voucher codes when none can be used, including codes like “cobaingojek”, “gorideaja”, “lebihhemat”, etc.

review: sumpah aplikasi sampah yang kasih bintang 5 tolol harusnya aplikasi gojek ini di buang pada tempat nya
translated_review: Seriously, this is a trash app, those who gave 5 stars are dumb. Gojek should be discarded.

review: maxim bandung paling top mau hujan badai petir tetep narik penumpang palingan waktu persib perayaan aja nunggu sejam baru dapat itupun aplikasi lain ada yg nunggu sampai 2 jam lebih thankyou maxim
translated_review: Maxim Bandung is the best. Rain, storm, or thunder, drivers still take passengers. During Persib celebrations, I waited an hour, while other apps took 2+ hours. Thank you, Maxim.

review: nunggu 2 jam buat dapetin driver doang estimasi aplikasi 1 jam sampai tapi buktinya 2 jam jalan belum juga dapet driver malah di cancel sepihak dari gojek edit akhirnya sampai juga setelah 5 jam nunggu sip naik 1 bintang
translated_review: Waited 2 hours just to get a driver. The app estimated 1 hour but after 2 hours no driver. The order was unilaterally canceled by Gojek. Eventually, after 5 hours, a driver came. I give 1 star.

review: kalikali surprise dari saya suruh bawa lexus lx600 turbine sport 5500 cc v8 milik saya hanya mencoba buat kejutan penumpang lain dan
translated_review: Surprise from me: asked to bring my Lexus LX600 turbine sport 5500 cc V8 just to surprise other passengers.

review: ish trauma saya sama abang gojek nya marah marah gitu sampe sekarang masih trauma dan inget bangett
translated_review: I’m traumatized by a Gojek driver who was angry and rude. Still traumatized and remember it clearly.

review: driver banyak yang pasif aplikasi diaktifkan tapi orangnya lagi tiduran dirumah nunggunya drivernya kayak nunggu pejabat datang acara lama banget
translated_review: Many drivers are passive — app on but they’re sleeping at home. Waiting for the driver feels like waiting for an official event, takes forever.

review: saya sebagai customer lama2 kecewa sama ini aplikasimau pakai layanannya jadi segan kasianan ke driver saya pakai tarif normal tapi ini kenapa ke driver hanya dapat uangnya 45 dari yang saya bayar
translated_review: As a longtime customer, I’m disappointed. I want to use the service but feel reluctant because it’s unfair to drivers. I pay normal fare but the driver only gets 45% of what I paid.

review: drivernya banyak yg tdk sopan tdk sabaran suka marah2 terutama driver yg sdh berumur terlalu merasa dibutuhkan pdhal sama2 kt membutuhkan tp dng begini kami uninstal lebih baik yg hijau sebelah
translated_review: Many drivers are rude, impatient, and angry, especially older drivers who think they’re needed. We all need each other but this makes me uninstall the app and prefer the green competitor app.

review: maxim saya baru pertama pakai tapi sudah buat saya kagum dgn cara pelayanan dan sistem aplikasi yg bagus jadinya memudahkan bahkan sy yg beru pake maxim in langsung faham dgn cara kerjanya respon cepat drivernya ramah ramah mantap pertahankan
translated_review: It’s my first time using Maxim and I’m already impressed by the service and good system of the app—it makes it easy, even for a new user like me. Quick response and friendly drivers. Great job, keep it up.

review: buset gw nungguin pesenan gacoan gw dari jam 1049 sampe jam 1 belum ke anter perkara belum ada driver gk ada mau yg anter padahal dari tempat tinggal gw sama lokasi cuman 8 menitan cok itupun disuruh nunggu 28 menit busett dah
translated_review: Damn, I’ve been waiting for my Gacoan (food order) since 10:49 and it’s 1 PM now—still not delivered just because there’s no driver willing to take it. It’s only 8 minutes away from my place but still asked to wait 28 minutes. Unbelievable.

review: it terlalu sering gonta ganti cara pemakaian jd eror terua driver telpon bebrunyi tp gk bs diangkat gk muncul di hp
translated_review: The app keeps changing how it works, so it keeps having errors. When the driver calls, it rings but I can’t answer because it doesn’t show up on my phone.

review: kami pesen satu driver bisa bisa nya sampe banyak driver yg datang kerumah kami kasihan kan driver yg dibatalkan udh gitu ga bisa di cancel lagi
translated_review: We ordered one driver, but somehow multiple drivers came to our house. Poor drivers who were canceled, and then we couldn’t even cancel anymore.

review: bepergian dengan gojek aman terkendali karena sistem dalam aplikasi nya bisa termonitor dengan baik transportasi untuk umum yang sangatlah paripurna dengan pelayanan yang baik dan bertanggung jawab
translated_review: Traveling with Gojek feels safe and under control because the system is well-monitored. A very perfect public transport app with responsible service.

review: lama dapet driver padahal banyak banget di area mending gw pake apps lain selalu gini gojek gatau kenapa kecewa sumpah
translated_review: It takes a long time to get a driver even though there are many in the area. Better for me to use another app. It’s always like this with Gojek, I don’t know why. Really disappointed, honestly.

review: apk payah psen goride dapat driverdriver dah chat tapi ga ada pergerakan kirain ga jalan terus saya canceleh ternyata driver datangbikin salahpaham saja
translated_review: Poor app. Ordered GoRide, got a driver, already chatted but there was no movement, so I thought he wasn’t coming. I canceled—turns out the driver did show up. Created a misunderstanding.

review: driver slow respon lambat kalo gak bisa jadi driver gak usah driver gojek kecewa pelayanannya lemot
translated_review: The driver was slow to respond. If you can’t do the job, don’t be a Gojek driver. Disappointed with the slow service.

review: anugerah dewantoro trima kasih banyak ya mas sangat membantu banget tahu banget rutenya pelayanan ramah good job mugi gusti tansyah maringi rejeki lancar ksehatan juga keselamatan aamiin
translated_review: Anugerah Dewantoro, thank you so much sir! Super helpful, knew the route well, kind service. Good job! May God grant you smooth sustenance, good health, and safety. Amen.

review: umr naik cm dibawah 10 dan itu pun baru mulai februari tp tarif gojek sudah naik hampir 30 per hari ini 16 desember 2024 terimakasih sudah menemani hampir 9 tahun ini pamit
translated_review: Minimum wage only rose less than 10% and that only started in February, but Gojek fares already increased almost 30% as of today, December 16, 2024. Thanks for accompanying me for almost 9 years, goodbye.

review: dengan gojekkita bisa kemanapun dan kapanpun kita mauu apalagi dengan tarif yang hemat ayoo buruan cobain gojek guys
translated_review: With Gojek we can go anywhere anytime, especially with affordable rates. Come on guys, try Gojek now!

review: di semua daerah malang gak ada titik lokasinya jadi bingung mau ngeklik terus driver daerah malang gak profesional aku diturunin di jauh titik lokasi
translated_review: In all parts of Malang, there are no pickup point markers, so it's confusing. Also, the drivers in Malang are unprofessional — they dropped me far from the marked point.

review: saya pengguna gojek mines supir banyak yg minta uang lebih ketika perjalanan malam haridn banyak yg cancel sering juga berganti menolak
translated_review: I’m a Gojek user, but many drivers ask for extra money during night trips. Lots of cancellations and constant rejections.

review: aplikasi yang sangat membantu dalam kegiatan seharihari pencarian driver yang cepat tampilan fitur juga simpel namun rapih
translated_review: This app is very helpful for daily activities. Fast driver search and simple but neat features.

review: driver nya tidak bisa diandalkan semua posisi cepet mau telat tp suruh ganti driver terus ada yang makan lah ada yang inilah itulah
translated_review: Drivers are unreliable—either too fast or too late, and I’m constantly asked to change drivers. Some are eating, or have some other excuse.

review: jelek suka di cancel sama drivernyasudah gitu pakai nomer segala padahal akun email valid saya kasih bintang 1
translated_review: Bad. Often canceled by the driver. Then they ask for a phone number, even though my email account is valid. One star.

review: gmna ini aflikasi gojek error metode pembayar tunai tpi diaflikasi jdi non tunai satu tujuan dua kali pembayaran
translated_review: What’s going on with Gojek? It’s cash payment, but in the app, it becomes non-cash. One destination, but charged twice.

review: aplikasinya bagus driver nya juga lama lama tapi tolong perbaiki aplikasinya lag parah padahal di hp saya ga ada aplikasi apa apa cuma grab wa dan tt saja tapi masih aja lag apk grab nya padahal kemarin kemarin ngga
translated_review: The app is good, and the drivers are okay. But please fix the lag. I only have Grab, WhatsApp, and TikTok on my phone, yet it still lags. Grab didn’t use to lag like this.

review: ini gojek lama bertingkah muluu mana tiap ngasih driver selalu dengan posisi yang paling jauh susah komunikasi pula dan kejadian ini berulang kali
translated_review: Gojek keeps acting up lately. Always assigns the farthest driver, hard to communicate, and this keeps happening again and again.

review: keren dan harga aman tp kasian sama drivernya kasih bonus lagi lah biar pada semangat lagi buat menghidupkan kel nya
translated_review: Nice and affordable, but pity the drivers. Give them more bonuses so they stay motivated and can support their families.

review: pertama kali pakai dan itu mudah tapi setelah saya sampai di tujuan dan ingin memberikan bintang 5 sayang malah eror karena jaringankoneksi internet terputus saat perjalanan walaupun sudah di nyalakan kembali koneksi internet saya tetap saja tidak berfungsi saya harap kesalahan ini ada solusinya terimakasih
translated_review: First time using it—it was easy. But when I reached my destination and tried to give a 5-star rating, it failed due to a connection error. Even after I turned the internet back on, it still didn’t work. Hope there’s a solution for this, thank you.

review: gojek motor udah ga jelas ini kalau pesan pagi udah harganya melonjak cari drivernya susah sekalinya dapet drivernya jauh bangat padahal yg deket banyak udah gitu si driver di chat ga respon kendaraanpun ga bergerak parah buang2 waktu dan bikin terlambat kerja kapok
translated_review: Gojek motor is messed up in the mornings. Prices go up, drivers are hard to find, and when you finally get one, the driver is far away—even though there are many nearby. The driver doesn’t respond to chat and the vehicle doesn’t move. Total waste of time and made me late for work. I’m done.

review: gojek sekarang udah gak kayak dulu sekarang jadi mirip aplikasi scam banyak promo tapi setelah daftarin goplus promo nya malah ilang semua voucher sengaja dibikin gak ada tanggal berlaku biar sewaktu bisa dihapus berasa ditipu aplikasi sampah
translated_review: Gojek is not like before, now it’s like a scam app. Lots of promos but after registering Goplus the promos disappear. Vouchers don’t have expiration dates so they can be deleted anytime. Feels like a scam, trash app.

review: aplikasi ini sangat membantu tetapi banyak kekurangan juga salah satunya keterlambatan untuk menjemput pelanggan saya tau keterlambatan tersebut karena ada kendala di perjalanan tapi kalo bisa mencari rute yang aman dan sepi dgn pengendara jadi lebih cepat untuk sampai terima kasih
translated_review: This app is very helpful but has many shortcomings. One is the delay in pickup. I understand delays can happen due to road conditions, but maybe try finding quieter and safer routes to arrive faster. Thank you.

review: untuk keseluruhan dll itu bagus tapi yah tapi yg gua heran driver banyak tpi yg mau nerimaambil itu yah tuhan banget gitu lama nya minta ampun tolong apa guna nya driver bnyak gua juga kerja jadi driver ngk mudah tpi kok ngini amat yah
translated_review: Overall, the service is good, but what I don’t get is—why are there so many drivers, yet none of them want to accept orders? It takes forever. I know being a driver isn’t easy, but still… why is it like this?

review: sudah pesen 2 kali dan nunggu berjamjam tidak bisa dicancel setelah nunggu lama banget gojek baru tercancel secara otomatis tanpa bisa konfirmasi ke cs melalui aplikasi nya
translated_review: I’ve already ordered twice and waited for hours, and I couldn’t cancel. After waiting for so long, Gojek finally canceled automatically without any way to contact customer service through the app.

review: tolong dong jangan sampai masuh chat orang ga dikenal ke aplikasi gojek spam sangat mengganggu rugi aplikasi bagus gini rusak gara2 spam
translated_review: Please don’t allow random people to send messages through the Gojek chat feature. The spam is very annoying. It ruins a good app like this.

review: mudah an bisa ditingkatkan lagi pelayanan nyahususnya di kampung masih minim driver nyatpi ok lah sejauh ini
translated_review: Hopefully, the service can be improved, especially in rural areas where drivers are still scarce. But okay, so far so good.

review: knpa saya mau pesen gocar ko gk dptdrivernya sedang kan pke hp oeng lain lngsumg dpt salah nya dmna ko gk dptdrive gocar saya
translated_review: Why can’t I get a Gocar driver even though when I try using someone else’s phone, they can get one instantly? What’s wrong that I can’t get a Gocar driver?

review: aplikasi jadi bug ketika sudah di update tidak ada voucher yang muncul padahal saya gojek plus tapi tanda vouchernya menghilang
translated_review: The app became buggy after the update. No vouchers show up even though I’m a Gojek Plus user, but the voucher sign disappeared.

review: saya padahal engga download apk gojek tapi di email saya masuk notif dari gojek kenapa bisa gitu ya min
translated_review: I didn’t even download the Gojek app, but I got a notification from Gojek in my email. How is that possible?

review: kenapa perasaan kok semakin mahal ya padahal jaraknya juga nggak jauhjauh amat apalagi grab car nya kadang nggak ngotak harganya
translated_review: Why do I feel like the prices keep getting more expensive even though the distance isn’t that far? Especially GrabCar—it sometimes doesn’t make sense.

review: sangat membantu sgala aktivitas keperluan masyarakat dengan driver yang profesional penuh ramah tamah makasihh sukses terus
translated_review: Very helpful for all kinds of activities. Professional and friendly drivers. Thanks, and continued success.

review: tolong lah untuk biaya aplkikasinya kira aja kasian driver nya terus kadang suka pada gak mau nganter kalo jarak nya jauh karena potongan aplikasinya gede padahal kan customer bayar nya sesuai
translated_review: Please reconsider the app’s fees—feel bad for the drivers. Sometimes they don’t want to take far rides because the app takes a big cut, even though customers pay the full price.

review: potongan harga di aplikasi penumpang tidak sama dengan driver sehingga terkadang minta ongkos lebih pada penumpang dan setelah melihat ongkos yang didapat oleh driver sangat miris karena bisa berkurang sampai 45 semisal di penumpang harga grab 30rb yg didapat driver hanya 17rb miris sekali
translated_review: The discount shown in the app for passengers doesn’t match what the driver gets. Sometimes they ask passengers for more money. For example, if the fare is 30K IDR on Grab, the driver only gets 17K. That’s very sad.

review: tolong beri edukasi kepada driver2nya spy mmpunyai attitude dan sikap yang baiksopan dan lebih menghargai penumpangbersikaplah jujurmaka penumpangpun akan nyaman dan tidak segan2 untuk memberi uang tips kpd driver drivernya suka batalin sepihak banyak alasan
translated_review: Please educate the drivers so they have good manners and respect passengers. Be honest—then passengers will feel comfortable and more willing to give tips. Drivers often cancel unilaterally with lots of excuses.

review: udh lama g pke grab pas liat pembayaran bs pke qris aku jd pke grab lg eh skrg malah pembayaran qris gd ydh sy g mau pke grab lg harga nya jg lbh mahal dibanding ojol sebelah
translated_review: I hadn’t used Grab for a while. When I saw that payment could be made with QRIS, I started using it again. But now QRIS is gone, so I don’t want to use Grab anymore. The prices are also higher than other ride-hailing apps.

review: buat manejemen tlg dong driver yg terkena putus mitra bisa daftar kembali sdh bertahun tahun data masih ada aja
translated_review: To management: please allow drivers whose partnerships have been terminated to reapply. Their data is still stored after all these years.

review: gojek makin lama makin anehh mapsnya jadi ga karuan antra driver dan pelanggan padahal saya pengguna lama tapi menurut saya makin buruk apalagi dibagian maps
translated_review: Gojek keeps getting worse. The maps are messed up between driver and passenger locations. I’ve been a long-time user, but it’s getting worse—especially the maps feature.

review: bagusan gojek jaman dulu jam 2022 ada diskonsekarang kalo ngarep diskon harus bayar kalo nggk ganti nomor dulu
translated_review: Gojek used to be better in 2022 when there were discounts. Now, to get discounts, you have to pay or change your number.

review: sering terjadi sistem eror dan merugikan costumer sering terkendala sinyal nya tidak baik padahal sinyal menggunakan aplikasi lain berjalan lancar
translated_review: Frequent system errors harm customers. Often there are signal issues, even though other apps work just fine with the same signal.

review: parah lu maxim dari tebet ke manggarai biasa 12k jadi 20k ngasih jalur nya mana jadi jauh bgt inget saingan lu ada grabe sama gojek
translated_review: You’re terrible, Maxim. The fare from Tebet to Manggarai used to be 12K, now it’s 20K. The route it gives is way longer. Remember, your competitors are Grab and Gojek.

review: susah banget klo mau ngecancel apalagi salah alamat parah ribetsusah banget buat ngecanceludh dibatalin malah masuk driver yg lain lieur
translated_review: It’s really hard to cancel, especially if you put in the wrong address. So complicated. Even after canceling, another driver shows up. Confusing.

review: pekerja gojek ini pada bertingkah gk mau klo yg dekat cari uang sepuluh 20 ajh bertingkah banget
translated_review: Gojek workers behave badly, won’t pick up if it’s close, only want to earn 10-20k. Such bad behavior.

review: alhamdulillah dengan adanya biaya layanan maka saya tidak perlu pake helm knp karena dengan adanya biaya layanan sudah tercakup salah satunya tidak perlu pake helmsafety belt driver kena tilang saya tidak perlu bayar krn sudah dibayarkan dalam biaya layanan tersebut mantap nga tuh
translated_review: Thankfully, with the service fee, I don’t have to wear a helmet. Why? Because the fee already covers everything—including not needing to wear a helmet or seatbelt. If the driver gets fined, I don’t need to pay because it’s included in the fee. Isn’t that great?

review: percuma udah ada e walletnya tp driver masih maunya tunai klo bikin aplikasi jangan nanggung donggg
translated_review: No use having e-wallet if drivers still want cash. If you make an app, don’t be half-hearted.

review: tiap dibuka aplikasi nya loading nya lama terus ngelag ngelag posisi driver sering ga bergerak padahal sudah sampai titik
translated_review: Every time I open the app, it takes forever to load and always lags. The driver’s position often doesn’t update, even though they’ve already reached the pickup point.

review: pesen gocar sering di cancel sampai belasan kali giliran harga sudah naik drastis baru ada yg pickup
translated_review: Ordering Gocar often gets canceled over and over again—like up to a dozen times. Then when the price goes way up, suddenly someone picks up the ride.

review: drivernya gak jelas waktu penjemputan malah makin jauh dari titik penjemputan di chat gak ada balasan di tlf gak di angkat nunggu 20 mnt gak ada kepastian hadehhhhh
translated_review: The driver wasn’t clear during pickup—kept getting farther from the location. No reply in chat, didn’t pick up the phone. Waited 20 minutes with no certainty. Ughhh.

review: gojek tolong dong klo estimasi waktu 5 menit jgn jadi 20 menit sy pesan estimasi driver sampai 5 menit sy tgu dari jam 218 sampai jam 235 belum sampai apa itu 5 menit
translated_review: Gojek, please—if the estimated time is 5 minutes, don’t let it become 20 minutes. I ordered with a 5-minute estimate. I waited from 2:18 until 2:35 and they still hadn’t arrived. What kind of 5 minutes is that?

review: sejauh ini yang layanan paling bagus memang gojek tapi kenapa sekarang harganya jdi naik yaa dlu biasanya dari st pasming ke kampus cuma 13k sekarang jdi 17k
translated_review: So far, Gojek has the best service, but why have the prices increased? It used to cost 13K from St. Pasming to campus, now it’s 17K.

review: udah mahal ongkir dan jasa lama penipu ulung lagi ktanya 3 menit lagi sampe taunya driver baru mau meluncur kacau
translated_review: Expensive delivery fees, slow service, and a top-class scammer. It said 3 minutes to arrival, but the driver was just starting to move. What a mess.

review: tetap jaga kepercayaan para pelanggan di mana pun berada karena menjaga kepercayaan itu paling susah serta kenyamanan dan keamanan juga jangan lupa di perhatikan oleh gojek
translated_review: Always maintain customer trust wherever they are, because it’s the hardest thing to build. And don’t forget to prioritize comfort and safety, Gojek.

review: sebetul nya gojek sangat membantu tpi masih banyak driver yang walaupun tidak semua terimakasih gojek untuk terakhir kali ny kapok saya
translated_review: Actually, Gojek is very helpful, but there are still many problematic drivers (though not all). Thanks for everything, Gojek—for the last time. I’m done.

review: baru pertama kali pake grab pertama kali naik ojek dr grab pertama kali juga diperlakukan tidak baik sama driver nya wkwkwk ga sopan sama tolong mapnya lebih perbesar biar komplek rumah saya keliatan
translated_review: First time using Grab, first time riding a Grab bike, and also the first time being treated badly by a driver. LOL. Very rude. Also, please enlarge the map so my housing complex is visible.

review: tolong dong sistem aplikasinya diperbaiki nyariin drivernya jgn jauh2 gila aja padahal yg deket lokasi puluhan tp malah nyangkutnya sama driver yg jaraknya juauuuuuhhhh nunggunya kelamaan kasian juga drivernya kejauhan jemputnya
translated_review: Please fix the app system. Don’t match customers with drivers who are far away—ridiculous. There were many nearby drivers, but I got connected to one far away. The wait was too long. I also feel bad for the driver who had to travel so far to pick me up.

review: susah banget cari alamat yang bener yang ada gak bisa berkontribusi sama google map bikin sala turun rugiiiiu
translated_review: It’s really hard to find the correct address. Sometimes it doesn’t match and can’t contribute properly to Google Maps, making me get dropped off at the wrong spot. Such a loss.

review: apkasi nya jelek saya pingin lewat tol serang penimbang di arahin nya jalan biasa g kaya apkasi greb langsung rute tol tolong di perbaiki aplikasi nya kita cari yg lebih cepat dari pada terlambat waktu itu penting bagi kami
translated_review: The app is bad. I wanted to take the toll road at Serang Penimbang, but it routed me through regular roads. Unlike the Grab app, which directly takes toll routes. Please fix it—we want the fastest route because time is important to us.

review: argo nya tidak sesuai dengan yang di awal pemesanan padahal sesuai dengan titik aplikasi grab sekarang banyak biaya lain lain nya yg tidak ada konfirmasi nya ke penumpang sehingga harga argo sesudah sampai titik menjadi membengkak mending pake aplikasi sebelah manis di awal aja
translated_review: The fare wasn’t the same as what was initially shown, even though the pickup point was correct. Now Grab adds a bunch of other charges without informing the passenger, so the final fare becomes way higher. Better to use other apps—they look good only at the start.

review: ekonomis untuk aplikasi maxim penumpang maps nya masih kurang kumplit jadi untuk menentukan titik masih agak susah
translated_review: For the Maxim app—it’s economical, but the map for passengers is still incomplete, so it’s still a bit hard to select a location.

review: gak sesuai katanya grabcar hemat bisa 4 orang aku pesen grabcar hemat bawa 4 orang d suruh make yang lain mesene trs d suruh bayar normal yang tadinya cuma 12k jadi 26k
translated_review: It’s not accurate—they say GrabCar Hemat can fit 4 people, but when I booked it with 4, I was told to choose another option. I ended up having to pay the normal fare—what was 12K became 26K.

review: gojek memudahkan untuk bepergian kemana saja tapi tolong di perbaiki dari pihak gojek yg sedang eror saya yg kena makian dari driver
translated_review: Gojek makes it easy to travel anywhere, but please fix errors from the app’s side. I was the one getting yelled at by the driver.

review: tolong dong kasih tau driver nya jaga kebersihan masa jaket nya bauk kaos kaki basah yang udah busuk saya nahan mual terus sampai akhir nya minta berhenti sebelum sampai tujuan mana hlem nya bauk juga sama banyak bulu kucing
translated_review: Please tell the drivers to maintain cleanliness. The jacket smelled bad, the socks were wet and rotten. I had to hold back nausea and ended up asking to stop before reaching the destination. The helmet also smelled and was full of cat fur.

review: trm kasih udah menghtr sampek tujuan dangat puas sehat sehat ya pak semoga lancar untuk keluarga
translated_review: Thank you for getting me to my destination. Very satisfied. Stay healthy, sir—wishing your family success.

review: sya kecewa sya maps y grap susah di buka pakai 2 jari selalu susah lihat posisi driver dari peta
translated_review: I’m disappointed. The Grab map is hard to use. I can’t zoom in with two fingers. Always hard to see the driver’s location on the map.

review: skr gojek dibawah bintang 1 ratingnya jelek busuk lama bukan krn sinyal gue gue bandingin barengan mesen di grb enjoy cpt
translated_review: Now Gojek deserves below 1 star. The rating is awful. It’s not because of my signal—I tested it side-by-side with Grab, and Grab worked fine and fast.

review: gatau kenapa tapi sekarang gojek gak seperti dulu gapernah ada voucher diskon ongkir makin mahal intinyaa udah gak sebagus dulu
translated_review: I don’t know why, but Gojek isn’t like it used to be. No more delivery discount vouchers. It’s getting more expensive. Basically, it’s just not as good as before.

review: makasih ya buat mas nya orang nya ramah bngett kalo nge driver gak bakal nyesel deh sehat2 sekeluarga buat mas e
translated_review: Thank you to the driver—very friendly. If you get him, you won’t regret it. Wishing health and blessings for your whole family

review: udaah msen tinggal nunggu tapi tiba di batalin sama driver nya gara jarak jauh krna ongkos lebih murah pdhal kita juga mengerti dan faham suka melebihi ongkos nya
translated_review: Already ordered, just waiting, but then it was canceled by the driver because the distance was too far and the fare was too cheap — even though we understand and often give more than the fare.

review: suka dapat driver yang ga ramah ngomong nya kasar memang ga semua tapi sering
translated_review: I often get drivers who are unfriendly and talk rudely. Not all, but it happens a lot.

review: parah sih mau pake promo 55 udh mau klik pesan eh ilang tiba2 klo ga niat jgn php org sama pihak apl tolong manusiakan manusia masa ada argo 5rb an kasian driver nya belum bensin ihh parah bgt umr naek ini argo turun
translated_review: It’s terrible — wanted to use the 55 promo, already about to click order and suddenly it disappeared. If you’re not serious, don’t lead people on. To the app developers: please treat people like human beings. How can there be a fare of only 5,000 rupiah? The poor driver hasn't even covered gas. It’s really bad — minimum wage goes up but the fare goes down?

review: posisi driver selalu jauhterlalu lama menunggu dan kasihan drivernya karena jemput terlalu jauh driver sering mnta cancel jadinya berkali kali mesankenapa selalu kasih ke driver yg jauh padahal yg dekat juga banyak
translated_review: Driver is always far away — takes too long to wait and the driver ends up canceling because the pickup is too far. I end up having to order multiple times. Why are you always assigning far-away drivers, even though there are many nearby?

review: kacau kita bayar mahal full tapi di driver terima cuman 5000 dimana hati nurani kalian suatu saat kalian kena karmanya loh
translated_review: It’s a mess — we pay a high fare in full, but the driver only receives 5,000. Where is your conscience? One day you’ll get your karma.

review: maps kurang akurat byk driver pake fake lokasi driver jauh maaf ya akhirnya saya kembali ke ojol sebelah
translated_review: Maps are inaccurate, many drivers use fake locations, and the driver ends up being far away. Sorry, but I’m going back to the other ride-hailing app.

review: knp si driver nu selalu lama pdhl cm 2 menit kdg nunggu smpe 5 menit lebih
translated_review: Why is the driver always slow to arrive? It says 2 minutes but sometimes I wait over 5 minutes.

review: tolong dong masa udah 1 bulan lebih tiap chat driver selalu mengirim bener2 gak bs chat sama sekali sering bgt dicancel driver krn gak bs bales chat mau nelfon keburu dicancel masa diupdate malah jadi sampah gini
translated_review: Please, it’s been more than a month every time I chat with drivers, they often can’t chat back at all. They cancel a lot because they can’t reply. When I want to call, the order is already canceled. After the update, it became trash like this.

review: tolong dong mapsnya di perbaikin padahal titiknya sdh sesuai tapi driver malah di puter sampe kewalahan cari alamat di app sebelah ga pernah ada driver kewalahan cari alamat
translated_review: Please fix the maps — even though the pickup point is correct, the driver keeps getting turned around and has a hard time finding the address. This doesn’t happen with other apps.

review: judulnya layanan bantuan tapi gk ngebantu sama sekali kita ada keluhan susah dapat driver tapi gk ada respon dari cs malah ditutup terus chatnya tolong diperbaiki sistemnya
translated_review: It’s called the help service, but it doesn’t help at all. We have complaints about not being able to get a driver, but there’s no response from customer service — they just keep closing the chat. Please fix the system.

review: tolong banget dong saya udah hampir 2 jam mesen grab car gak ada yang ambil ambil keadaan urgent pun susah banget dapat grab carnya tolong lebih diperhatikan lagi dong waktu saya kebuang banyak banget cuman buat nungguin grabcar yang gak jelas ini
translated_review: Please, I’ve been trying to order a GrabCar for almost 2 hours and no one accepts it. It’s an urgent situation and still so hard to get a GrabCar. Please pay more attention — so much of my time was wasted just waiting for a GrabCar that never showed up.

review: saya memberi bintang 4 karena maps di gojek masih suka tidak bergerak saat driver gojek nya sudah sampai ke tujuan
translated_review: I gave 4 stars because the map on Gojek still often doesn’t move even when the driver has already arrived.

review: kenapa bintang 1 karena gocarnya 1 jam gak ketemu dan buat para driver gocar lagi kali gak usah kejar di gocar
translated_review: I gave 1 star because the GoCar never met up after an hour. To GoCar drivers, maybe don’t bother chasing GoCar orders anymore.

review: kenapa sih chat suka ga bisa di buka udh di pencet chat nya ga mau masuk ke room chat sebel banget mau balas chat driver jd ga bisa
translated_review: Why is it that the chat often doesn’t open? I click on it but it won’t enter the chat room. It’s really annoying — I want to reply to the driver but I can’t.

review: tolong diperbaiki lagi untuk driver nya biar kita nunggu engga terlalu lama karna driver tidak tahu jalan nya
translated_review: Please improve the drivers so that we don’t have to wait too long because they don’t know the way.

review: dikasih driver yg naikin harga gk sesuai aplikasi padahal dengan kesadaran diri pasti akan di kasih tip lebih cuman kali ini dapet driver yg tidak jujur kejadiannya ketika saya pulang dari kereta cepat mau ke jakbar
translated_review: Got assigned a driver who raised the price beyond what’s shown in the app — even though I usually give tips willingly. But this time I got a dishonest driver. It happened when I was returning from the high-speed train going to West Jakarta.

review: tolong dong di perbaikimasa saya pesen gocar udah 5x lebih di tolakin terus padahal rute nya ga jauh malah dibilang jauhhanya karena gerimis doang udah gitu saya bawa anak kecilsangat kecewa sama driver gocar mohon di perbaiki
translated_review: Please fix this — I’ve tried ordering GoCar more than five times and kept getting rejected even though the route isn’t far. They say it’s far just because of a little rain. And I was carrying a small child — very disappointed with the GoCar driver. Please fix it.

review: susah banget nyangkut ke gocar nyasuka pada ga responsma suka dpt yg jarak nya jauh dr tmpt sekarangtolong perbaiki lg min
translated_review: It’s so hard to get connected to GoCar — they often don’t respond. And sometimes I get drivers who are too far from my current location. Please fix it again, admin.

review: gojek selalu tepat waktu gak pakai lama sebagai tukang pijet panggilan gak punya motor gojek sangat membantu sekali bagi sy dalam menjemput rejeki allah semoga gojek selalu ada dan jaya dinegeri tercinta ini indonesia
translated_review: Gojek is always on time, no delays. As a traveling masseur with no motorbike, Gojek really helps me in earning a living. May Gojek always exist and thrive in this beloved country of Indonesia.

review: saya nunggu 2 jam masih ga dapet driver plis jika memang tidak bisa dapat driver dibatalkan saja jgn php
translated_review: I waited 2 hours and still no driver. Please cancel the order if no driver is available, don’t keep giving false hope.

review: aman selalu kenyamanan penumpang selalu diutamakan dan alhamdulillah juga member goride dan go car ramahramah
translated_review: Always safe — passenger comfort is always a priority. And thankfully the GoRide and GoCar members are all friendly.

review: salado beberapa kali ke potong tanpa ada driver yang datang ke lokasi penjemputan sama aja merampok uang user sangat memalukan
translated_review: My balance was deducted several times without any driver arriving at the pickup location — it’s basically robbing the user. Very disgraceful.

review: bapaknya ramah kaliii terimakasih ya pa karna bapa tepat waktu jadi saya di terima kerja makasih ya pak lancar terus rezekinya sehat ya pak
translated_review: The driver was super friendly — thank you sir! Because you were on time, I got accepted at my job interview. Thank you, may your income be smooth and may you stay healthy.

review: pelayanan mohon di perbaikijangan biar kan pelanggan sudah pesendannunggu lama malahan di batalkan driver posisi lagi hujanjdi pesan apk sebelah
translated_review: Please improve the service — don’t let the customer order and wait so long only to have the driver cancel because it’s raining. I had to use another app.

review: ini knp maxim menghubungkan ke layanan aneh gak bisa masuk pas masuk ke aplikasi lain ke game lancar aja knp ini
translated_review: Why does Maxim connect to a weird service? I can’t get in, but when I open another app like a game, it runs smoothly — what’s going on here?

review: kasih deskripsi di awal kalau memang bawa stroler bayi harus menggunakan gocar tipe l biar kami tidak salah pilih gocar
translated_review: Please give a description up front that if you're bringing a baby stroller, you must choose the GoCar L type so we don’t make the wrong choice.

review: sangat membantu limit paylatter nya okeh slama kita lancar pembayaran cepet naik limit okeh pokonya
translated_review: Very helpful, the paylater limit is good. As long as we make payments on time, the limit increases quickly. Overall, it’s great.

review: aplikasinya bagustapi drivernya kadang tidak ramahsistem report driver nya pun tidak ada jadi kurang banget lah kelengkapan fitur di aplikasi ini
translated_review: The app is good, but the drivers are sometimes unfriendly. The system for reporting drivers is also missing — the app really lacks in features.

review: saya tidak nyaman naik gojek skrg driver gojek skrg banyal pakai knlpot brisik ojol kok kebanyakan gaya
translated_review: I don’t feel comfortable taking Gojek now — too many Gojek drivers use noisy exhaust pipes. It’s like motorcycle taxis are all about style now.

review: lebih nyaman pakai gojek banyak promo lebih safety terlindungi asuransi selama diperjalanan punya kantor tempat mengadu yuk bagikan ke temen2 supaya pakai gojekyg penting promonya tiap bulan terus ada buat konsumen
translated_review: More comfortable using Gojek — lots of promos, safer, covered by insurance during the trip, and they have an office to file complaints. Let’s share it with friends so they use Gojek too. The most important thing is the promos every month for consumers.

review: aplikasi susah di buka padahal sinyal lancar gk jelas bangetpadahal lagi butuh butuh nya buat nyari jemputanmalah susahalasannya sinyal tidak tersambungpadahal buat buka aplikasi lain gak ada kendalalancar banget malahan tolong perbaikan nya dari developer
translated_review: The app is hard to open even though the signal is fine. Doesn’t make any sense — I really needed it to find a ride but it didn’t work. The reason given is no signal, but other apps open smoothly. Please fix this, developers.

review: ga ada voucher lagi harga naik lagi mohon diturunkan spt minggu kemarin jadi saya bisa pake lagi jasa gojek
translated_review: No more vouchers, prices have gone up again. Please lower them like last week so I can use Gojek services again.

review: aduh setelah update terbaru aplikasi nya jadi berat nih padahal hp saya masih baru ui untuk scrolling nya lag padahal pake native bulan flutter gojek nya tolong ya developer lebih di optimalkan lagi
translated_review: Ugh, after the latest update the app feels heavy, even though my phone is still new. The UI lags when scrolling — and it uses native Flutter. Gojek devs, please optimize this better.

review: estimasi gocar hemat adalah scam ya gaes ya disini tertera kurang lebih 710 menit estimasi drivernya sampai tapi nyatanya sampe 40menit belum sampe gila belum lagi waktu perjalanan bisabisa sampe sejam
translated_review: The “GoCar Hemat” estimate is a scam, guys. It showed 7–10 minutes ETA, but after 40 minutes the driver still hadn’t arrived. Crazy! And the trip time hasn’t even started — it could take an hour total.

review: saya peke gocar hemat dari jam set 2 sampe jm set 5 gaada satu pun driver yang mau ambil padahal nominal pembayarannya semakin naik melebihi gocar biasa sangat tidak menyenangkan
translated_review: I use GoCar Hemat from 2 PM to 5 PM, no driver wants to pick me up even though payment amount increases beyond regular GoCar. Very unpleasant.

review: kenapa ya grab akhir2 ni tarif ongkosnya terlalu mahal apakah tidak ada promo lagi tak seperti grab di indonesia sana banyak bagi promo pada penggunanya
translated_review: Why is Grab’s fare getting too expensive lately? Are there no more promos? It’s not like Grab in Indonesia where they often give promos to users.

review: nganterin anak sekolah setelah sampe ada laporan sudah sampe sekolah bu terimakasih pak jrg ada driver seperti ini
translated_review: Dropping off my child at school — once we arrived, the driver sent a report saying “arrived at school.” Thank you, sir — very few drivers do this.

review: potongan argo yang sangat fantastis ratarata 30 dari tarif yg dibayarkan pelanggan sungguh luar biasa kau jek
translated_review: The commission cuts are insane — on average, 30% of what the customer pays gets taken. That’s just unbelievable, Gojek.

review: pliss maxim driver klo ada motor nya gak layak buat narik jangan di acc orang rata2 naik ojek buat ngejar waktu klo motor nya kaya naek sepeda sama aja boong
translated_review: Please, Maxim — don’t approve drivers whose bikes aren’t roadworthy. Most people take bike rides to save time. If the bike rides like a bicycle, it’s pointless.

review: gojek plushny malah promonya di harga tinggi semua padahal gojek yg biasa promonya malah lebih ramah dikantong jadi ngyesel
translated_review: Gojek Plus promos are actually for higher-priced rides. The regular Gojek has way more wallet-friendly promos. Totally regret it.

review: kenapa pas ujan kadang susah banget dapetin pesenen gajelas banget ni aplikasi gimana nanti orang kalo udah bilang ke suami atau ortu nya gausa jemput nanti aku gojek trs tiba tiba ujan dan ga dapet dapet pesenen aplikasi gajelas ini hapus aja mendingan
translated_review: Why is it that when it rains, it’s super hard to get a ride? This app is so unreliable — imagine telling your husband or parents “don’t pick me up, I’ll Gojek,” and then it rains and you can’t get a ride. Just delete the app already.

review: gila grab ini lama lama mesen grabcar lama banget dapetnya sekalinya dapet di cancel bener bener kl org yg lagi buru buru gimana nasib nya tolong di perbaiki nih
translated_review: Grab is getting worse — it takes forever to get a GrabCar. And when you finally do, they cancel. What happens if someone’s in a hurry? Please fix this.

review: tidak lengkap daftar lokasi khusus deli serdang map titik jemputan atau alamat yg di butuhkan jga tidak tersedia gmana mau pakai untuk transportasi dan bisnis model gni
translated_review: The list of pickup points is incomplete, especially for Deli Serdang. The required pickup points or addresses aren’t even there. How can this be used for transportation or business with this kind of model?

review: enak naik gojek hemat waktu biaya apa lg klo dpt drivernya yg ramah dn santun
translated_review: Feels great riding with Gojek — saves time and money, especially if you get a friendly and polite driver.

review: grab promonya mantep diskon 15rb jd kita bisa ngelebihin 15rb nya ke driver yg anter pesenan kita dehh mantulll pokonyaaa
translated_review: Grab’s promo is great, 15k discount so we can tip the driver more for delivering our orders. Really awesome.

review: semuanya sudah baik semoga semakin baik sejalan dengan berkembangnya teknologi yang masih kurang dalam informasi waktu penjemputan kadang tertulis dilayar 5 menit tapi driver yang mengambil tiba ditempat penjemputan 15 menit
translated_review: Everything is already good — hope it keeps getting better as technology improves. One thing that’s still lacking is pickup time information: it often says 5 minutes on the screen but the driver actually arrives in 15 minutes

review: sekarang grabcar pelayanannya buruk banget sumpah minta saya suruh cancel terus alesan jauh pdahal cuma 10menit gak lagi deh make grabcar
translated_review: GrabCar's service is really terrible now, seriously. They keep asking me to cancel with the excuse that it's “too far,” even though it’s only 10 minutes away. Never using GrabCar again.

review: sangat hemat cuman agak kesal juga sama bapak bapak gojek yang semangat kerja bapak jangan sering bikin emosi
translated_review: It’s really cost-effective, but honestly, some of the Gojek drivers can be annoying even though they’re working hard — please don’t let that enthusiasm turn into frustration for passengers.

review: gajelas driver susah bgt buat respon bikin emosi apalagi dijam jam laper nunggu berjam jam karna driver gamerespon sama sekali
translated_review: It’s unclear, drivers are very hard to respond to, making me frustrated especially during hungry hours, waiting for hours because the driver doesn’t respond at all.

review: masukan aja utk goride coba helm2 nya jgn pada kotor kira2 sdh tdk layak helmnyya ugk segera d ganti
translated_review: Just a suggestion for GoRide: please replace the helmets when they’re already dirty or no longer suitable for use.

review: kenapa chat dengan driver tidak bisa sudah sering seperti ini kalo di perbaiki saya kasih bintang 5
translated_review: Why can’t we chat with the driver? This happens all the time. If you fix it, I’ll give 5 stars.

review: biasanya ada share perjalanan kalau lagi naik ojek updatean terbaru malah ngga ada menunya bolak balik cari menu share ngga ada malah mabok pusing mau muntah dijalanan sambil nyari tombol berbagi perjalanan yg lagi naik ojek malah makin jelek aplikasinya bikin kesal
translated_review: There used to be a “share trip” feature when riding a motorcycle taxi. In the latest update, the menu is gone. I kept searching for it while on the ride, got dizzy and nauseous. The app keeps getting worse — very frustrating.

review: bunyi sound yg baru di aplikasi ini sangat mengganggu walaupun sdh dth drivernya tp soundnya tdk hilang
translated_review: The new sound notification in this app is really annoying. Even after the driver has arrived, the sound doesn’t stop.

review: suka banget tiap hari ada promo sembako tapi sayangnya gak pernah dapet gratis ongkir dan karena di plosok aku jarang dapet driver uu
translated_review: I love that there are daily sembako (grocery) promos, but sadly I never get free delivery. Also, since I live in a remote area, it’s hard to find a driver.

review: tolong untuk semua para driver grab tolong sediakan uang kembalian ya saya sehari pake grab 4 kali dan semua driver bilang tidak ada uang kembalian atau ada uang yg kecil
translated_review: Please, all Grab drivers, always prepare small change. I use Grab 4 times a day and every time the driver says they don’t have change.

review: saya kecewa harga awal tarif 25 ribu terus tiba2 jadi 38 ribu tanpa konfirmasi driver mengaktifkan tarif tunggu
translated_review: I’m disappointed. The original fare was 25,000, then suddenly it jumped to 38,000 without any notice — the driver activated the waiting fee.

review: kenapa aplikasi grab ga bisa buka buat pesan driver saya mau pesan driver lama banget tolong di perbaiki sistem operasi nyamksh ya
translated_review: Why can’t I open the Grab app to order a driver? It takes forever. Please fix your operating system. Thank you.

review: driver nya ramah baik saya pelanggan yang punya trauma jatuh dan drivernya mau nurutin untuk pelan pelan saja driver sangat terpercaya terima kasih pak driver sehat sehat terus ya pak
translated_review: The driver was friendly and kind. I’m a customer who has trauma from falling, and the driver agreed to drive slowly. Very trustworthy. Thank you, sir. Stay healthy.

review: aplikasi nya curang kami kaseh ongkos mahal 18000 kedrivernya cuma dapet 5000 kasian sekali para drivernya
translated_review: The app is cheating. We pay a high fare (e.g., 18,000) but the driver only gets 5,000 — poor drivers.

review: ui user interface nya sangat jelek mapnya gak bisa zoom inzoom out ketika driver otw lokasi penjemputan
translated_review: The user interface is really bad — the map can’t be zoomed in or out when the driver is on the way to the pickup point.

review: baru ini kecewa sama gojek masa udah dicancel malah marah ke saya saya kan cancel garagara jaraknya jauh padahal saya sudah di tunggu bunda saya malah ga terima
translated_review: This is the first time I’ve been disappointed with Gojek. I canceled the ride because the distance was too far, but the driver got mad at me — even though my mom was already waiting for me.

review: hilangkan aja fitur hemat kalau driver kalian menolak utk pickup customer akan kesulitan klo driver semua nya menolak gitu hemat
translated_review: Just remove the “Hemat” (economy) feature if your drivers keep refusing pickups. It’s hard for customers if all drivers keep declining.

review: aplikasi nya ngelag padahal sebelum nya lancar lancar aja hp nya di restart pun sama aja tolong di perbaiki lagi di karena sudah sering pakai grab
translated_review: The app is lagging now, even though it used to run smoothly. Restarting the phone doesn’t help. Please fix this — I’ve been using Grab a lot.

review: aplikasi maxim nie sangat membantu se x dg mudh cept n hrga nya juga trjangkau smoga lncar sll buat pra pnumpang yg naik dan lncr trs aplikasi maxim y
translated_review: This Maxim app is really helpful — it’s easy, fast, and the prices are affordable. Hope everything keeps going smoothly for both passengers and the app itself.

review: titk jemput bisa 3 sampai 4 km ongkos tetapdriver di rugikan terus menerus oleh sistem goto yg bobrokbrengseeek
translated_review: Pickup points can be 3 to 4 km away, but the fare stays the same. Drivers keep getting harmed by Goto’s broken system. Ridiculous!

review: woi gajelas driver jauh jauh semua pdhl ada driver yg deket haduh ini buang waktu banget
translated_review: Hey, this doesn’t make sense — the app keeps assigning faraway drivers, even though there are nearby ones. Total waste of time.

review: tolong supir grab car nya di filter lagi ya ga pernah ada sopan santun sama sekali satu org pun
translated_review: Please filter GrabCar drivers better — not a single one has shown basic manners or politeness.

review: minta tolong diperbaiki lagi mapsnya krna sya selalu dpat driver yg lumayan jauh dan terpantau maps tidak akurat masak drivernya muter2 terus tapi stelah aplikasi sya ttup dan buka kembali tiba2 driver sudah dekat
translated_review: Please fix the map — I keep getting drivers who are quite far away. The map isn’t accurate. The driver keeps circling around, but after I close and reopen the app, suddenly the driver is already nearby

review: boss nya grab makin kaya raya karyawan grab hidupnya makin sejahteramitra nya grab yg nyari duit dijalanan hidup makin menderitapotongan makin gedetarif makin dimurahin bener2 sadis dan kejam sama mitra kenapa grab makin biadab sama mitra
translated_review: The Grab bosses are getting richer, Grab employees are getting better lives, but Grab’s driver-partners who earn money on the streets are suffering more and more. The commission cuts keep increasing, the fares keep dropping — this is truly cruel and inhumane to partners. Why is Grab becoming so evil toward its partners?

review: baru kali pakai gojek di cancel 3x kecewa sekali mohon maaf saya pindah aplikasi lain
translated_review: First time using Gojek and got canceled 3 times — very disappointed. Sorry, I’m switching to another app.

review: maxim terbaik pokok nya yang jelekin maxim biasa orang nya orang pelit aku senang pakai maxim nggak nungguin driver nya lama cepet banget
translated_review: Maxim is the best, period. People who talk bad about Maxim are usually stingy. I love using Maxim, no long waiting — the driver comes super fast.

review: saya memesan layanan grabcar plus yang datang taksi blue bird dengan kondisi mobil lama saya berharap yang datang mobil pribadi yang baru kenapa yang datang malah blue bird tolong di perbaiki sistem nya agar grabcar plus yang datang mobil pribadi
translated_review: I ordered GrabCar Plus and got a Bluebird taxi with an old vehicle. I was expecting a new private car. Please fix the system so that GrabCar Plus only sends private cars.

review: sangat membantu dalam urusan transportasi untuk ortu ku semoga senantiasa bertambah bagus lagi kedepannya good job
translated_review: Very helpful for my parents’ transportation needs. Hopefully it keeps getting better in the future. Good job!

review: baru pertama kali pesen grabcar diaplikasi 39rb tapi driver minta dibatalkan dengan alasan kehabisan cargo dan pilih offline alhasil driver minta ongkos 70rb not recommended
translated_review: First time ordering GrabCar — the app said 39k, but the driver asked me to cancel due to lack of cargo and said to switch to offline. In the end, he asked for 70k. Not recommended.

review: alhamdulilah pak supir terbaik kmren tas dan hp saya ketinggalan di mobil di balikin lagi sama pak supir nyaterimakasih pak supir terpercaya jujur dan adil
translated_review: Alhamdulillah, best driver ever. Yesterday I left my bag and phone in the car, and the driver returned them. Thank you, sir — trustworthy, honest, and fair.

review: sering banget dapet driver nya ga sesuai apa yang di pilih saya pilih goride comfort tapi dateng nya udh kaya goride hemat
translated_review: So often I get drivers that don’t match my selection. I choose GoRide Comfort, but what shows up is more like GoRide Hemat.

review: berangkat kerja waktu hujan okeylah cepat dapat driver lah ini waktu pulang kerja hujannya reda kenapa malah lama banget dpt drivernya nungguin 2 jam nihh min tolong lebih diperhatikan lagi ya min
translated_review: When heading to work in the rain — it’s okay, I get a driver quickly. But going home when the rain stops, why is it so hard to get one? I waited 2 hours! Please pay more attention, admin.

review: sering bgt ngegunain jasa grab ini tapi sekarang malah di buat kecewa karena banyak bgt oknum oknum grab yang suka cat calling dan suka ngegodain orang dengan cara menjijikan bahkan sampe ngajak ke hotel saya harap lebih diperhatikan lagi kesopanan para pekerjanya
translated_review: I use Grab a lot, but now I’m disappointed. There are too many Grab drivers making disgusting catcalls and flirting, even asking to go to hotels. Please ensure better manners from your workers.

review: murah memang tapi klo di aplikasi ada tulisan segera akan tibadriver tiba lrbih dari 4 menit kecewa
translated_review: It’s cheap, but if the app says “arriving soon” and the driver comes more than 4 minutes late, that’s disappointing.

review: driver mobilnya sombongsombong semua kecuali dinaikin harganya baru mau kalau memang niatnya ga mau sesuai aplikasi ga usah make maxim
translated_review: Maxim car drivers are all arrogant unless you raise the fare — only then they’ll accept. If you don’t intend to follow the app’s pricing, don’t use Maxim at all.

review: sebel bgt dapet drivernya jauh mulu padahal deket rumah juga banyak driver saya mau bawa orangtua ke rs aja nunggunya sampe 1 jam kalau urgent bgt amit2 bisa lewat tolong dong gojek yg bener kalau cariin driver menyusahkan orang
translated_review: I’m so annoyed — I always get drivers from far away, even though there are plenty near my house. I wanted to take my parents to the hospital and waited over an hour. If it was really urgent, something bad could happen. Please, Gojek, fix this — it’s causing trouble.

review: aplikasi terlalu beratentah derita apa yang ditanggung terutama mapsnnya terasa berat dan tak bergunapadahal sudah berapa banyak biaya layanan ke aplikasi yang dibebankan ke customertp tidak ada perbaikan ke arah yang lebih baiklancarentengmalah semakin ruwet
translated_review: The app is too heavy. I don’t know what suffering the maps feature is going through — it's slow and useless. Even though so many service fees are charged to customers, there’s no meaningful improvement. Instead of getting lighter and smoother, the app keeps getting more cluttered.

review: apps ga jelasdrivernya ga niat kerjauda dikasih harga lebih malah di tolak terusga niat kerja apa gimanadan buat devlopernya mohon appsnya mohon di benahi lagi kadang sering error tiba tiba
translated_review: This app is a mess. The drivers don’t want to work. Even when offered a higher price, they still refuse. Are they even serious about working? And for the developers — please fix the app. It crashes randomly.

review: sampaikan pada semua drivernya kalo sekiranya ngga mau diambil karna alasan gerimis ringan atau apa kabarin customer nya kan ada fitur chat sering bgt driver kaya gini kalo lagi gerimis kecil udah nunggu 5 menit tibatiba di cancel dungu
translated_review: Please tell all your drivers that if they don’t want to take an order because of light rain or other reasons, they should notify the customer — there’s a chat feature for a reason. Too often drivers cancel after 5 minutes of waiting in light drizzle. Ridiculous.

review: alamat di maps susah bener ngatur nyaa tolong diperbaiki dong ngga ada pilihan buat cancel juga kalo lama2 gini kasian juga pihak driver grab jadi kekurangan penghasilan karena orang2 pindah aplikasi lain
translated_review: It's so hard to manage addresses on the map. Please fix this. There’s also no option to cancel if it takes too long. Feel sorry for Grab drivers — people are switching apps, and they lose income because of it.

review: driver datangnya sudah terlambat namun dengan sangat angkuhnya menolak lagi untuk membawa saya dan meminta supaya saya batalkan menggunakan mobilnya
translated_review: The driver arrived late and arrogantly refused to take me, asking me to cancel instead of using his car.

review: apk sudah bagus tp harga kurang terjangkau apalagi gocar terlalu mahal sudah tidak seperti apk lama skrg apa apa serbah mahal diskongoplus cuman nutupin dosa doang harganya ga berkurang belum iklannya yg terlalu memaksa tekan tombol cancel malah lari ke situs
translated_review: The app is fine, but the prices are no longer affordable — especially GoCar, which is way too expensive now. Not like the old app. Everything is more expensive. GoPlus discounts are just to cover up the price hikes. And the ads — they’re way too intrusive. Pressing cancel even takes you to a website.

review: okelah apk nya bagus banget diskon goofodgojek kendaraan nya besar bgt potongan nya juga kadang besar bgt tapi tolong kenapa ada aja penggendara nya yang kurang ramah sama pelannggan
translated_review: Okay, the app is great — big discounts on GoFood and vehicles, and sometimes big vouchers. But please, why are there always some drivers who are rude to customers?

review: halo ini aplikasinya lumayan bagus tapi biasanya aku kok ga dapet driver yah biasanya juga drivernya keluar jalur
translated_review: Hello, the app is pretty good, but lately I can’t seem to get a driver. And when I do, they go off-route

review: baru kali ini seumur hidup dibntakdimarahin smaa pengemudi nyapdhal ngmng baikujungmarah marahditngah jalanudah lobang malah dihatamga bner dah naik motor nyaaa sampe diliatin sma orangdijalanpagimalah ga mood sma tukang ojekbnyk yg bilng mnding gbok dari pada maxim keamanan dan keramahan nya kurang bngttolong di bantu
translated_review: For the first time in my life, I got yelled at and scolded by a driver even though I was speaking politely. He got angry in the middle of the road, hit a pothole, and we were shaken roughly on the motorbike. People on the street were staring. Totally ruined my morning mood. Many people say it's better to use GoBox than Maxim — the safety and friendliness are really lacking. Please help.

review: alamat maps gabisa sesuai titik beberapa kali driver salah padahal udh ditulis lengkap benerin apk nya tq
translated_review: The map address doesn’t match the actual location — drivers often get it wrong even though I wrote it clearly. Fix the app, thanks.

review: aku harap penumpang bisa melihat ratingnya di gojek bukan hanya driver yang bis lihat jadi misalnya jika ada penyebab rating jelek penumpang bisa memperbaiki nya
translated_review: I hope passengers can also see their ratings on Gojek — not just the drivers. That way, if there’s a reason for a bad rating, the passenger can work on improving it.

review: plis saya dapet driver yang nawar pengen di lebihin trs gaptek ngg tau cara scan tolong dr grab ada survei untuk setiap ojol yang bisa cara bayar scan
translated_review: Please, I got a driver who kept asking to be tipped and didn’t know how to use the scan payment. Grab, please provide a survey to assess which drivers actually understand how to use scan payments.

review: biasanya sering dan enjoy pake gojekganti hp terus mau masuk akun tapi lupa goto pin caranya ribet benerharus pake foto dllmaaf tapi kurang praktis gitu saya jadi bingung gmna cara buat ngeganti goto pin buat bisa masuk akun
translated_review: I often use and enjoy Gojek, but after changing phones I wanted to log in and forgot my GoTo PIN. The process is super complicated — needing photos and all. Sorry, but it’s not user-friendly. I’m confused about how to reset my GoTo PIN to access the account.

review: banyak kendaraan roda duanya sudah tidak layak pakai kenapa harus diberikan jadi driver maxim pelayanan dan kenyamanan harus diutamakan
translated_review: Many of the two-wheeled vehicles are not fit for use. Why are they allowed to be Maxim drivers? Service and comfort should be prioritized.

review: makin update makin parah sampai gak bisa lihat gojek nya sudah jalan apa belum atau sampai mana tolong perbaiki lagi
translated_review: The more updates, the worse it gets. I can’t even see whether my Gojek ride has started or where they are. Please fix this.

review: selektif lagi dalam bermitra banyak sekali driver yang minta dibayar lebih kejadian pesen car dapat harga 185k dimintain 50k duluan boroboro tuh driver gerak gamau jalan dia malah nyuruh customer batalin mohon sekali mental opang kayak gitu ditindak karena udah banyak yg ngeluhin hal ini
translated_review: Be more selective in choosing partners. Too many drivers ask for extra payments. I ordered a car for 185k and was asked to pay 50k upfront. The driver wouldn’t even move unless I canceled. Please take action against this kind of driver — many users have complained about this.

review: sering di jauhkan dari lokasi tujuan dan di caci maki oleh drivermembawa motor dengan ugalan dan di turunkan padasaat di jalan
translated_review: I’m often taken far from my destination and verbally abused by drivers. They drive recklessly and drop me off in the middle of the road.

review: di tanggal 7 feb 2025 masih sering kena biaya rp 8000 untuk grab ride mulai tanggal 10 feb 2025 sekarang kena rp 11000 padahal pindah ke grab karena murah tapi ya ga ada beda sama aplikasi sebelah
translated_review: On February 7, 2025, I was still charged Rp 8,000 for Grab rides. Now from February 10, 2025, it’s Rp 11,000. I switched to Grab because it was cheaper, but now it’s no different from the other app.

review: pakai aplikasi kendaraan online berharap mempermudah mobilitas pada kenyataan ketika hujan turun yg namanya mobil motor syusyah syekali dicari yg ada di cancel trus tolong klo nyari rekan driver mobil yg beneran nyari kerja bukan iseng aja ngisi waktu
translated_review: I use ride-hailing apps hoping for easier mobility, but when it rains it’s a nightmare — cars and bikes are impossible to find, and rides keep getting canceled. Please hire drivers who actually want to work, not just those killing time.

review: terlalu banyak gaya aplikasi gojek ini mau daftar pun mau tunggu 60 menit kira aplikasi transportasi kau aja y
translated_review: Gojek has too many gimmicks. Even just registering takes 60 minutes. Do you think you’re some premium app?

review: saya menggunakan aplikasi gojek transportasi sangat membantu untuk berpergian ke mana saja sangat gampang untuk digunakan
translated_review: I use the Gojek app for transportation — it’s really helpful to get around and easy to use.

review: tolong upgrade pembatalan dari driver sering banget pesen tapi selalu dapet driver susahbeda sama shopee 1x 2x gagal langsung driver ga bisa cancel
translated_review: Please upgrade the cancellation system. I often order but keep getting unresponsive drivers. Unlike Shopee, which blocks drivers after 1 or 2 failed attempts — Gojek drivers can keep canceling endlessly.

review: kaktlg tambahin pendapatnya bang ojol kak apalagi kl musim hujan kek gnikl pas hujan ssuh dapt driverbuat smgt kerja kak tw sdri xan dijalan kl hujan kek gni blm merka jg kondsi bdn jg buat kerjaa
translated_review: Please add opinions from the ojol (motorcycle taxi) drivers, especially during the rainy season like this, it’s really hard to get drivers. Keep up the spirit, bro/sis, because their bodies are not in perfect condition to work during rain like this.

review: tolong adain fitur ga ngomong sama driver car ngga papa ada biaya tambahan ngga semua orang mau denger ocehan driver apalagi ngeluh masalah bbm klo jauh kita semua tau bbm mahal ngeluhnya sama pemerintah aja plis dari user rating 36 lol
translated_review: Please add a feature for “no talking” in car rides. I don’t mind paying extra — not everyone wants to hear the driver rant, especially complaining about fuel prices. We all know fuel is expensive — complain to the government, not the passengers. Rating: 3.6, LOL.

review: udah malas rasanya naik gojek kemarin minggu malam senin subuh ambil voucher tapi gak muncul heran gojek sekarang
translated_review: I’m fed up with Gojek. Last Sunday night, early Monday, I tried to use a voucher but it didn’t appear. I don’t understand Gojek anymore.

review: cari driver jarak deket susah krn ke driver terimanya sedikit potongannya gede ke drivergojek jng menyusahkan driver dan juga usernya sesuai kan tarif yg di terima ke driver
translated_review: It’s hard to find nearby drivers because they earn so little. The cut Gojek takes is huge. Gojek, stop making things hard for both drivers and users. Match the fare with what the driver actually receives.

review: sdah lama pake gojek tpi d saat butuh dana gk bisa kasih pinjaman katanya perbanyak transaksi sama aja gk bisa gk jelas aplikasi ini
translated_review: I’ve used Gojek for a long time, but when I needed emergency funds, they said I needed more transactions first. Still didn’t get any help. This app makes no sense.

review: dapet driver tp gak ada yg mau ambil padahal jarak gak jauh sampe 4x ganti driver
translated_review: I got a driver assigned, but no one wanted to take the ride — even though the distance wasn’t far. I had to go through 4 driver changes.

review: kadangkadang ada driver mau menjemput tapi berhenti di tengah jalan gak bisa dihubungi sering banget ngasih driver yang jaraknya jauh lebih parah lagi estimasi waktu jauh dari kenyataan aslinya 15 menit dibilang cumab3 menit
translated_review: Sometimes a driver accepts the order but stops midway and can’t be contacted. Also, often the driver assigned is far away. Worse, the estimated time is totally wrong — it says 3 minutes when it’s actually 15.

review: grab ga jelas makin hari makin naik grab hematnya lama kalo naik terus gini gamau lg pake grabdan driver suka ga jalan udh di tungguin lama
translated_review: Grab is getting more unclear. Prices keep rising. Grab Hemat takes forever. If this keeps up, I won’t use Grab again. Drivers also take forever to start moving.

review: gila ya gojek ini hujan2gak ada yang nyantol sama sekali kalau dibatalin uang makin naik mana blm termasuk parkir pula gk ngotak sama sekali
translated_review: Gojek is insane. During the rain, not a single driver accepted. And when I cancel, the price goes up — and that’s not even including parking. Makes no sense at all.

review: diupdate makin lemot blok driver ujan ujan mapsnya nyeleneh diatur sudah betul diaplikasi cacat ongkir mahal app cacat terakhir pakai remove
translated_review: The app is getting slower after updates, blocking drivers when it rains. The maps are weird and not accurate, even though I set the location correctly. The app is faulty, the delivery fees are expensive. Last time I used it, I removed the app.

review: apknya si oke dan membantu bgt tp masi banyak driver yg gamau ngasih uang kembalian kaya 45rb pun kdg ga dikembaliin bahkan sering bgt ketemu driver yg minta double pdhl kita jg sesuai apk aja ga kemana mna lgi
translated_review: The app is okay and very helpful, but many drivers refuse to give change. Even if it’s 45k, sometimes it’s not returned. I often meet drivers who ask for double the fare, even though we just follow the app prices without going anywhere else.

review: tolong usahakan setiap driver telah menyiapkan uang kembalian karena tidak semua penumpang membawa uang pas setiap memesan selalu tidak ada driver yg punya kembalian
translated_review: Please make sure every driver prepares change, because not all passengers carry exact cash. Every time I order, no driver has change.

review: boleh jujur tarif ongkir mahal bahkan setelah berlangganan gojek plus potongannya juga tidak seberapa bahkan jauh dibanding dg apk sebelah ini apk anak negeri harusnya lebih user friendly dalam beberapa aspek
translated_review: Honestly, delivery fees are expensive, even after subscribing to Gojek Plus. The commission cut is small and much worse compared to other apps. This is a local app and should be more user-friendly in some aspects.

review: masa penumpang di turunin tengah jalan malam tujuan masih jauhh 0312 no pol motornya b 5583 tca
translated_review: Passengers get dropped off in the middle of the road at night, even though the destination is still far. On 03/12, motorbike with plate B 5583 TCA.

review: ini mode hematnya kemana ya kok di app saya gaada ya padahal nyoba yang deketnya 005 km tetep gak dapat tolong kembalikan fiturnya karena itu alasan pake gojek kalo ngga yg fitur baru gedein lagi harganya biar rp 30000 atau 35000max harganya
translated_review: Where did the “economy mode” go? I don’t see it in my app, even when I tried ordering close by (0.05 km), I still didn’t get a driver. Please bring back that feature because that’s why I use Gojek. Otherwise, increase the minimum fare to 30k or 35k max.

review: ada aja oknum driver yg tidak menyenangkan seumur pke gojek atau gocar enak legowo cmn driver hari ini bikin saya speechless
translated_review: There are always some problematic drivers. I’ve used Gojek or GoCar for years and am usually patient, but today’s driver left me speechless.

review: aplikasi jelek ayo kita ramai ramai tinggalkan aplikaai ini bukannya berbenah masalah managemen nya malah makin buruk makin ngeduitin jangan pake gojek lagi
translated_review: The app is bad. Let’s all leave this app together. Instead of fixing management problems, it keeps getting worse and more greedy. Don’t use Gojek anymore.

review: udh sering pake driver dateng cepet cuma untuk metode pembayaran bisa pake e wallet yang lebih stabil selain kaspro mungkin dana atau yang lainnya
translated_review: I often get fast drivers, but please add more stable e-wallet payment options besides KasPro, maybe Dana or others.

review: jangan ada pilihan grab car hemat jika di chat drivernya minta lebih argonya lebih teliti lagi mencari driver khususnya driver grab car
translated_review: Please remove the “Grab Car Economy” option if drivers keep asking for extra payment. The system should be more careful in selecting drivers, especially for Grab Car.

review: kok gw pas daftar ga bisa ya padahal no nya udah bisa nama udah bisa email nya juga baru tapi kok tetep ga bisa mohon bantuannya pihak gojek
translated_review: I tried to register but couldn’t, even though my phone number, name, and email are valid and new. Please help Gojek.

review: hari ini dapet driver g d respon nungguin lama g ada d jemput hampir sejam nungguin mulai hari ini uninstall aplikasi habis ini ada notifikasi balasan mohon maaf tapi tidak ada perubahan lihat komentar d bawah di tanggal tanggal sebelumnya sangat buruk
translated_review: Today I got a driver who didn’t respond, waited forever, never picked me up. Waited almost an hour. Uninstalling the app starting today. Even after they apologized, nothing changed. Look at previous comments—really bad.

review: tolong di perhatikan lg untuk driver nya terutama saat hujan sudah menunggu lama lama driver se enaknya malah di batalin
translated_review: Please pay attention to drivers, especially during rain. After waiting a long time, drivers just cancel as they please.

review: gojek yg skrng terlalu bnyak kurangnya membuat para pengguna gojek kurang nyaman memakai aplikasi ini udah banyak keluhan tapi tetap gaada perubahan sama skli heraannnnn
translated_review: Gojek nowadays has too many flaws, making users uncomfortable. There are many complaints but no changes at all. Weird.

review: mobil datang dalam tempo yang cepat dan tak terlalu lama menunggu pengemudinya ramah dan sangat membantu penumpang
translated_review: The car arrived quickly, and the driver was friendly and very helpful to the passengers.

review: padahal sy sudah pakai yg di prioritaskan tapi masih lama sekali dpt driver sampai saya harus bolos sekolah hari ini
translated_review: I already used the prioritized service but still waited too long to get a driver, causing me to skip school today.

review: yang terburuburu jgn pesan gojek karna kata drivernya gak boleh ngebut emang dilarang oleh gojek semua driver gitu wajar aja saat saya bilang ngebut kak saya telat speed maximal 40kmjam ya pasti telat lah
translated_review: Don’t order Gojek if you’re in a hurry. The driver said you’re not allowed to speed. It’s understandable that when I told the driver I was late, the max speed was 40 km/h, so of course I was late.
