review: sudah dua kali nunggu gak dapet driver ga ada kepastian juga dari gojek total nunggu 1 jam 50 menit an ga dapet apa beda sama sebelah waktu dulu saya juga sering dapet kendala kayak gini makanya saya pindah aja ke platform sebelah
translated_review: I waited twice and didn’t get a driver. No certainty from Gojek at all. Total waiting time was around 1 hour 50 minutes with no ride. It’s no different from other platforms. I switched to other apps because of this.

review: tolong dong di perbaiki lagi untuk maps nya saya mau berangkat kerja ada rute yang lebih dekattapi malah otomatis pilih rute terjauhlalu saya sudah blg ke driver nya untuk pilih rute yg lebih dekat dia lebih memilih rute terjauh tolong lah di perbaiki
translated_review: Please fix the maps, I want to go to work and there is a closer route, but the app automatically chooses the longest route. I’ve told the driver to pick the closer route but he still chose the farthest one. Please fix this.

review: knp fitur superbank gk ada di apk padahal di iklan nya katanya bisa di akses dari apk gojek
translated_review: Why isn’t the Superbank feature available on the app, even though the ads say it can be accessed from the Gojek app?

review: sangat tidak adil dalam mengambil keputusan sesuka hatinya dalam menutup akun orang selidiki sampai tuntas akun2 palsu pelor yg merugikan mitra golek jgn asal pm mitra yg mencari nafkah buat keluarga
translated_review: It’s unfair how they suspend accounts arbitrarily. Investigate fully before closing accounts. Fake accounts cause losses to partners, but they shut down partners who work to support their families without proper investigation.

review: download nya lama sekalidiskon cuma awal pakaitapi enak gojek nya selalu dpet yang ramah dan baik 9510 ini aplikasi
translated_review: Takes forever to download. Discounts are only at the beginning. But Gojek is nice, always get polite and kind drivers. 9510 app.

review: tolong kepada it gojek setiap saya pesan goride motor driver di map tidak bergerak sama sekali dan tiba2 driver nya muncul kasihan driver nya kalau dapat jauh motor driver yg di map gak gerak2 tapi driver nya sdh di jalan
translated_review: Please Gojek IT team, every time I order GoRide motorbike, the driver’s location on the map doesn’t move, then suddenly the driver appears. Poor driver, if the motorbike doesn’t move on the map but the driver is already on the way.

review: di maps sering tidak bergerakdriver nya muter2pesan gocar prioritas tapi menunggu bisa 30 menit padahal jalanan lancar
translated_review: The map often doesn’t move. Driver keeps going in circles. Ordered GoCar Priority, but waited 30 minutes even though traffic was clear.

review: aplikasi udah banyak driver yang gak beres dan kasus aplikator nya juga udah bobrok gajelas penyelesaian masalah nya gak beres cukup kecewa sekian tahun pake aplikasi grab grab sekarang jadi aplikasi scam gajelas aplikator yang bobrok dan driver banyak yang bermasalah
translated_review: The app has many problematic drivers, and the app operator is corrupt. Issue resolution is poor. After years of use, I’m disappointed. Grab has become a scam app with corrupt operators and many problematic drivers.

review: membantu utk transportasi lbh cepat mudah semoga lbh sering utk hrg discpromo jg keamanan attitude drivernya spy ttp baik tdk mengendor sukses
translated_review: It helps for faster and easier transportation. Hope there are more price discounts/promos and better security and driver attitude to keep them good and responsible. Success!

review: untuk keamanan dan kenyamanan konsumen tolong di perhatikan bnyk akun driver yang memakai akun berbeda dengan kendaraan orang yang datang beda dengan data akun aplikasi orang plat nomor kendaraan beda grab sama gojek selalu sesuai ini maxim kenapa bisa seperti itu
translated_review: For consumer safety and comfort, please pay attention to many driver accounts that use different accounts with vehicles that do not match the account data. The license plate numbers are different. In Grab and Gojek, they always match, but why is it like this with Maxim?

review: aplikasi yang coba jaga citra mitra driver gak beres dipertahanin bahkan review jujur jelek dihapusin giliran costumer direview jelek aja dibuat susah cari mitra minimal diperiksa dulu tuh kejiwaan mitra
translated_review: The app that tries to maintain the image of its driver partners is poorly managed. Even honest negative reviews get deleted, while when customers give negative reviews, it’s made difficult to find partners. At least check the mental state of the drivers first.

review: driver comfort banyak berlagu merasa dibutuhkan mkn lbh baik competitor gocar kayaknya yg sering saya alami nunggu lama tiba dibatalin ada yg alasa lagi ngopi hari ini sdh dikasi tau saya dilobi dia mutar2 di tempat saya trs chat minta dibatalin kan membagongkan
translated_review: Comfort drivers often complain and feel important. It’s better at competitors like Gocar. What I often experience is long waiting times, then the driver cancels with excuses like going for coffee. Today I was told that the driver was loitering nearby and then asked via chat to cancel, which is frustrating.

review: menjangkau area yg jauh dari pangkalan ojek saat urgensi kita butuh transportasi yg cepat terima kasih gojek semoga makin sukses
translated_review: Thank you Gojek for reaching areas far from the ojek bases during urgent transport needs. I hope Gojek continues to succeed.

review: komplen uang dari bulan nov 2024 sampai desember 2024 tepat nya 1 bulan lebih gk ada rensopone di email gk jelas di wa swadaya gk jelas di chat ig gk jelas lepas tangung jawab gojek
translated_review: Complaints about money from November 2024 until December 2024, more than a month, no response via email, unclear on WhatsApp, unclear on Instagram chat, no responsibility from Gojek.

review: titik mapnya tolong di benerin dong sesuai sama google males banget harus debat sama driver karena ga sesuai titik alamat sudah bener padahal
translated_review: Please fix the map points according to Google. It’s annoying having to argue with drivers because the address points don’t match even though the address is correct.

review: tolong dong perbaiki sistem mapsnya kalau posisi driver masih jauh jangan di bilang 2 menit akan tiba nyatanya nunggu sampe 10 menit lamanya
translated_review: Please fix the map system. If the driver is still far, don’t say “arriving in 2 minutes” when actually waiting takes 10 minutes.

review: grab aku knapa ya setiap mau pesan makan ataupun pesan transportasi selalu saja tidak bisa selalu saja ada notifikasi yang mengatakan permintaan mu tidak dapat di proses
translated_review: Why is it that every time I want to order food or transport on Grab, it always fails with a notification saying “your request cannot be processed”?

review: pengemudi wahyu rusmana welly dengan motorcycle warna biru nopol d6841ven selamat menikmati perjalanan anda rating 470
translated_review: Driver Wahyu Rusmana Welly, with blue motorcycle, plate number D6841VEN, enjoy your trip, rating 4.7.

review: tidak pernah dapat pengalaman buruk selama pakai aplikaso gojek puas responnya cepat harga terjangkau dan paling penting driver semuanya pada baik dan ramah
translated_review: I never had a bad experience using the Gojek app. I’m satisfied with the quick response, affordable prices, and most importantly, the drivers are all kind and polite.

review: ngebantu buat pergi pergian suka ada promo potongan harga juga lumayan dapet driver nya juga gercep
translated_review: Helpful for traveling, there are also promo discounts, quite nice, and the drivers are fast.

review: navigasi grab sangat tidak bagus dan dipakainya gak enak tapi driver dipaksa wajib menggunakannya gak profesional dan memalukan
translated_review: Grab navigation is very bad and uncomfortable to use, but drivers are forced to use it, which is unprofessional and embarrassing.

review: hari ini saya memakai aplikasi maxim unt pertama kalinya alhamdulillah tdk perlu menunggu lama langsung dapat drivernya dijam sibuk meskipun aplikasi sebelah sampai bikin kesel dibatalin sopirnya ramah nyaman dan harga sangat murah dibanding yg lain terimakasih atas pelayanannya
translated_review: Today I used Maxim for the first time, thank God I didn’t have to wait long, even during rush hour. Unlike other apps that make me angry because drivers cancel. The driver was polite, comfortable, and prices are very cheap compared to others. Thank you for the service.

review: kami driver tersiksa udah bayaran kecil salah penumpang dan penumpang laporin yg gak2 kami yang kena pbo aplikasi teraneh setidaknya ikutinlah gojek shoope lebih menjaga mitranya
translated_review: We drivers are suffering, low pay, wrong accusations from passengers, and passengers report nonsense so we get punished by the app. The app is strange; at least follow Gojek and Shopee that protect their partners better.

review: bagus dan sangat memuaskan pelayanannya bagus semoga makin maju dan sukses makin banyak memberi diskonpotongan harganya makasih gojek atas layanannya yang cepat dan mantap
translated_review: Good and very satisfying service. Good, hopefully it will grow and succeed more, giving more discounts and price cuts. Thanks Gojek for your fast and great service.

review: kalo bisa driver kaya pak budi aditomo pelayanan nya mantap pol jarang jarang juga ada driver mau pergi ngucapin salam
translated_review: If possible, drivers like Mr. Budi Aditomo, service is excellent. Rarely drivers greet or say hello.

review: semakin bebas kendaraan tidak sesuai di aplikasi aplikasi cancel tidak ada sangsi yang bikin driver kapok
translated_review: More and more vehicles don’t match the app data, and cancellations have no sanctions to make drivers feel guilty.

review: aplikasi mau untung besar saya byar normal driver di kasih gocengoia klo pilih it tolong jgn ya magang yamau untung bnyak sring eror sistem
translated_review: The app wants big profits but pays drivers low. If you choose “go cenggoia” (?), please don’t. Interns want big profits but the system is often buggy.

review: tolong perbaiki lagi maps nya kok tdi sudah pesen sesuai alamat tapi titik nya tidak sama dengan alamat yang di tulis sama tolong seleksi lagi drivernya kebanyakan orangnya pada gak sabaran dijalanan
translated_review: Please fix the maps again. I ordered according to the address but the point is not the same as the written address. Please select drivers better, many are impatient on the road.

review: tolong di suspen buat driver2 bintang 5 nakal yg sengaja mematikan data sengaja buat tidak bisa di hubungi
translated_review: Please suspend those naughty 5-star drivers who intentionally turn off their data so they can’t be contacted.

review: buruk sekali sekarang driver gocar yahbanyak alasan buat cancel penumpang dikala hujan semua nunggu ambil pas tarif mahalburuk banget sekarang gojek
translated_review: Gocar drivers are bad now, many reasons to cancel passengers when it rains. Everyone waits and only picks when fare is high. Very bad now.

review: alkhamdulilah sopir nya baik semoga rezeki nya makin lancar berkah dan barokah nggeh serta sehat dan bahagia selalu bersama keluarga
translated_review: Alhamdulillah, the driver was good. May his income be smooth, blessed, and always healthy and happy with his family.

review: aplikasi sangat membantu dan mudah di gunakan dan ya aku pernah go ride cuma bayar 4k tau
translated_review: The app is super helpful and easy to use. One time I used GoRide and only paid 4k.

review: selamat hidup aku pakai transportasi online bisa dihitung dgn jari kanan saja tp pengalaman yg saya dapat bagus semu driver sopan baik berusaha ngobrol dg akrab
translated_review: I live using online transportation, can count on one hand, but all my experiences are good. All drivers polite and friendly, try to chat warmly.

review: saran dong min kalo bisa pas pesen gojek mobil ada poto kendaraannya juga biar untuk orang tua bisa lebih waspada soale banyak banget sekarang driver nyuri penumpang driver lain kalo cuman jenis samanplat nomor buat orang tua kadang susah kalo poto lebih gampang
translated_review: Suggestion: If possible, when ordering a Gojek car, show a photo of the vehicle so parents can be more cautious. There are many drivers now stealing passengers from others. If only license plate type is shown, parents sometimes find it hard, but a photo makes it easier.

review: saya kecewa dengan gojek karena unk mendapatkan kan gocar selalu posisi jauh dari lokasi saya menjadikan lama menunggu unk keperluan yg penting jadi tidak tepat waktu
translated_review: I’m disappointed with Gojek because when I want to get a GoCar, the driver’s location is always far from me, making me wait a long time. This causes me to be late for important matters.

review: hallo saya mengalami kendala dengan akun gojek saya kenapa akun gojek saya tiba tiba tidak bisa digunakan keterangan masukkan pin go to pay sedangkan pin yang saya gunakan selalu terdeteksi salah
translated_review: Hello, I have an issue with my Gojek account. Why suddenly my account cannot be used, with a message to enter GoToPay PIN, but the PIN I enter is always detected as wrong?

review: plis bgt kalo ngarahin map yg bener2 aja lewat jalan umum aja gausah ngide nyari jalan paling cepet malah jadi lama ga semua driver paham kasian
translated_review: Please direct the map properly, just use normal roads. Don’t try to find the fastest route that ends up taking longer. Not all drivers understand this. Poor drivers.

review: tolong perbaiki lokasi map nya agar lebih gampang utk driver mencari alamat dan tambahkan fitur foto di dalam obrolan agar driver tau yang mana customer nya
translated_review: Please fix the map location to make it easier for drivers to find addresses and add a photo feature in the chat so drivers can know who the customer is.

review: untuk pengiriman ok tapi tolong tambhkan ongkosnya karena kebutuhan pelaku gojek sangat naik dinegara kita terimakasih
translated_review: Delivery service is okay, but please add a fee because the costs for Gojek drivers have increased in our country. Thank you.

review: saya tidak bisa request refund dana saya secara mandiri tolong aplikasi grab dipermudah cara request refund dana
translated_review: I can’t request refunds by myself. Please make the refund request process easier on Grab app.

review: bagus ih tapi tolong di permudah cari titik maps nya titik lokasi nya susah bgt
translated_review: The app is good but please make it easier to find map points; the location points are very difficult to find.

review: mau pada demo minta thr nganterin pesenan kendala ujan dikit aja pada males ngambilpayah mitra nya dah gojek lemah
translated_review: Drivers want to demo asking for THR (holiday bonuses) and to deliver orders, but when it rains a little, they don’t want to pick up orders. Gojek partners have become weak.

review: aplikasi disaat jam sibuk dan saat hujan suka mengalami gangguan drivernya dapat yang jauh lalu tiba tiba ketika sudah dekat mencari driver baru
translated_review: The app often experiences problems during busy hours and when it rains. Drivers are assigned who are far away, then suddenly when they are close, a new driver is sought.

review: tolong dong kasih tau driver motor cuman di tinggal minjem duit hp di bawa kabur sama driver kejadian kamis sore naik dari pademangan ke pesing hp di bawa kabur
translated_review: Please inform drivers on motorbikes not to leave customers behind. I lent money, but the driver ran away with my phone. This happened on Thursday afternoon, from Pademangan to Pesing. The driver took my phone.

review: gojek aceng kantor yang tidak bisa memanusia kan manusia coba in orang kantor jadi driver 5000 kasihan driver mu kata nya kaya anak bangsa
translated_review: Gojek Aceng office does not treat people humanely. Try being an office worker, then become a driver for 5,000 rupiah. Poor drivers, they say they are like the nation’s children.

review: tolong pencarian drivenya di perbaiki setiap kali saya memesan goride selalu dapat yang lokasinya jauh sekali
translated_review: Please improve the driver search because every time I order GoRide, I always get drivers very far away.

review: aplikasi membutuhkan ruangmemori yang banyak sehingga pada saat memori penuh aplikasi tidak bisa berjalan dengan lancar
translated_review: The app requires a lot of memory space, so when memory is full, the app cannot run smoothly.

review: selalu memberikan diskon utk gojek maupun gocar tp ada juga yg mengecewakan saat kalo ujan gocar selalu membatalkan ke arah rumah sy
translated_review: Always giving discounts for Gojek and GoCar, but it’s disappointing that when it rains, GoCar drivers always cancel on the way to my house.

review: banyak driver ngeluh di bayar 5000 padahal customer bayar ongkir mahalada yaaaa aplikator setega itu sama mitra nya yg jelas membuat nama gojek dri awal ada sampai sekarang bagaimana ini presiden prabowo tolong berikan perlindungan hak hak mereka
translated_review: Many drivers complain they are paid only 5,000 rupiah, even though customers pay expensive delivery fees. The app is so cruel to its partners, which harms Gojek’s reputation from the start until now. President Prabowo, please protect their rights.

review: tolong dongsaya pesen gc plus kok malah yang dateng bluebird mana supir nya jutek lagigak seperti mitra grab yang beneran dari grab
translated_review: Please, I ordered GC Plus but Bluebird came instead, and the driver was rude. Unlike Grab’s drivers, who are truly from Grab.

review: gak jelas dapet driver yang jauh jauh terus saya selalu telat berangkat kerja tolong di perbaiki dongg
translated_review: It’s unclear; I always get drivers from very far away, so I’m always late for work. Please fix this.

review: 8 sampek jam 9 belum dapat driver tapi di cancel gak bisa emang mau di suruh sampek berapa jam
translated_review: From 8 to 9 AM, I haven’t got a driver, but my orders keep getting canceled. How long am I supposed to wait?

review: uda 3 hari pesan express gak dpt driver di chat ke adminnya katanya hujan org cerah bgtu masa iya sampai 3 hari plus hari ini 4 hari ujan setiap hari pdhl jaraknya cuman 15km
translated_review: For 3 days, I ordered Express but didn’t get a driver. Admin said it was because of rain, but the weather was clear. How can it be 3 or 4 days of rain every day when the distance is only 15 km?

review: driver buruktarif tidak sesuai suruh tambah ongkosnya mending gak usah installmurah hanya diaplikasi real nya driver minta tambah
translated_review: Bad drivers, tariffs don’t match, and they ask for extra fees. It’s better not to install the app. The price is cheap only in the app, but in reality, drivers ask for more.

review: percuma ada voucher grab hemat ujung ujungnya driver minta di offline kan karena ongkos dianggap kemurahan hadeehhh auto uninstl
translated_review: It’s useless having Grab vouchers for savings, but in the end, drivers want to be offline because the fares are considered too low. Sigh, auto uninstall.

review: gojek kalo abis ujan susah nyari driver 510 giliran dpat jarak drivernya jauh banget padahal yg deket banyak tapi malah ga dapat aneh ini apk
translated_review: After it rains, it’s hard to find a Gojek driver. When you finally get one, the driver is super far even though there are many nearby—this app is weird.

review: hatihati untuk area cikupa dan gading serpong ada driver yang purapura tidak tahu tempat tujuan dengan alasan gmaps error dan lainnya jika minta nomor telepon jangan diberi karena akan dispam telepon dengan ancaman tidak jelas
translated_review: Be careful in the Cikupa and Gading Serpong areas. There are drivers who pretend not to know the destination, claiming GMaps errors and other excuses. If you ask for their phone number, don’t give it because you will be spammed with unclear threats.

review: dididik ya driver nya jangan gatel nanya nanyain halhal ga penting kek emang perlu bgt nanya privasi boleh gue spill ga nama driver sama plat nya disini wkwk
translated_review: Educate the drivers not to be annoying asking unnecessary questions like it’s so important to ask about privacy. Can I spill the driver’s name and plate number here? LOL.

review: sangat tidak nyaman di daerah saya banyak driver tapi saya pesan tidak ada yg merespon
translated_review: It’s very uncomfortable in my area. There are many drivers but when I order, no one responds.

review: bikin crash aplikasi ke yang lain jdi susah multitasking gojek driver jadi kerestart kalau buka gojek customer
translated_review: The app crashes when switching to other apps, making multitasking difficult. Gojek drivers get restarted if the customer opens the Gojek app.

review: maxim tlong kalau mapnya ga bs akurat minimal edukasi drivernya liat catatan dari customer nya gara2 map brmsalah saya hmpir kelahi sama drivernya krn nyalahin saya kasi titik tujuan yg salah pdahal saya sudah ksi catatan tp ga dibaca
translated_review: Maxim, please if the map can’t be accurate, at least educate drivers to read the customer notes. Because of the wrong map, I almost fought with the driver who blamed me for giving the wrong destination point, even though I already gave notes but he didn’t read.

review: driver mobil nya udh kyk angkot nyalip langsung motong jalan orang di didik lagi tuh driver nya skill angkot jangan di bawa di online nge bahayakan orang aja
translated_review: Car drivers behave like public transportation, cutting in and overtaking dangerously. Those drivers need to be educated again — angkot skills shouldn’t be brought online because it endangers people.

review: aplikasi sudah di update notif pengaturan sudah di setting tapi kena tetep gak muncul notif nya ya harus masuk ke aplikasi dulu buat ngecek driver ngechatposisi
translated_review: The app is updated, notification settings are set, but I still don’t get notifications unless I open the app first to check if the driver sent a chat or position.

review: pendapat saya untk para ojol kalo lagi liat uplikasi jng di tengah jln menggangu pengendara lainnya dan jngn lpa lampu sen klo kanan jngn belok ke kiri trimakasih
translated_review: My opinion for ojol drivers: don’t look at the app while in the middle of the road, it disturbs other drivers, and don’t forget to use your turn signals (right signal if turning right, don’t turn left). Thanks.

review: setiap dpat gojek pasti gk ada yg ramah gk jelasss ni apk min tolong dong masa di setiap gua mau naik gojek mala dapat yg gk ramah
translated_review: Every time I get Gojek, no one is friendly. This app is unclear, please fix it. Why do I always get unfriendly drivers?

review: khusus driver gocar susah setengah mati kalo tarif murah sering di batalin buat apa lu jadi mitra
translated_review: Especially GoCar drivers, it’s so hard to get a ride if the fare is cheap; they often cancel. What’s the point of being a partner then?

review: nunggu penumpang lama bisa kena biaya tambahan nunggu drivernya lama ga bisa kasih jempol ke bawah atau kompensasi lain
translated_review: Waiting for passengers too long should have extra fees; waiting for drivers too long and no way to give a thumbs down or get compensation.

review: terima kasih grab dengan driver yang sangat ramah bisa menjadikan aplikasi grab ini semakin lebih baik
translated_review: Thanks to Grab and their very friendly drivers, this makes Grab app better and better.

review: susah kalo kena sip malem buat pulang aja nyari kendaraan pake maxim susah banget driver nya pada nolak semua
translated_review: It’s hard when caught by the police at night; even going home, it’s very difficult to find a Maxim driver because they all reject orders.

review: aplikasi paling is the best aplikasi ini berguna sekali buat orang para pekerja yang pulang kerja nya malam ini bisa banget jadi transportasi online
translated_review: This app is the best and very useful for people who work late and need online transportation.

review: terlalu banyak driver maxim yg tidak menggunakan atribut terutama di sore hari belum lg klw plat motornya berbeda
translated_review: Too many Maxim drivers don’t use the uniform, especially in the evening, and the motorcycle plates don’t match.

review: sumpah grab klo emang gak dpet driver harusnya bisa dibatalkan ada tulisan pusat bantuan tapi gk guna
translated_review: Honestly, if Grab can’t find drivers, there should be a cancel button. There’s a “help center” but it’s useless.

review: tolong di perbaiki apk drivernyasaya sebagai driver gojek bingung karena fitur selalu berubahkadang masuk slot denpasarkadang regulermohon tanggapannya
translated_review: Please fix the driver app; as a Gojek driver, I’m confused because features always change — sometimes Denpasar slot, sometimes regular. Please respond.

review: tolong diperbaiki maps nya rutenya muter jadi ongkos lebih mahal daripada biasanya drivernya jg lewat jalan biasa dan tidak mengikuti maps nya
translated_review: Please fix the maps; the route goes in circles making the fare more expensive than usual. Drivers also take normal roads and don’t follow the maps.

review: tolong dong klo hujan d perbaiki posisi driver nya jauh2 semua padahal banyak yg dekat klo d liat di maps
translated_review: Please fix during rain, drivers are all far away even though many are close if you look on the map.

review: maxsim bagus tapi sayang nya nga ada fitur telpon buat driver sama buat poto klo di gojek ada tolong buat amit maxsim biar ada telpon donk
translated_review: Maxim is good, but sadly it doesn’t have a call feature for contacting the driver or for taking pictures like Gojek does. Please add those features, Maxim.

review: ga jelas maps nya gocarmasa mobil di suruh masuk gang kecil emangnya motor golektlng perbaiki mas nya jgn buat driver pusing otomatis customer jg lama nunggu nya
translated_review: Gocar maps are unclear. Why are cars told to go through small alleys? They are for motorcycles, please fix this so drivers aren’t confused, and customers don’t have to wait long.

review: ini driver gocar belagu amat yaaa najeng di cancel muluuu kejauhan lah macetlahh ini lah itulah tolong dong dipilih drivernya yang mau kerja jangan cuma nyari trip jauh aja susah amattt nyari driver berkali di cancel belagu bangt najs
translated_review: This Gocar driver is very arrogant, always cancels because it’s too far or there’s traffic. Please pick drivers who want to work, not just looking for far trips. It’s very hard to find drivers; many times I get canceled. So arrogant, very annoying.

review: lagi hujan dikit susah bgt dapat driver mau gojekgocar sampe nunggu hampir sejam buat dapat driver selalu dicancel sepihak padahal udah pilih opsi harga tanpa promo
translated_review: When it rains a little, it’s so hard to get a driver for Gojek or GoCar. I waited almost an hour to get a driver, but always canceled unilaterally even though I already chose the no-promo price option.

review: saya sdh mncoba bbrapa x pelayanan cepat hrg murah driver cermat sehingga kami sampe d tujuan tpt waktu
translated_review: I’ve tried several times — the service is fast, prices are cheap, and drivers are careful so we reach the destination on time.

review: kaga jelas lama2 masa harga naik setiap hari di jam berangkat kerja gojek lama2 makin kaga jelas uninstal ajah teman2 ini apk penyedia layanan ojek kaga jelas
translated_review: It’s unclear and getting worse — prices go up every day during rush hour. Gojek is getting more confusing, just uninstall it, friends. This ojek service app is unreliable.

review: verifikasi muka bukannya mempermudah malah mempersulit muka sudah pas malah tak terdeteksi makin gajelas gojek bikin gregetan aja
translated_review: Face verification doesn’t make things easier, just harder. My face matched but still couldn’t detect. Gojek getting more frustrating.

review: driver oke tapi titik di maps aneh susah ngepasin jadi sering salah tolong benerin maps nya
translated_review: Drivers are okay, but the map points are weird and hard to match, so it often goes wrong. Please fix the maps.

review: untuk apk ok permasalahan cuna di driver aja kebanyakan tidak merespon dan tidak profesional mohon untuk gojek lebih menegaskan para driver nya
translated_review: The app is okay, but the problem is mostly with drivers — many don’t respond and are unprofessional. Please Gojek, be stricter with your drivers.

review: aplikasi gak guna anjir nunggu driver doang ampe 45 menit lebih mana lagi gk bisa di cancel
translated_review: The app is useless, waiting for a driver for more than 45 minutes and can’t cancel.

review: makin kesini makin g jelas banyak iklan nya org nunggu driver tiba2 d alihkan ke halaman iklan
translated_review: Lately this app makes no sense. Too many ads. While waiting for a driver, it suddenly switches to an ad page.

review: aplikasinya bagus tapi ada driver berkata tidak sopan dia bilang bungol seperti kata dari kalimantan sepertinya
translated_review: The app is good but a driver was rude, calling me “bungol” (stupid) — seems like a word from Kalimantan.

review: nyesek banget mau ke rmh sakit pesen gocar dr yg hemat sampai prioritas 1 jam lebih gak ada yg nyantol
translated_review: It’s heartbreaking, I was sick at home, ordered Gocar from the cheap promo to priority, waited more than an hour, no driver available.

review: jarak deket harga ga hemat tp dpt driver keseringan posisi jauh kenapa yaaaa mengesalkan lama bangeeetttt
translated_review: The distance is short but the price isn’t cheap. I often get drivers who are far away — why? It’s so frustrating and takes too long.

review: kenapa banyak driver gak mengerti gak hafal jalan emang google maps tidak selamanya membantu menyesatkan tapi paling tidak pihak maxim lebih memperketat lagi buat menyeleksi drivernya yang betul mengerti hafal jalan kalau perlu di adakan sekolah mengemudi lagi buat drivernya biar ngerti jalan
translated_review: Many drivers don’t know or memorize the roads well. Google Maps isn’t always helpful and sometimes misleads, but at least Maxim should be stricter in selecting drivers who truly know the routes. Maybe provide driving classes for drivers to understand the roads better.

review: sejauh ini wort it pake maxim sih dibanding yang ijo2 driver nya pada lelet2 klo jemput dan ribet maxim tinggal bang saya disini gak lama dateng dan driver twu jalan gak ribet
translated_review: So far Maxim is worth it compared to the green apps (Gojek/Grab). Their drivers are slow and complicated when picking up, but Maxim drivers come quickly and know the routes without hassle.

review: niat mau pesan grabcar di suruh selfie udah naik turun kepala suruh pasin ini itu ttp ga bisa verifikasi bikin emosi malahan
translated_review: I wanted to order GrabCar, but I was asked to selfie. I tried many times, adjusting my head position, but the verification failed, making me frustrated.

review: min saran yo kalau udah deket drivernya di navigasi bikin tombol cancelnya hilang aja nanti malah driver marah ke penumpang saya emang salah udah minta maaf kalau dibesarbesarin nanti penumpangnya malah kenapa kenapa kan gak lucu min
translated_review: Suggestion: when the driver is near, in navigation, remove the cancel button. Drivers can get mad at passengers for canceling late. I admit my mistake and apologized, but if it’s made a big deal, passengers get stressed — not cool.

review: grab maps nya belum sempurna driver sudah hampir sampai rumah keliatan gajalan sama sekali tolong customer grab diperhatikan lagi jika mau ngancel kasian performa turun jadi anyep
translated_review: Grab’s maps aren’t perfect yet. When drivers are almost home, it looks like they aren’t moving at all. Please pay more attention to Grab customers. If they want to cancel, it hurts driver performance and makes them indifferent.

review: aplikasi yang bagus pernah ngalamin salah tf 110rb ke driver gojek tp csnya mau bantu sampai dana kembali ke saya potongan gocar nya juga banyak aplikasi yang sangat membantu recommended lahh
translated_review: Good app. Once accidentally transferred 110k to a Gojek driver but customer service helped until the money was returned. Lots of GoCar discounts too. Very helpful app, recommended.

review: pengemudi hendriko mendrofa dengan motorcycle warna abuabu dan biru nopol bp2317om selamat menikmati perjalanan anda rating 495
translated_review: Driver Hendriko Mendrofa, motorcycle, grey and blue, plate BP2317OM — enjoy your trip! Rating 495.

review: terserah driver nya jadi miskin atau tidak makanya sekali kali jadi penumpang biar ngerasain enak tapi aplikasi ini sangat menguntungkan buat saya
translated_review: Whatever happens to the driver’s income, sometimes be a passenger so you feel how it is. But this app is very profitable for me.

review: najiss engga lagi deh pake maxim titik penjemputan di cilangkap depok tuhuan kramat jati jaktim bisa bisanya driver gak tau jalan nyasar sampe mall cibinong
translated_review: Very bad experience with Maxim. Pickup point at Cilangkap Depok, destination Kramat Jati East Jakarta. The driver didn’t know the way, got lost until Cibinong mall.

review: saya naik kereta malam sampai palembang sekitar jam 3 setiap datang ke palembang setiap pesan go car selalu di cancel oleh driver kenapa para driver seperti itu ya alasannya ada yg estafet customer la dll
translated_review: I took a night train to Palembang around 3 am. Every time I come to Palembang and order GoCar, it always gets canceled by the driver. Why do drivers do this? Reasons like customer estafet (passing the customer to another driver) and others.

review: layanan goride sangat membantu untuk aktifitas sehari di saat motor sedang perbaikan di bengkel masukan nya mgkin cuman kalo cuaca sedang hujan dlm situasi urgent butuh transport masih sering lama dpt driver nya
translated_review: GoRide service is very helpful for daily activities when my motorcycle is in repair, but when it rains during urgent needs, it still takes long to get a driver.

review: selama ini saya blm pernah menggunakan gojek transportasi ternyata selain murah dan memudahkan kita cepat sampai tujuan dengan keamanan terjamin karena kendaraan dan pengemudinya terdaftar di aplikasi jadi jangan takut lagi menggunakan gojek
translated_review: I have never used Gojek transportation before, but it’s cheap, convenient, fast to the destination, and safe because vehicles and drivers are registered in the app. So don’t be afraid to use Gojek.

review: ini driver kalau kalau kita pake promo biar murah malah gak ada yg mau ngepick kalau pun ada sengaja di lama lamain hadeh
translated_review: When we use promos to get cheaper prices, no one wants to pick us up. If there is a driver, they deliberately take a long time. Sigh.

review: tolong min untuk bug pembayaran masak iyaa di pembeli gratis giliran di gojeknya bayar jadi serasa ada sistem yang ngebug uangnya gak seberapa tapi bikin hati dagdigdug diluar ekspetasi kecewa berat udah updet min
translated_review: Please fix the payment bug. How come the buyer gets it for free but when Gojek has to pay, it feels like the system is bugged? It’s not about the money but it makes the heart anxious. Very disappointing after the update.

review: udah pesen harga gojek yg paling tinggi bukan hemat tetep aja dpt gojeknya jauh kocak ngelawak bngt sistem lu gojek
translated_review: I ordered Gojek with the highest price, not a promo, but still got a driver who was far away. Your system is a joke.

review: gojekkk topp bangett mksih bangett buat orang yang udah bikin apk inii inii ngebantu bangett buat sayaa banyakk ceritaa dan pengalaman seruu di gojek nggak sabar nunggu cerita di tahun 2025 nantii bareng gojekk itu capslock bukan marah yaa jek
translated_review: Gojek is really the best, thanks so much to the people who made this app. It really helps me a lot. Many stories and exciting experiences with Gojek. Can’t wait for stories in 2025 with Gojek. That capslock is not anger, okay Jek.

review: aneh saya bayar lancar ajaknp paylater saya diblokir gimana mau dipakai kalau begini gak ada penjelasan tau tau diblokir aja
translated_review: Weirdly, I paid smoothly with Akulaku PayLater but my account got blocked. How can I use it if it’s like this with no explanation? Suddenly blocked without notice.

review: aplikasinya ok sayang ada oknum drivernya gak proporsional menfcancel setelah penumpang naik dan membawa penumpang tidak melalui aplikasi sangat membahayakan
translated_review: The app is okay, but some drivers behave unprofessionally by canceling after the passenger boards or carrying passengers outside the app, which is very dangerous.

review: tiba2 langganan gojek plus 90 days padahal ngga pernah pakai trial atau apa mana ngga bisa direfund lagi 34rb melayang yang manfaatnya tidak saya ketahui tolong tim gojek balas respon saya saya mau refund bukan pembatalan langganan refund
translated_review: Suddenly I was charged for a 90-day Gojek Plus subscription even though I never used any trial or authorized it, and I can’t get a refund for the 34k IDR that disappeared. Please Gojek team respond, I want a refund, not just cancellation.

review: grab kok akhir akhir ini layanan nya malah turun yapesan dgn tarif hemat 5 kali di batalkan driver perlu perbaikan ini
translated_review: Grab’s service has declined lately. I booked with a discount fare but my ride got canceled 5 times by drivers. This needs improvement.

review: segala cara pembayaran dilakuin otomatis biar bs langganan terus ya wkwk 2bln langganan goplus gaada benefitnya sama sekali cuma buang2 uang aja
translated_review: Payments are automatically deducted to keep the subscription going. I subscribed for 2 months with Goplus but got zero benefits, just wasted money.

review: pesan car pdhl pake kode voucher driver minta pembayaran normal car ongkos dekat sering minta cancel bike oke apk paling cepat penjemputan ketimbang aplikasi lain tapi bannyak driver gagap baru terus membahayakan membaca map gelagapan
translated_review: I ordered a car with a voucher but the driver asked for the normal fare. For bike orders, the app is fast for pickup but many new drivers are clumsy with maps, which is dangerous.

review: ramahsabardan hati2 bawa penumpangmenjemput sampai ditempat walaupun tidak sesuai titik karena lokasi kami susah dpt titik yg tepatberpatokan saja sekolahkantor kelurahansehat2 semua driver sukacita bawa penumpang
translated_review: Friendly, patient, and careful when carrying passengers. Picked me up even if not exactly at the point because our location is hard to pinpoint. Just use reference points like schools, offices, or the village office. Stay healthy, all drivers cheerfully carry passengers.

review: tolong bila mana ada driver cancel kami para penumpang di beri kompensasi dan sebaliknya bila penumpang yang cancel kasih kompensasi ke driver
translated_review: Please give compensation to passengers if drivers cancel, and vice versa if passengers cancel, compensate the drivers.

review: tolong donk maxim kl nerima driver tuh di pilih dl kendaraany jngn mentang mentang ongkos murah kendaraan driver kebanyakn yg udh ga layak dinaikin customerbikin telat kerja aja
translated_review: Please Maxim, select drivers carefully especially based on their vehicles. Don’t just accept drivers with cheap fares but poor or unsafe vehicles that delay customers.

review: tolong dong min di tindak lanjutin kenapa saya malah dapet driver yang uda saya rating karena bermasalah
translated_review: Please follow up why I keep getting assigned to a driver I already rated poorly due to problems.

review: sangat membantu sekali aplikasi nyaman dan mudah di gunakan driver tepat waktu dan ramah pelayanan oke
translated_review: The app is very helpful, comfortable, easy to use, drivers are punctual and friendly, good service.

review: aplikasi paling gak guna makin ke sini driver sering cancel gak mau ambil dengan seribu alasan tidak ramah pengguna
translated_review: The app is increasingly useless, more drivers cancel with various excuses and are unfriendly to users.

review: halo gojek bisakah kalian menyediakan verifikasi via gmail karena nomor whaatsap dan sms yang diregistrasikan sudah lama tidak aktif dan pin akun saya juga lupa bisakah kalian membuat metode verifikasi melalui email terimakasih gojek
translated_review: Hi Gojek, can you provide verification via Gmail? My WhatsApp and SMS numbers are no longer active, and I forgot my PIN. Please create an email verification method. Thanks.

review: saya kecewa dengan driver grab yang kurang ajar apalagi driver grab malaysia rata2 pemalas tolong pihak grab malaysia di pertegas sedikit
translated_review: I’m disappointed with rude Grab drivers, especially in Malaysia. Please tighten regulations there.

review: saya pernah pakai aplikasi gojek ini kamu juga bisa download aplikasi gojek ini bisa di play store dan app store
translated_review: I’ve used Gojek before; you can also download the app from Play Store or App Store.

review: udh lama bgt sampenya pdhal deket eh drivernya ngluh ongkos 5rb doank pdhal saya bayar full umr naik driver masa cuma 5rban
translated_review: It takes too long, even for short trips. Drivers complain about the fare of just 5k IDR, while I pay the full minimum wage. Is that fair?

review: apk nya bagus mungkin yang harus di perbaiki hanya sikap sebagian driver yang kadang buat customer gedek sebelah nya ok sih
translated_review: The app is good but some driver attitudes make customers upset, otherwise it’s okay.

review: penjemputan sangat cepatmakasih udah mau nungguin sebentar dan anterin k tempat tujuan dengan selamatmas ojol nya ramah jugasehat dan semangat terus
translated_review: Pickup was very fast. Thanks for waiting a bit and safely taking me to the destination. The driver was friendly too. Stay healthy and keep the spirit up!

review: drivernya malas hujan dikit aja ga ada yg terima padahal banyak yg standby pada nongkrong gitu drivernya banyak nuntut hasil
translated_review: Drivers are lazy, even a little rain means no one accepts orders, even though many are just hanging out. Drivers demand too much.

review: mudah pesan nya dan lebih murahdriver nya juga banyakselama ini belum dapat driver yang rese sih
translated_review: Easy to order and cheaper, many drivers available, haven’t had rude drivers so far.

review: bad experience pake gojek car driver nya lamaa banget sampai dititik jemput ada hampir 50menitan padahal normalnya 10 menitan dan jalan lagi gak macet cuaca cerah udah gitu gamau berangkat sebelum ditambahin tip mentang mentang pake diskon pengguna baru jaid ogah ogahan lol si driver
translated_review: Bad experience with Gojek Car, driver took almost 50 minutes to reach pickup point when normally it’s 10 minutes and the traffic and weather were fine. The driver refused to start before getting a tip, probably because I used a new user discount. Lazy driver.

review: gojek memang okey deh gak pake nunggu lama sdh dijemput dan rata2 penjemputnya ramah2 friendly gitulah
translated_review: Gojek is really good, no long waits, pickup is fast, and drivers are generally friendly.

review: makin mahal ongkosnya tapi katanya bayar buat abang ojolnya ga naik potongan ongkos dari pihak gojek nya gede pantesan pada lari ke indriver
translated_review: The fares keep going up, but drivers say their pay doesn’t increase. Gojek’s cut is huge — no wonder they’re switching to InDriver.

review: saya baru kali coba transport garap saya ndak tau apakah semua driver garap doktrinnya seperti yg saya alami ramah baik nyaman pokoknya markotop lah
translated_review: I just tried Transport Garap and I’m not sure if all drivers are trained like the one I had — polite, friendly, and comfortable. Totally awesome.

review: sulit mendapatkan driver gojekgocar apa lg wkt sore dan hujan alasan tarif murah dll dan tarif sore atau pagi berbeda jauh dgn jarak yg sama potongan tidak begitu membantu
translated_review: It’s hard to find drivers for Gojek or Gocar especially in the afternoon and rainy weather. Drivers claim fares are low, and fares vary widely by time for the same distance. Discounts don’t help much.

review: nyari alamat susah titik suka mleset susah dapet driver giliran dapet chat susah tlfn susah fhoto di chat ga ada di marahin driver katanya akunnya ga di kasih nama mana saya tau kapok pesen maxim driver uring uringan katanya argo ga seberapa
translated_review: It’s hard to find an address, the pickup point often shifts, it’s difficult to get a driver, and when I finally get one, chatting is hard, calling is hard, even sending photos in chat is impossible. The driver scolded me saying my account has no name—how am I supposed to know? I’m done ordering Maxim; drivers are grumpy and say the fare is too little.

review: gw maau cancel gegara ga dapat driver soalnya ujan udh nunggu 1 jam ga dapat dapat mndng gw nyari sndiri gw udh cancel katanya otw mana
translated_review: I want to cancel because I can’t get a driver; it’s raining and I’ve waited for 1 hour with no driver. I decided to look for my own ride and cancelled the order, but the app says the driver is on the way—where?

review: niat apa enggak sebenernya bikin aplikasi setiap pesen sllu gk prnh dpt driver udh cpk2 nunggu ujung2 nya gk jd
translated_review: Honestly, what’s the point of making an app if every time I order, I never get a driver? I’m tired of waiting and the order never gets fulfilled.

review: geudd sering sering banyak voucher jgn pelit juga buat bagiin ongkir ke mitra driver kasian lohh
translated_review: Please, give more vouchers and don’t be stingy sharing shipping discounts to driver partners, they deserve it.

review: aplikasi nya selalu tidak akurag mrncari titik penjemputan dan tujuan harus nya pake gps yg bagus dong perbaiki gps nya biar banyak pengguna nya
translated_review: The app is always inaccurate in finding pickup and drop-off points. Should use a better GPS. Fix the GPS to get more users.

review: pada umumnya driver grabbike maupun grabcar ramahramah dan kalau kebetulan saya buruburu driver siap membantu senang saya naik grab
translated_review: Generally, GrabBike and GrabCar drivers are friendly, and if I’m in a hurry, the driver is always ready to help. I enjoy using Grab.

review: gojek aplikasi asli buatan anak bangsa indonesia gue bangga menggunakan aplikasi ini alamat developernya pun ada di jakarta
translated_review: Gojek is a genuine Indonesian-made app; I’m proud to use it. The developer’s address is even in Jakarta.

review: gojek salah satu alat transportasi yang terpercaya dan membrikan kenyamanan bagi konsumen maju trus gojek
translated_review: Gojek is one of the trusted transportation tools and provides comfort for consumers. Keep growing, Gojek!

review: saya nggak baru kemarin pakek aplikasi grab sudah bertahun2 kenapa hari ini pengemudi membuat saya marah dimana sopan santunnya dimana cara membuat pengaduan tentang masalah ini mohon untuk pihak grab lngsung direspon tentang aplikasi saya hari ini juga
translated_review: I’m not new to using the Grab app, I’ve been using it for years, but today a driver made me angry. Where is the courtesy? How can I file a complaint about this? Please respond quickly.

review: admin mohon di pantau ya untuk go car nya kenapa para driver masih ada memasang tarif di luar aplikasi di aplikasi 26rbu tapi driver nya meminta ongkos 50 ribu
translated_review: Admin, please monitor GoCar; why do some drivers still set fares outside the app? The app says 26,000 but the driver asks for 50,000.

review: aplikasi rakus yang di maki maki konsumen kita bayar mahal driver dapet separonya yg kena semprot konsumen moga tobat dah gojek
translated_review: The app is greedy; consumers get scolded while paying expensive fares, drivers only get half but still get blamed by consumers. Hope Gojek improves.

review: gimana sih gojek no masih aktif tpi lupa pin karna hp lama hilang gk bisa masuk bantuan gk ada yg jelas dari aplikasi nya
translated_review: How do I access my Gojek account? My number is active but I forgot my PIN because my old phone is lost. There’s no clear help in the app.

review: tolong diperbaiki maps nya sekarang sering tdk sesuai titik lokasi jauh pula akibatnya sering debat ama driver
translated_review: Please fix the map, it often doesn’t match the location and is far off, causing arguments with drivers.

review: tolong untuk goride di tampilkan apa merk kendaraan nya kalian aplikasi aja mahal tapi kualitas jelek apalagi goride saya selalu dpt motor jelek ga layak jalan
translated_review: Please show the vehicle brand on GoRide. The app is expensive but the quality is bad. I always get bad motorcycles that aren’t fit to ride.

review: haduhhhh grab gimana ini saya lagi urgent malah di cancel terus sama driver udah hampir 2jam nunggu gaada yg pasti
translated_review: Oh Grab, what’s happening? I’m in urgent need but my orders keep getting cancelled by drivers. I’ve been waiting almost 2 hours with no certainty.

review: drivernya ga jelas selalu minta cancel alasan titik penjemputan jauh kalau saya cancel saya dapet driver makin lama kalau dilanjut drivernya yg minta cancel enakan pake ijo sebelah drivernya jarang cancel dan lebih sabar plus mobilnya bersih app ini mobilnya pada bau rokok
translated_review: Drivers are unclear and always want to cancel, saying the pickup point is too far. If I cancel, it takes longer to get a driver. If I continue, drivers cancel. Better to use “ijo sebelah” (the green app) drivers; they rarely cancel, are more patient, and their cars are clean. This app’s cars all smell like smoke.

review: gojek tolonglah mapsnya benerin jangan kasih rute terpendek tapi jalan yang dilalui menyulitkan driver tolong berikan rute tercepat bukan terpendek secara maps masa dari pondok indah ke bekasi 60 ribu tapi ketika buka google maps diarahin rute tercepat lewat toll jadi 30km
translated_review: Gojek, please fix your maps. Don’t give the shortest route if it makes it hard for drivers. Give the fastest route, not the shortest. How come from Pondok Indah to Bekasi costs 60,000, but Google Maps suggests a faster toll route only 30 km?

review: tolang para pelanggan terrsayang mohon diperhatikanlah si abang drivernya iya dah pake banyak diskon dari grab masa ngasih parkir 2rb aja sepele bnget yaampun
translated_review: Dear beloved customers, please pay attention to the drivers. After many discounts from Grab, giving only 2,000 for parking is trivial.

review: terimaksih telah mempermudah transportasi bagi saya yang rumah nya jauh dari jl raya sangat sangat membantu
translated_review: Thank you for making transportation easier for me, especially since my home is far from the main road. Very helpful.

review: setelah update udah gak bisa liat posisi driver yang ada di sekitar kita mohon di tampilkan lagi posisi dirver di maps seperti sebelumnya terimakasih
translated_review: After the update, I can no longer see driver positions around me. Please display the driver’s location on the map again like before. Thank you.

review: sistem terburuk selama bertahun2 perbaikan pengoptimalan tidak ada yg berarti saya menunggu driver sangat lama tidak kunjung dapat sistem terburuk
translated_review: The worst system in years. No meaningful improvements or optimization. I wait a long time but no driver comes. Worst system ever.

review: jangan download mending maxcim lebih murah gojek mahal kadang kata driver nya suka korupsi kita bayar 20 driver dikasih 8k saya dikasih liat drivernya
translated_review: Don’t download it; better use Maxim, it’s cheaper. Gojek is expensive and sometimes drivers are corrupt. I pay 20,000 but the driver only gets 8,000. Show me the driver’s info.

review: dari dulu sampe sekarang masi aja seperti itu nih gojeksaya mau login tapi saya lupa nomor lama sayanyuruh memulihkan akun masi aja minta nomor yang lama kan saya lupa nomornya ngasih bantuan gak masuk akal
translated_review: From the past until now, Gojek is still like this. I want to log in but I forgot my old number. When I try to recover my account, it still asks for the old number—but I forgot it. The help doesn’t make sense.

review: garb di semarang cukup memuaskan penjemputan sangat cepat dan perjalanan cukup nyaman drivernya sangat nyaman
translated_review: Grab in Semarang is quite satisfying. Pickup is very fast and the ride is comfortable; the driver is very pleasant.

review: masukan utk grabjgn memberikan driver terlalu jauh dari lokasi pemesan kadang di dekat ada driver malah memberikan driver yg jauh jg penumpang menunggu terlalu lama jadi blm bintang 5 ya
translated_review: Input for Grab: don’t assign drivers too far from the customer’s location. Sometimes there are drivers nearby but you give drivers who are far away, so passengers wait too long. So it’s not a 5-star yet.

review: bintang 4 dulu karena masih ada beberapa hal yang harus ditingkatkan lagi maupun itu dari aplikasinya ataupun dari drivernya
translated_review: 4 stars for now because some things still need improvement, both in the app and the drivers.

review: bayangin grabcar chat bawa orang stroke langsung di cancel ini ga cuman sekali udau berkali kali
translated_review: Imagine this: GrabCar cancels immediately when chatting with a person having a stroke. This has happened multiple times.

review: aplikasi makin lama makin jelekkkk udah berlangganan dari 2021 bukannya makin di perbaiki malah makin jelek orang buru urgent mau pesen ojek malah aplikasi ngebuk gak bisa kebuka menu goride nya gak bisa kebuka hadehhh
translated_review: The app is getting worse over time. I’ve subscribed since 2021 but instead of getting better, it’s worse. When I’m in a hurry to order a ride, the app freezes and the GoRide menu won’t open.

review: di update versi terbaru malah error ini geogle map gojek nyatolong dong di perbaiki geogle map gojek nya biar akurat dengan lokasi tujuankasih rute yang pas di lalui
translated_review: The latest update causes errors. The Gojek Google Maps needs fixing to be accurate with the destination location. Please provide the correct routes.

review: aplikasi suka error saya pakai hp flagship berati error dari aplikasi tidak bisa buka chat kadang buka menu error kasian driver yang chat tidak dibalas
translated_review: The app often errors. I use a flagship phone, so the problem must be the app. I can’t open chat, sometimes the menu gives an error. It’s sad that driver messages aren’t replied to.

review: cs bayar full ongkirke driver goceng gak kasihan kau ngasih driver mu goceng gak pantes jekbrp persen kau makan itu duitgila si ini
translated_review: Customer service, you make us pay full shipping cost but give drivers low fares (Goceng = 5,000 IDR). Don’t be stingy, it’s not fair for drivers. How much do you keep from that money? Crazy.

review: tolong kalo seleksi drivernya minimal tahu lokasi kota yang diambil jangan mengandalkan titik sudah sesuai saja ga usah jadi driver kalo ga tahu lokasi
translated_review: Please, at least select drivers who know the city location. Don’t rely only on the GPS point matching. Don’t be a driver if you don’t know the area.

review: cape bngt sama drivernya masa cuma minta masuk gang cancel semua posisinya lg buru bngt lglayanan gocar nya minus
translated_review: I’m so tired of drivers; when I ask them to enter an alley, they cancel all the time. I’m in a hurry, but GoCar service is bad.

review: diskon nya dikit bgt padah udh langganan pake gojek saran aja kalo pengguna langganan dikasih diskon
translated_review: The discounts are very little even though I’m a Gojek subscriber. Just a suggestion: give discounts to subscribers.

review: driver nya kurang baik trs di cancel mulu sama drivernya jdi tolong dong lbh konsisten lagi
translated_review: Drivers are not nice and keep canceling. Please be more consistent.

review: sumpah hari ini susah banget dapet gocar nya padahal lagi ngejar kereta udah nyangkut sama driver kirain lama bener mau jalan tau nya dah nunggu lama dia cancel
translated_review: Today it’s really hard to get a GoCar, and I was rushing to catch a train. I was already stuck with a driver, thinking it would take a while, but after waiting a long time, he canceled.

review: aplikasi jelek ganti2 driver sampek 3x pesan dari jam 646 sampek jam 720 belum sampek padahal dekat aplikasi djancok
translated_review: The app is bad. I changed drivers 3 times. I ordered from 6:46 AM until 7:20 AM but the driver still didn’t arrive, even though he was nearby. The app sucks.

review: layanan yg baik dari orang yg baik pula kita sangat suka dengan mbanya pula karna tlah kemudiian kami sampai di hotel dgn baik maaf jika didlam perjalanan sedikit merepotkan
translated_review: Good service comes from good people. We really like the lady driver because she got us safely to the hotel. Sorry if we were a little troublesome on the trip.

review: bisa tidak ya mulai menormalisasikan untuk tidak merokok di dalam kendaraan bau asap rokok itu susah hilangapalgi penumpang grabcar juga ada anak anakbumilorang tuabaik dalam kondisi sehat ataupun sakit please untuk para pengemudi dan konsumenhargai paru paru anda keluarga andadan penumpqng anda
translated_review: Can you normalize no smoking inside vehicles? The smell of cigarette smoke is hard to get rid of, especially since Grab passengers include kids, pregnant women, and the elderly, whether healthy or sick. Please, drivers and customers, respect your lungs, your family, and your passengers.

review: makasih bapakkata anak saya diajak ngobrol seru bapak nyasehat selalu ya bapak amanah kerja nya lancar juga rejeki nyaaamiin
translated_review: Thanks, sir. My child enjoyed chatting with you, you always give good advice. May your work be blessed and your fortune increase, Amen.

review: dimana saat kondisi hujan driver tidak mau menerima dan aplikasi di hidupkan sama driverkalok tidak menerima setidaknya di offkan aplikasinya dan dengan alasan hujan meminta tips lebih
translated_review: When it rains, drivers refuse orders but keep the app on. If they don’t want to accept rides, at least turn off the app. Also, they ask for extra tips because it’s raining.

review: masa saya peripikasi wajahterus malah ke putus mitra kan pake muka saya akun pribadiyang pake juga saya aneh gojek
translated_review: I keep doing face recognition but get disconnected. The partner uses my face for their personal account. That’s strange, Gojek.

review: banyak driver nya yg minta bayaran tidak sesuai dengan yg tertera pada aplikasi khususnya area kota kupang ntt tolong untuk maxim lebih di teliti lagi dalam perekrutan driver jngan orang gila d acc jd driver
translated_review: Many drivers ask for fares that don’t match what the app shows, especially in Kupang city, NTT. Maxim, please be more careful recruiting drivers; don’t approve crazy people as drivers.

review: gojek gak guna masa mau login gagal terus terlalu banyak mencoba malah disuruh nunggu 1 jam pula dasar aplikasi gak guna
translated_review: Gojek is useless. I try to log in but keep failing. After too many attempts, I’m told to wait 1 hour. What a useless app

review: tidak bisa menyelesaikan masalah saya saya salah transfer ke akun lama saya dan dari pihak gojek tidak bisa bantu membuka akun lama saya saya tidak ikhlas dunia akhirat
translated_review: I can’t resolve my problem. I mistakenly transferred to my old account, and Gojek can’t help me recover the old account. I feel really upset, both in this world and the hereafter.

review: sekarang lihat perjalanan driver di maps jadi lompatlompat sulit dipantau tidak seperti kemaren titik lokasi perjalanan driver berurutan jadi mudah dipantau driver sudah sampai mana mohon diperbaiki
translated_review: Now watching the driver’s trip on the map is jumpy and hard to track, unlike before when the driver’s location points were in order, making it easy to follow where the driver is. Please fix this.

review: indonesia mengutamakan kemanusiaan kalo sistemmu tidak manusiawi dan serakah potongan driver dan aplikasi hampir 40 lambat laun gojek akan hancur di masa mendatang
translated_review: Indonesia prioritizes humanity. If your system is inhumane and greedy, with driver and app commissions almost 40%, Gojek will eventually collapse in the future.

review: driver maxim di tempat saya banyak tidak pakai atribut jadi raguu apakah drivernya sesuai di app atau tidak tolong dipantau di area parepare sulawesi selatan
translated_review: Many Maxim drivers in my area don’t wear any uniform or attributes, so I doubt if the drivers on the app are the real ones. Please monitor the Parepare area, South Sulawesi.

review: saya senang dengan pelayanan maxim ojek online semoga harganya tetap terjangkau dan tetap mempertahankan kepercayaan dan kualitas pelayanan yg baik
translated_review: I’m happy with Maxim online motorcycle taxi service. Hopefully the prices remain affordable and they maintain good trust and service quality.

review: pesan gocar dapat yg jauh mulu pengemudi juga sering milih milih argo pdhal kita dapat harga dari aplikasi mohon diperbaiki layanannya sebelum banyak yg pindah aplikasi
translated_review: When I order GoCar, I always get drivers from far away. Drivers also tend to be picky, while the fare is fixed by the app. Please improve your service before many users switch apps.

review: sering sering adain promo pliss buat kaum mageran ini whort it bgt udh gtu gojeknya juga murah bgttt cuma goceng tapi ya gitulah
translated_review: Please have more promos often, especially for lazy people like me. It’s really worth it, plus Gojek is very cheap — only 5,000 IDR fares — but oh well.

review: woi gojekkira2 klu bikin tarif nga mikir apa jemput 34kmongkos nya kadang 1520ribungalah2 in angkotini ngalahin rentenir lagi potongan nya buat pemerintah di tutup aja ini apk penghisap darah orang ongkos murah kena potongan lagi
translated_review: Hey Gojek, when setting fares, don’t you think? Pick up 34 km, sometimes fare 15-20k. This app beats loan sharks. Cuts for government too. Just shut down this blood-sucking app, cheap fare but cuts again.

review: driver dari sini kurang ajar udah tau salah malah ngotot malah narik baju di jalanan daerah mall lippo karawaci 26012025 930 di periksa lagi drivernya yg kurang ajar itu
translated_review: The driver here is rude. He knew he was wrong but kept insisting and even pulled my shirt on the street near Lippo Mall Karawaci, 26-01-2025, 9:30 AM. Please check that rude driver again.

review: potongan yg sangat besar di beban kan ke pihak konsumen driver dapat sedikit aplikasi perbudakan founder malaysia emang negara musuh indonesia
translated_review: Big cuts are charged to consumers, drivers get little. This app is slavery. Founder is Malaysian, really an enemy of Indonesia.

review: okesemoga dengan ada nya layanan grab inisemoga selalu bisa memuaskan hati costumer dan driver juga dari soal tarif
translated_review: Okay, hopefully with Grab In, it always satisfies both customers and drivers, especially regarding fares.

review: sekarang gojek susah respon selalu keluar mulu semenjak diupdate versi baru males jadinya udah saya uninstall
translated_review: Now Gojek is slow to respond and keeps crashing since the new update. I’m getting lazy, so I uninstalled it.

review: kesan pribadi dr saya memesan maxim peta sudah di titik yg tepat tapi tidak bisa pass pdhl sudah benar pencarian untuk driver sangaaattt lama sekali dann endingnya gagaleror bahkan tidak berfungi untuk memesan
translated_review: My personal impression ordering Maxim is that the map shows the correct point but I can’t pass it. Even though the search is correct, the driver takes a very long time and the order ends in failure; the app doesn’t even work to order.

review: untuk aplikasi maxim tolong lebih peka terhadap akun fiktif kasihan driver kalau dapat susah mencari uang tapi sering ada akun tipu karan driver tergiur sama ongkir nya
translated_review: For the Maxim app, please be more sensitive to fake accounts. It’s sad for drivers because they struggle to earn money, but there are often scam accounts that lure drivers with shipping fees.

review: tolong untuk ada fitur cepet jemputnya soalnya kita pelanggan juga perlu cepat nanti kalau dibatalkan gara lama terus kena suspend kita sbg pelanggan di viralkan karena kurang memahami driver tolong sekali
translated_review: Please add a fast pickup feature because customers also need speed. If orders get canceled too often due to long waits, and we get suspended, customers will go viral complaining because they don’t understand drivers. Please help.

review: drivernya baik sampai rumah dg slmat pokonya enak maxim drpd ojol mksh driver pelayanan penumpang dgn baik
translated_review: The driver was good and got me home safely. Maxim is better than other online motorcycle taxis. Thanks to the driver for good passenger service.

review: tolong pihak grab perbaiki map nya susah sekali terkadang mencari lokasi malah terkadang bnyak yg salah titik dan alamat tidak sesuai
translated_review: Please Grab, fix your map. It’s very hard to find locations; sometimes many points are wrong and addresses don’t match.

review: maaf untuk awall awall emng bagus tapi semakin sering make pelayanan sangat buruk dan terutama driver mobil sangat tidak ramah kasar sudah diberi tau alamat yang benar driver tetep ngeyell ke alamat yang salah dan diberi tahu malah marah marah tolong diperhatikan lagi
translated_review: Sorry, at first the service was good, but the more I use it, the worse it gets. Especially car drivers who are very unfriendly and rude. Even after telling the correct address, drivers stubbornly go to the wrong place and get angry when told. Please pay attention.

review: woi gojek kalo mau bikin verifikasi minimal bisa depan belakang lah kamera ini depan doang apa si dulu ga pake verifikasi muka sekarang jadi pake mau bikin protect drivernya masih bisa jual beli account kocak lu gojek
translated_review: Hey Gojek, if you're going to do face verification, at least use front and back cameras. This one’s just front-facing. You didn’t even use face verification before, and now that you do, people are still able to buy and sell accounts. Ridiculous.

review: sekarang gua malas pakai gojek lg paylater nunggak 2 hari aja udah di telpon terus padahal gua udah bilang besok gua gajian pas gua lunasin semuanya ehh malah di blokir paylater gua makanya gua udah ga pakai lg gojek
translated_review: Now I’m lazy to use Gojek anymore. My PayLater bill was overdue 2 days and they kept calling me, even though I told them I’d pay when I got my salary. After I paid, my PayLater got blocked. That’s why I stopped using Gojek.

review: kalo memang ga dapat driverrrr ya cari lagi drivernyaaaa masa kita udah nunggu tau2 di cancel cuman gara2 gada driver lagian masih belum jam malem masih jam 7 malam loh tadi pesannya
translated_review: If you can’t find a driver, just keep searching. I was waiting and suddenly it got canceled just because no driver was available. Besides, it wasn’t late yet, it was 7 PM when I ordered.

review: murah tapi nda bisa non tunai ada fiturnya tapi nda bisa dipakai karna driver tidak pakai non tunai maps sulit kalau cari lokasi
translated_review: It’s cheap but you can’t use cashless payment. The feature exists but can’t be used because drivers don’t accept non-cash. The map is hard to use for finding locations.

review: tolong grabcar xl kenapa hilang grab car new plus terlalu mahal mohon koreksi untuk grabcar xl
translated_review: Please, why did GrabCar XL disappear? GrabCar New Plus is too expensive. Please correct the GrabCar XL service.

review: saya sengaja milih ongkir yang agak murah tapi malah error nah pas saya milih ongkir yang mahal kenapa malah lancar padahal sinyal bagus waktu saya pilih ongkir yang murah
translated_review: I intentionally chose the cheaper shipping option but it caused an error, whereas when I chose the expensive shipping option, it worked smoothly even though my signal was good when I picked the cheaper one.

review: terimakasih dengan adanya grab sangat membantu dan memberikan kemudahan dalam perjalanan kepada setiap orang yang telah membutuhkan nya
translated_review: Thank you for Grab, it really helps and makes traveling easier for everyone who needs it.

review: aplikasi nya sudah bagusbanyak fitur dan animasi yang menarik menurut saya aplikasi ojol paling bagus adalah gojekmungkin perlu ditingkatkan lagi secara manajemen dan juga efektifitas operasional sehingga harga sahamnya bisa naik
translated_review: The app is already good, with many interesting features and animations. In my opinion, the best ride-hailing app is Gojek. Maybe management and operational effectiveness could be improved so the stock price can go up.

review: assalamualaikum bagi kk admin driver saya tinggal di padang kota sering dengar keluhan dari driver maxim nya di karna tempat penarikan uang ewallet nya tidak ada yg terdaftar di khusus padang kota kasian driver nya
translated_review: Assalamualaikum to the admin and drivers, I live in Padang city and often hear complaints from Maxim drivers because there is no registered e-wallet withdrawal point specifically in Padang city. It's sad for the drivers.

review: perdana down loadpesan grab careh malah suruh d batalkan aplikasi k offline sajamana lebih mahal lg dr grabmohon buat driverjangan memanfaatkan keadaanmana orang baru mana langgan
translated_review: First time downloading and ordering GrabCar, but it told me to cancel because the app was offline. How come it's more expensive than Grab? Please ask drivers not to take advantage of new or regular customers.

review: terkadang mendapatkan pengemudi ojek online yang terlalu jauh bahkan didapatkan dari tempat tujuan kurang optimal dalam mendapatkan pengemudi yang dekat
translated_review: Sometimes, the online motorcycle taxi drivers come from very far away, even from the destination place itself. It's not optimal to get nearby drivers.

review: sering dapet driver manja padahal titik jemput 2km tapi di cancel terus udah 5 kali ada yang ga di bales waktu di chat ada yang nunggu lama padahal ga dateng dateng al hasil waktunya lama banget buat nunggu 1jam nunggu driver padahal lagi buru buru
translated_review: Often I get pampered drivers even though the pickup point is only 2 km away, but they cancel 5 times already. Some don't respond to chat, some wait a long time but never come, so waiting takes too long—up to an hour—even though I'm in a hurry.

review: apps bikin ga enak hati kadang driver udah datang tapi kita gajadi berangkat atau tiba tiba hujan dulu bisa si driver jalanin aja tanpa penumpang seengganya kita ga ada perasaan ga enak sekarang gabisa dan bikin driver jadi ngamuk ke customer
translated_review: The app makes me uncomfortable; sometimes the driver has arrived but we don’t go anymore or it suddenly rains. Before, drivers would still drive without passengers at least so we wouldn’t feel bad. Now they can’t, so drivers get angry at customers.

review: seperti hilang tanggung jawab aplikasi tidak menyediakan admin secara langsung untuk menanggapi keluhan pelanggan di pusat bantuan nya semua pesan itu robot yang tidak berguna admin nya tidak ada seolah tidak mau tanggung jawab dengan apa yang terjadi
translated_review: It's like they avoid responsibility. The app doesn’t have live support — just a useless robot in the help center. No real admins at all. Like they don’t want to take responsibility.

review: drivernya bagus ramah dan cepat cuma hampir 5 hari saya ga pakai karena tidak bisa masuk akun karena alasan jaringan pdhl jaringan saya lancar gojek tolong perbaiki aplikasinya yah terimakasih
translated_review: The drivers are nice, friendly, and fast, but for almost 5 days I haven’t used the app because I can’t log in due to network reasons even though my network is good. Gojek, please fix your app, thanks.

review: aku suka sama bapa nya lemah lembut sopan baik banget enak bawa motor nya pelan gitu thee besttt buat bapa semoga dapet menumpang banyak semoga lancar rezeki nya aamiin
translated_review: I like the driver who is gentle, polite, and very nice. He rides slowly, the best dad ever. I hope he gets many passengers and smooth fortune, amen.

review: gak bisa dicancel dichat pun gk bisa gak seperti aplikasi lain kasian drivernya tambahin menu chat kek di aplikasinya
translated_review: Can't cancel the order, can’t chat either, unlike other apps. Poor drivers, please add chat menu in the app.

review: ga pernah telat bayar paylater malah di block paylater nya tanpa pemberitahuan terlebih dahulu chat ke gojeknya malah robot yg jawab kecewa bgt udah mending uninstall ajaa
translated_review: Never late paying PayLater, but it was blocked without prior notice. Chatting to Gojek only gets robot replies. Very disappointed, better uninstall.

review: semuanya juga bagus aman cepet ngambil drivernya apk juga ringan untuk hp harganya juga murahh apalagi sayaa anak sekolah pertahanin yawh
translated_review: Everything else is good: safe, fast pickup, light app, and cheap prices, especially for me as a student. Keep it up.

review: lebih hemat dari yg laen pasti nya trs bnyk pula driver nya kepuasan anda adalah tujuan kami itulah gojek
translated_review: Definitely more affordable than others, and many drivers too. Your satisfaction is our goal, that’s Gojek.

review: knpa cari sopir grb tujuan rs pon itu susah nya ampun banget kebanyakan sopir grb nya langsung dicancel
translated_review: Why is it so hard to find Grab drivers going to the hospital? Most Grab drivers cancel immediately.

review: makin kesini makin berat buka aplikasi lama loading ny ga kaya dulu driver juga kadang suka pake motor ga sesuai plat nomer yang terdaftar
translated_review: Lately, opening the app is getting heavier with long loading times, not like before. Sometimes drivers also use motorcycles with plate numbers that don’t match the registered ones.

review: sangat membantu tapi sering saya temui driver yang meminta bayaran lebih atau kita memesan 2 tempat tetapi baru sampai satu tempat sudah di tandai selesai perjalanan usahakan pihak grab menyediakan fitur block driver tq
translated_review: Very helpful, but I often meet drivers who ask for extra payment or mark the trip as finished after only reaching one of two stops. Please provide a feature to block drivers, thanks.

review: pengemudi angelinus yos bernad reshsy dengan motorcycle warna hijau tua nopol eb2319ed selamat menikmati perjalanan anda rating 495
translated_review: Driver Angelinus Yos Bernad Reshsy with a dark green motorcycle license plate EB2319ED, enjoy your ride, rating 4.95.

review: banyak mobildriver tapi nggak ada yang respon entah aplikasinya yanh kurang bagus atau memang drivernya yang tidak profesional
translated_review: Many cars but no response, either the app is not good or the drivers are unprofessional.

review: sangat membantu sekali untk kita2 yg pngn aktifitas tp terkendala hujan solusinya ya grabcar mksh grab
translated_review: Very helpful for those of us who want to be active but are hindered by rain, the solution is GrabCar. Thank you Grab

review: customer yang platinum ya jangan dikasi ke driver yang bintang nya 49 dong gimana sih buat sistemnya
translated_review: For platinum customers, please don’t assign drivers with only a 49 rating. How is the system made?

review: senang aja dgn aplikasi dan promonya hanya sj knp skrg jd dpt abg grabnya jauh trs jd butuh waktu nunggu jd lamaaaaa mau cancel kasihan abg grabnya tlg ksh driver yg dekat aja ya
translated_review: I’m happy with the app and promos, but why now Grab drivers are always far away, so the wait is very long, want to cancel but feel sorry for the driver. Please assign drivers nearby.

review: gojek tolong buat fitur memberi tip ke driver saya kemarin mau memberi tip ga sengaja keluar terus gabisa ngasih tip lagi
translated_review: Gojek, please make a feature to give tips to drivers. Yesterday I wanted to give a tip but accidentally exited and couldn’t give a tip again.

review: driver nya baik karena pas hujan menyediakan jas hujan jadi perjalanan sy tidak terhambatjadi tepat waktu terima kasih semoga sehat selalu dapat rejeki banyak yang berkahi
translated_review: The driver was good because during the rain he provided a raincoat, so my trip was not delayed and I arrived on time. Thank you, stay healthy, may you get lots of blessed fortune.

review: aneh banget pengemudi nya anehaneh aplikasi aneh waktu tunggu di aplikasi 10 menit dirungguin 10 menit berganti tulisan dricer akan segera sampai padahal driver masih sangat jauh alhasil nunggu driver sampai 40 menit mau di cancep gaenak sama driver nya
translated_review: The driver is very strange, the app is strange. The waiting time on the app shows 10 minutes, waited 10 minutes, then changed to "driver will arrive soon" but the driver was still very far away, ended up waiting 40 minutes. Felt bad to cancel on the driver.

review: yg pada kasih bintang jelek gk usah pke gojekbanyak bacot semua gk tau dirinaik ojek pangkalan sono
translated_review: Those who give bad ratings don’t have to use Gojek, all talk but don’t know themselves, go use traditional motorcycle taxis.

review: jelek bangettttt susah dpt gojek pdhl di sekitar banyak malah dapet yg jauh jauh jarang ada promo perjalanan dekt aja malah dimahal mahalin
translated_review: Really bad, hard to get Gojek even though there are many around, but I get far drivers, rarely any promos, even for close trips it’s expensive.

review: sangat mengecewakan gojek di area tuluangagung saat jam 5 soregak ada satu pun yg dapat gojek carmotor
translated_review: Very disappointing Gojek in Tulungagung area at 5 pm, no Gojek car or motorcycle available at all.

review: susah cari driver pas temen gw cewek yang cari langsung dapat padahal kita baren aplikasi aneh
translated_review: Hard to find drivers, but my female friend found one immediately even though we used the app together, weird.

review: saya di ban dari gojek karena cancel oke aku salah apa gk bisa balik lagi padahlkan aku udh pakek ktp mana bisa buat akun baru lagi klau gk bisa ywd pilihanku sisah 1 berarti grab
translated_review: I got banned from Gojek for canceling, okay I was wrong, but can’t come back again, even though I already used my ID card. How can I make a new account if not? So my only choice is Grab.

review: susah dpt driver go car yg baik di apk ini singkat crita pesen gocar xl dpt mobil yg kursi blkng kcil parahhhh
translated_review: Hard to get a good GoCar driver on this app. Long story short, I ordered GoCar XL and got a car with very small back seats, really bad.

review: mantab coi maxim murah bet murah driver nya juga cepet nyampe nya terus sampai ke tujuan dengan cepat dan selamat mantab maxim lebih bagus dari gojek
translated_review: Great, Maxim is cheap, very cheap, the drivers arrive fast and get to the destination quickly and safely. Maxim is better than Gojek.

review: pelayanannya tidak ramah baru pertama kali pakai grab dan kesan drivernya sangat buruk gabakal mau pakai grab lagi
translated_review: Service is not friendly. First time using Grab and the driver was very bad. Won’t use Grab again.

review: kenapasih driver skrg ga bsa bgt di andalinsusah bgt dptnya heran pd gamau dpt rejeki ya
translated_review: Why can’t drivers be trusted anymore? It’s so hard to get one, strange, maybe they don’t want to get income.

review: susah banget cari gojekgocar pas hujan naikin gaji mereka biar gampang dapetnya emang harus selalu bintang 1 kasih rating gojek
